original: yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi kun du spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi rnal 'byor chen po'i dbang phyug nyid du ston te /
analyzed: yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi kun du spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi rnal 'byor chen po'i dbang phyug nyid du ston te /
translated: Again, “the eye of all-seeing Avalokiteśvara,” and so on, demonstrates that he is the lord of the great yoga of omniscient wisdom.

original: chos rnams mkhyen pa'i ye shes ni chos kyi ye shes so //
analyzed: chos rnams mkhyen pa'i ye shes ni chos kyi ye shes so //
translated: The wisdom of knowing phenomena is the wisdom of phenomena.

original: dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba la /
translated: “The perfection of the sublime” means

original: dam pa ni mchog ste /
analyzed: dam pa ni mchog ste /
translated: the sublime is the supreme.

original: de las pha rol na dag pa med pa'i phyir dam pa'o //
analyzed: de las pha rol na dag pa med pa'i phyir dam pa'o //
translated: Since there is no purity beyond that, it is the sublime.

original: dam pa yang yin la pha rol tu phyin pa yang yin pas na /
analyzed: dam pa yang yin la pha rol tu phyin pa yang yin pas na /
translated: Since it is the sublime and it is a perfection,

original: dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
analyzed: dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
translated: it is the perfection of the sublime.

original: chos kyi ye shes nyid dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin pas na /
analyzed: chos kyi ye shes nyid dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin pas na /
translated: Since the wisdom of phenomena is the perfection of the sublime,

original: chos kyi ye shes dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ste /
analyzed: chos kyi ye shes dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ste /
translated: It is called the perfection of the holy wisdom of Dharma.

original: de thob pa ni chos kyi ye shes dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa brnyes pa'o ;🔽/ de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las thams cad mdzad pas na phrin las thams cad do //
analyzed: de thob pa ni chos kyi ye shes dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa brnyes pa'o ; / de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las thams cad mdzad pas na phrin las thams cad do //
translated: Having attained that, he has attained the perfection of the holy wisdom of Dharma.🔽Since he performs all the deeds of all the tathagatas, he is all deeds.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las kyi ngo bo nyid du gyur pas na /🔽phrin las thams cad nyid do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las kyi ngo bo nyid du gyur pas na / phrin las thams cad nyid do //
translated: Since he is the very essence of the deeds of all the tathagatas, he is all deeds.🔽His is the certainty of all the tathagatas, which is unfailing, unobstructed, and irreversible.

original: de'i gdon mi za ba ni don yod cing thogs pa med la bzlog tu med par @26b ston cing 'chang pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las thams cad nyid gdon mi za zhing thogs pa med par ston pa ste /
analyzed: de'i gdon mi za ba ni don yod cing thogs pa med la bzlog tu med par @26b ston cing 'chang pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las thams cad nyid gdon mi za zhing thogs pa med par ston pa ste /
translated: He is the one who teaches and holds the certainty of all the deeds of all the tathagatas, which is unfailing and unobstructed.

original: 'dis ni las thams cad grub par ston to //
analyzed: 'dis ni las thams cad grub par ston to //
translated: This shows the accomplishment of all deeds.

original: nyid kyi rgyud sbyangs pa'i rim pa ni gzhan gyi don bya ba'i thabs kyi mthar thug pa yin pas na dgongs pa yongs su rdzogs pa'o //
analyzed: nyid kyi rgyud sbyangs pa'i rim pa ni gzhan gyi don bya ba'i thabs kyi mthar thug pa yin pas na dgongs pa yongs su rdzogs pa'o //
translated: The purification of his own continuum is the ultimate means of acting for the benefit of others, and so it is the complete fulfillment of his intention.

original: yun ring mo zhig tu don du gnyer ba'i gzhan gyi don mdzad par spyod pa shin tu brnyes pas na yid kyi bsam pa'o //
analyzed: yun ring mo zhig tu don du gnyer ba'i gzhan gyi don mdzad par spyod pa shin tu brnyes pas na yid kyi bsam pa'o //
translated: He has attained the practice of acting for the benefit of others, which he has sought for a long time, and so it is the fulfillment of his wish.

original: tshogs rdzogs pa ste /
analyzed: tshogs rdzogs pa ste /
translated: The perfection of the accumulations

original: sngar 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du byin gyis brlabs pa ni dgongs pa ma rdzogs pa yin la ;
analyzed: sngar 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du byin gyis brlabs pa ni dgongs pa ma rdzogs pa yin la ;
translated: . Previously, the Tathagatas blessed him as all the Tathagatas, but that was not the fulfillment of his intention.

original: da ni da rnams dang lhan cig mtshungs pa nyid brnyes pas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du bdag nyid bdag nyid kyis byin gyis brlabs so zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: da ni da rnams dang lhan cig mtshungs pa nyid brnyes pas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du bdag nyid bdag nyid kyis byin gyis brlabs so zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: Now, since he has attained equality with them, he has blessed himself as all the Tathagatas.

original: gang la zhe na /
analyzed: gang la zhe na /
translated: Where?

original: bdag nyid de nyid kyi rgyud la zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: bdag nyid de nyid kyi rgyud la zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: In his own continuum.

original: byin gyis brlabs nas zhes bya ba ni byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: byin gyis brlabs nas zhes bya ba ni byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa mdzad pa'o //
translated: Having blessed means having performed the blessing, etc.

original: 'dir byin gyis brlab pa tsam 'ba' zhig tu smos su zin kyang /
analyzed: 'dir byin gyis brlab pa tsam 'ba' zhig tu smos su zin kyang /
translated: Here, although only the blessing is mentioned,

original: de bzhin du dbang bskur ba la sogs pa yang mdzad par blta bar bya ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du dbang bskur ba la sogs pa yang mdzad par blta bar bya ste /
translated: one should understand that the consecration, etc.

original: byin gyis brlabs nas zhes bya ba'i tshig ni mtshon pa tsam du bstan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: byin gyis brlabs nas zhes bya ba'i tshig ni mtshon pa tsam du bstan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: are also performed, because the word having blessed is taught as an illustration.

original: sngar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs zin na /
analyzed: sngar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs zin na /
translated: If the Tathagatas have already blessed it before,

original: bdag nyid kyis byin gyis brlab pa 'di ci zhig dgos te /
analyzed: bdag nyid kyis byin gyis brlab pa 'di ci zhig dgos te /
translated: what is the need for blessing it oneself?

original: ha cang thal ches so zhes bya ba'i dogs pa bsal ba'i phyir lan brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: ha cang thal ches so zhes bya ba'i dogs pa bsal ba'i phyir lan brjod par bya ste /
translated: This is a great overextension, so in order to dispel this doubt, the reply is stated.

original: le los nye bar bcom pa 'ga' zhig bdag ni dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i tshe slob dpon gyis byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa byas zin to snyam nas bdag la byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa med par ji srid 'tsho'i bar du dkyil 'khor la sogs
analyzed: le los nye bar bcom pa 'ga' zhig bdag ni dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i tshe slob dpon gyis byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa byas zin to snyam nas bdag la byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa med par ji srid 'tsho'i bar du dkyil 'khor la sogs
translated: Some, destroyed by laziness, think that when they enter the mandala, the master has already done the consecration, etc., and so they do not do the consecration, etc., for as long as they live.

original: pa'i las byed par ma gyur cig snyam du dgongs pa yin no //
analyzed: pa'i las byed par ma gyur cig snyam du dgongs pa yin no //
translated: But they should not do the mandala work, etc., without consecration, etc., thinking, I will do it later.

original: da ni de gang gi phyir mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang / gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad seng ge'i gdan la bzhag pa de'i don grub pa bstan pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: da ni de gang gi phyir mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang / gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad seng ge'i gdan la bzhag pa de'i don grub pa bstan pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Now, in order to demonstrate the accomplishment of the purpose for which he fully awakened to enlightenment and for which he placed all the Tathagatas on the lion seat, he says, the Tathagatas, etc.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang yin la byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun du bzang po yang yin pas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa' chen po @27a * //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang yin la byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun du bzang po yang yin pas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa' chen po @27a * //
translated: He is the Tathagata and the Bodhisattva Mahasattva Samantabhadra, hence the Tathagata Bodhisattva Mahasattva.

original: kun du bzang po zhes bya'o //
analyzed: kun du bzang po zhes bya'o //
translated: is called “Samantabhadra.”

original: de'i dam tshig ni snying po dang rdo rje dang phyag rgya dang phyag rgya chen po dang / dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: de'i dam tshig ni snying po dang rdo rje dang phyag rgya dang phyag rgya chen po dang / dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: His pledge is the essence-mantra, the vajra, the seal, the great seal, the maṇḍala, and so forth.

original: de'i 'byung ba ni gang gi phyir sems dpa' ste /
analyzed: de'i 'byung ba ni gang gi phyir sems dpa' ste /
translated: The “arising” of that is the hero,

original: sems las de byin gyis brlab cing /
analyzed: sems las de byin gyis brlab cing /
translated: because he is consecrated from the mind,

original: de bstan par bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang /
analyzed: de bstan par bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang /
translated: and because he is the samadhi which is to be revealed.

original: rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs shing mngon du mdzad nas 'di zhes bya ba thugs la gnas pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs shing mngon du mdzad nas 'di zhes bya ba thugs la gnas pa'o //
translated: Having entered into and actualized the samadhi called “Vajra,” he “thought” this, i.e., he kept this in mind.

original: de ci zhig ce na /
analyzed: de ci zhig ce na /
translated: What is it?

original: snying po'o // ci zhig mdzad ce na /
analyzed: snying po'o // ci zhig mdzad ce na /
translated: It is the essence-mantra. What did he do?

original: phyung ngo zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: phyung ngo zhes bya ba'o //
translated: He “brought forth” it.

original: ming ji skad du bya zhe na /
analyzed: ming ji skad du bya zhe na /
translated: What is its name?

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ste ;
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ste ;
translated: It is called “The Mahayana-abhisamaya of all Tathagatas.”

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po ni 'dis 'gro bas na theg pa ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po ni 'dis 'gro bas na theg pa ste /
translated: The Mahayana of all Tathagatas is the vehicle because one goes by it.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu'o //
translated: The ten stages of the bodhisattva.

original: bgrod par bya ba yin pas na theg pa ste /
analyzed: bgrod par bya ba yin pas na theg pa ste /
translated: It is a vehicle because it is to be traversed.

original: sa bcu gcig pa sangs rgyas kyis kun du bzang po'o //
analyzed: sa bcu gcig pa sangs rgyas kyis kun du bzang po'o //
translated: The eleventh stage is that of the Buddha, the stage of the Good and Wise One.

original: chen po rnams kyi theg pa chen po yin pas na theg pa chen po ste ;
analyzed: chen po rnams kyi theg pa chen po yin pas na theg pa chen po ste ;
translated: It is the Great Vehicle because it is the vehicle of the great beings.

original: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi'o //
translated: It is that of the Buddhas and bodhisattvas.

original: theg pa chen po de mngon par rtogs pa ni rdo rje dang 'dra ba'i sems kyis thugs su chud pa ste /
analyzed: theg pa chen po de mngon par rtogs pa ni rdo rje dang 'dra ba'i sems kyis thugs su chud pa ste /
translated: The realization of that Great Vehicle is the penetration by the adamantine mind.

original: de ston par byed pa'i snying po de la yang ming de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de ston par byed pa'i snying po de la yang ming de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The essence which teaches that is also called by that name.

original: de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'o //
analyzed: de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'o //
translated: Therefore, it is the essence of the Tathagata called the realization of the Great Vehicle of all the Tathagatas.

original: gang las phyung zhe na /
analyzed: gang las phyung zhe na /
translated: From where does it come forth?

original: rang gi thugs ka las te /
analyzed: rang gi thugs ka las te /
translated: From his heart.

original: sngags kyi sgo nas ji lta ba bzhin spyod cing bshad ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas nas snying po 'dis phyag rgya rdzogs par bya'o zhes bstan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sngags kyi sgo nas ji lta ba bzhin spyod cing bshad ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas nas snying po 'dis phyag rgya rdzogs par bya'o zhes bstan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: In order to teach that one should perform the seal in accordance with the mantra, abiding in the samadhi just explained, with this essence.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs ba yin no //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs ba yin no //
translated: Then, etc.

original: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni 'brel pa ston pa yin te /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni 'brel pa ston pa yin te /
translated: The word then shows the connection.

original: 'dir rgyud kyi bdag po ni bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad yin par bshad la /
analyzed: 'dir rgyud kyi bdag po ni bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad yin par bshad la /
translated: Here, the Lord of the Tantra is explained to be the Bhagavat Vairocana.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bya ba nan tan du grub pa ni bdag nyid mdzad par mi rigs pas na snying po 'dis bcom ldan 'das kun du bzang po bskul ba yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bya ba nan tan du grub pa ni bdag nyid mdzad par mi rigs pas na snying po 'dis bcom ldan 'das kun du bzang po bskul ba yin no //
translated: Since it is not proper for the Tathagata's activity to be accomplished by himself, this essence exhorts the Bhagavat Samantabhadra.

original: de yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs la bzhugs so zhes sngar bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: de yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs la bzhugs so zhes sngar bstan pa yin no //
translated: Moreover, it was previously taught that he resides in the heart of all Tathagatas.

original: de nyid kyis na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas byung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kun du bzang po de nyid ces bya ba gsungs so //
analyzed: de nyid kyis na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas byung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kun du bzang po de nyid ces bya ba gsungs so //
translated: For that very reason, this one, who has just emerged from the hearts of all the Tathagatas, is the Bhagavat Samantabhadra himself.

original: 'dir rnam pa gang @27b gis byung zhes rtog pa la /
analyzed: 'dir rnam pa gang @27b gis byung zhes rtog pa la /
translated: Here, in what form did he emerge?

original: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du gyur nas zhes bya ba gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du gyur nas zhes bya ba gsungs pa yin te /
translated: He says, “having become a moon-disc. ”

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa bzhi bzung la /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa bzhi bzung la /
translated: All the Tathagatas are taken as the four, Akshobhya and so on.

original: re re las kyang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rang gi rigs dang 'brel pa 'byung ste /
analyzed: re re las kyang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rang gi rigs dang 'brel pa 'byung ste /
translated: And from each one, a moon-disc arises, connected with his own family.

original: gang gi phyir de'i gzugs sna tshogs pa nyid du 'byung bas na /
analyzed: gang gi phyir de'i gzugs sna tshogs pa nyid du 'byung bas na /
translated: Because of that, he has a variety of forms.

original: de'i phyir zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams su gyur to zhes khyad par med par gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams su gyur to zhes khyad par med par gsungs pa yin te /
translated: Therefore, he says, “having become moon-discs, ” without any distinction.

original: gang gi phyir rgyud 'di'i don thams cad kyi rtsa ba ni ting nge 'dzin yin la /
analyzed: gang gi phyir rgyud 'di'i don thams cad kyi rtsa ba ni ting nge 'dzin yin la /
translated: Because all the meaning of this tantra is rooted in samadhi,

original: de yang dmigs pa dang bcas pa yin no //
analyzed: de yang dmigs pa dang bcas pa yin no //
translated: and that is accompanied by an object.

original: de'i dmigs pa yang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yin te gang gi phyir ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pa la ting nge 'dzin bsgoms pa'i mthus zla ba'i dkyil 'khor shin tu rnam par dag pa las gang dang gang 'dod pa de dang de nyid de bzhin
analyzed: de'i dmigs pa yang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yin te gang gi phyir ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pa la ting nge 'dzin bsgoms pa'i mthus zla ba'i dkyil 'khor shin tu rnam par dag pa las gang dang gang 'dod pa de dang de nyid de bzhin
translated: Its object is also the moon-disk, because for the yogin who is abiding in meditative concentration, by the power of cultivating meditative concentration, whatever he desires from the extremely pure moon-disk, that very thing is seen by him just as it is

original: du mthong zhing gzhan dag la yang ston to //
analyzed: du mthong zhing gzhan dag la yang ston to //
translated: and is shown to others.

original: de bas na 'di ni bum pa bzang po'i gnas lta bu yin te /
analyzed: de bas na 'di ni bum pa bzang po'i gnas lta bu yin te /
translated: Therefore, this is like the abode of the excellent vase.

original: de'i phyir 'di dang po kho nar bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di dang po kho nar bstan pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, this is taught first of all.

original: de bas na rgyud 'di la yang rnal 'byor gyi rgyud ces bya ba yin no //
analyzed: de bas na rgyud 'di la yang rnal 'byor gyi rgyud ces bya ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, this tantra is also called Yoga Tantra.

original: de las byung nas de ci zhig mdzad ce na /
analyzed: de las byung nas de ci zhig mdzad ce na /
translated: Having arisen from that, what does he do?

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: He says, “all the tathāgatas,” and so on.

original: nyan thos la sogs pa'i byang chub la ltos nas byang chub chen po la sems dpas na byang chub kyi sems chen po'o //
analyzed: nyan thos la sogs pa'i byang chub la ltos nas byang chub chen po la sems dpas na byang chub kyi sems chen po'o //
translated: The great mind of enlightenment is the mind of enlightenment that is great in comparison to the enlightenment of śrāvakas and so on.

original: de yang dag par sbyangs pa ni legs par sbyangs shing yang dag par rab tu sbyangs nas dri ma med par byas zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de yang dag par sbyangs pa ni legs par sbyangs shing yang dag par rab tu sbyangs nas dri ma med par byas zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: And that purification is well purified, that is, perfectly purified, made stainless.

original: sems can rnams kyi byang chub chen po ji ltar sbyangs she na /
analyzed: sems can rnams kyi byang chub chen po ji ltar sbyangs she na /
translated: How does he purify the great enlightenment of sentient beings?

original: skal pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can rnams kyi snying ga'i gnas su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dri ma med pa'i gzugs su rang gi gzugs brnyan rab tu ston par mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: skal pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can rnams kyi snying ga'i gnas su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dri ma med pa'i gzugs su rang gi gzugs brnyan rab tu ston par mdzad pa'o //
translated: In accordance with their fortune, he causes the reflection of his own form to appear in the form of a stainless moon mandala in the heart of sentient beings.

original: byang chub kyi sems sbyangs pa de'i rjes la ci zhig mdzad ce na /
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems sbyangs pa de'i rjes la ci zhig mdzad ce na /
translated: What does he do after purifying the thought of enlightenment?

original: de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, he says, all the tathagatas, etc.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ni 'dir dkyil 'khor ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa lnga rnams te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ni 'dir dkyil 'khor ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa lnga rnams te /
translated: All the tathagatas here are the five tathagatas of the mandala.

original: de rnams kyi phyogs phyogs su ste phyogs bzhir 'khod cing gnas pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi phyogs phyogs su ste phyogs bzhir 'khod cing gnas pa'o //
translated: They are in the directions, that is, they are situated in the four directions.

original: da ni phyag rgya rnams kyi mi phyed pa rnams 'byed par mdzad pa'i don bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni phyag rgya rnams kyi mi phyed pa rnams 'byed par mdzad pa'i don bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: Now, in order to teach the meaning of the differentiation of the indivisible parts of the seals,

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i gzhung smos te /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i gzhung smos te /
translated: the text is stated from “then” and so forth.

original: de dag las kyang zhes @28a * //
analyzed: de dag las kyang zhes @28a * //
translated: And from among those,

original: bya ba ni sngar bshad pa rnams las rdo rje rnams su byung ba'o //
analyzed: bya ba ni sngar bshad pa rnams las rdo rje rnams su byung ba'o //
translated: means from among those previously explained, the vajras arise.

original: ci zhig gi ngo bo nyid du zhe na /
analyzed: ci zhig gi ngo bo nyid du zhe na /
translated: What is their nature?

original: ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid do zhes ston to //
analyzed: ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid do zhes ston to //
translated: It is taught that it is the nature of pristine consciousness.🔽Where did it go?

original: gang du song zhes rnam par rtog pa la thugs su zhugs so zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: gang du song zhes rnam par rtog pa la thugs su zhugs so zhes gsungs te /
translated: It is said that it entered the mind.

original: de'i thugs ni phyag rgya rdzogs pa'i gnas yi pa'i phyi ro//
analyzed: de'i thugs ni phyag rgya rdzogs pa'i gnas yi pa'i phyi ro//
translated: His mind is the place of the seal of perfection.

original: zhugs nas cir 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: zhugs nas cir 'gyur zhe na /
translated: Having entered, what happens?

original: gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro //
translated: It is applied to “having become a single unity.”

original: ji ltar na mang po gcig tu gyur ce na /
analyzed: ji ltar na mang po gcig tu gyur ce na /
translated: How does a multiplicity become one?

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu brtan pa'i phyir zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu brtan pa'i phyir zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: It is said that it is because of the extreme stability of the samādhi of Vajrasattva.

original: rab tu brtan pa'i phyir shin tu brtan pa ste bsgom pa rab kyi mthar phyin pa'o //
analyzed: rab tu brtan pa'i phyir shin tu brtan pa ste bsgom pa rab kyi mthar phyin pa'o //
translated: It is extremely firm because it is very stable, that is, it is the culmination of the highest meditation.

original: de'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir na shin tu brtan pa nyid de /
analyzed: de'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir na shin tu brtan pa nyid de /
translated: It is extremely firm because it has that nature.

original: de'i phyir shin tu brtan pa nyid ces bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir shin tu brtan pa nyid ces bya'o //
translated: Therefore, it is called extremely firm.

original: ci shin tu brtan pa nyid kho nas gcig tu 'dres par gyur tam /
analyzed: ci shin tu brtan pa nyid kho nas gcig tu 'dres par gyur tam /
translated: Is it only by being extremely firm that it becomes completely mixed?

original: 'on te ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te ma yin zhe na /
translated: Or is it not?

original: byin gyi rlabs kyis zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: byin gyi rlabs kyis zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: It is said, “by the transformation.”

original: byin gyi rlabs ni sngon gyi smon lam gyi ye shes te /
analyzed: byin gyi rlabs ni sngon gyi smon lam gyi ye shes te /
translated: The transformation is the wisdom of the previous aspiration,

original: gang 'di ltar gyur cig ces dgongs nas snyoms par zhugs pa na de'i de de bzhin du 'gyur bas 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs so //
analyzed: gang 'di ltar gyur cig ces dgongs nas snyoms par zhugs pa na de'i de de bzhin du 'gyur bas 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs so //
translated: because when one enters into meditative equipoise thinking, “May it be like this,” it becomes just like that. This is the transformation of all the Tathagatas.

original: gcig tu zhes pa ni mang po ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: gcig tu zhes pa ni mang po ma yin pa'o //
translated: “Only” means not many.

original: 'dres pa'i sgra ni brtan par gyur pa ste /
analyzed: 'dres pa'i sgra ni brtan par gyur pa ste /
translated: The word “mixed” means “firmly established.”

original: gcig tu brtan pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gcig tu brtan pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is “firmly established as one.”

original: rdo rje de tshad ji tsam du byung zhe na /
analyzed: rdo rje de tshad ji tsam du byung zhe na /
translated: How big is that vajra?

original: ting nge 'dzin la dbang du gyur pa brtan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin la dbang du gyur pa brtan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to stabilize mastery of meditative stabilization,🔽he teaches the emanation.

original: spro ba ston pa yin pas nam mkha'i khams thams cad kyi tshad ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: spro ba ston pa yin pas nam mkha'i khams thams cad kyi tshad ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, he says, “pervading the entire realm of space,” and so on.

original: nam mkha'i khams thams cad kyi tshad dang mnyam par 'jug pa zhes bya ba la kun nas 'jug pas na mnyam par 'jug pa ste /
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams thams cad kyi tshad dang mnyam par 'jug pa zhes bya ba la kun nas 'jug pas na mnyam par 'jug pa ste /
translated: “Pervading the entire realm of space” means “pervading equally,” because it pervades everywhere.

original: thams cad du song ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: thams cad du song ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This is the meaning of “pervading all.”

original: 'di'i mthu ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: 'di'i mthu ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is its power?

original: 'od zer gyi phreng ba can zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: 'od zer gyi phreng ba can zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: He says, “having a garland of light rays,”

original: 'od zer rnams kyi phreng ba 'phro bas na 'od kyi phreng ba'o //
analyzed: 'od zer rnams kyi phreng ba 'phro bas na 'od kyi phreng ba'o //
translated: because it radiates a garland of light rays, it is a garland of light.

original: de 'di la yod pas na 'od kyi phreng ba'o //
analyzed: de 'di la yod pas na 'od kyi phreng ba'o //
translated: Since it has that, it is a garland of light.

original: rtse mo du dang ldan zhe na /🔽rtse mo lnga pa zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: rtse mo du dang ldan zhe na / rtse mo lnga pa zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: How many tips does it have?🔽He says, “having five tips,”

original: rtse lnga ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rtse lnga ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: because it has five tips.

original: ci zhig gi ngo bo nyid ce na /
analyzed: ci zhig gi ngo bo nyid ce na /
translated: What is its nature?

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i rang bzhin zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i rang bzhin zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: The nature of the body, speech, and mind vajras of all tathāgatas.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs nyid rdo rje yin pas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang @28b thugs rdo rje ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs nyid rdo rje yin pas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang @28b thugs rdo rje ste /
translated: Since the body, speech, and mind of all tathāgatas are vajras, they are the body, speech, and mind vajras of all tathāgatas.

original: de'i rang bzhin ni ngo bo nyid do //
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin ni ngo bo nyid do //
translated: Their nature is their essence.

original: de'i ngo bo nyid gang zhig yin zhe na /
analyzed: de'i ngo bo nyid gang zhig yin zhe na /
translated: What is their essence?

original: rdo rje'i dbyibs zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: rdo rje'i dbyibs zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: The vajra form is stated.

original: rdo rje'i dbyibs ni rdo rje'i gzugs so //
analyzed: rdo rje'i dbyibs ni rdo rje'i gzugs so //
translated: The vajra form is the vajra figure.

original: de lta bu'i rdo rje'i dbyibs su gyur nas /
analyzed: de lta bu'i rdo rje'i dbyibs su gyur nas /
translated: Having become such a vajra form,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas byung ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas byung ste /
translated: it emerges from the hearts of all tathāgatas🔽and abides in the two hands.

original: phyag gnyis su gnas so zhes bya ba 'di'i don gyis na spro ba dang bsdu ba mdzad nas zhes ston pa yin no //
analyzed: phyag gnyis su gnas so zhes bya ba 'di'i don gyis na spro ba dang bsdu ba mdzad nas zhes ston pa yin no //
translated: The meaning of this is that it is taught that he emanates and reabsorbs.🔽Then, etc.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rdo rje lta bu ni rdo rje dang 'dra ba'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rdo rje lta bu ni rdo rje dang 'dra ba'o //
translated: The vajra-like is like a vajra.

original: gzugs sna tshogs pa ni dbyibs sna tshogs pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs sna tshogs pa ni dbyibs sna tshogs pa'o //
translated: Various forms are various shapes.

original: kha dog sna tshogs pa ni sngon po la sogs pa'i kha dog ste /
analyzed: kha dog sna tshogs pa ni sngon po la sogs pa'i kha dog ste /
translated: Various colors are the colors of blue, etc.

original: de yang sna tshogs pa ni sna tshogs pa'i gzugs can yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de yang sna tshogs pa ni sna tshogs pa'i gzugs can yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Moreover, various is because of having various forms.

original: de ltar byung ba'i 'od zer de rnams ji srid cig gi mthar 'byung zhe na /
analyzed: de ltar byung ba'i 'od zer de rnams ji srid cig gi mthar 'byung zhe na /
translated: For how long do those light rays that have arisen in that way occur?

original: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du snang bas khyab par byed par 'byung ngo zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du snang bas khyab par byed par 'byung ngo zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: They occur pervading all world-realms with light.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du snang ba ni khyab pa ste /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du snang ba ni khyab pa ste /
translated: Light in all world-realms is pervasion.

original: de lta bu yin pas na 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bas khyab par byed pa ste /
analyzed: de lta bu yin pas na 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bas khyab par byed pa ste /
translated: Because of being like that, they pervade all world-realms with light.

original: snang ba ni gsal bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: snang ba ni gsal bar byed pa'o //
translated: Light is illumination.

original: khyab pa ni kun du khyab pa'o //
analyzed: khyab pa ni kun du khyab pa'o //
translated: Pervasion is pervading.

original: 'od zer de dag gi rtse mo las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo snyed kyi zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi grangs snyed do //
analyzed: 'od zer de dag gi rtse mo las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo snyed kyi zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi grangs snyed do //
translated: At the tips of those light rays, as many lotuses as there are atoms in all world-realms appear.

original: chos kyi dbyings smos pa ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dpe yin no //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings smos pa ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dpe yin no //
translated: The mention of the dharma-dhātu is a supramundane example.

original: nam mkha'i khams smos pas ni 'jig rten pa'i dpe yin te /
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams smos pas ni 'jig rten pa'i dpe yin te /
translated: The mention of the space element is a mundane example.

original: dpe 'di gnyis kyis 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam rgya mtsho'i sprin tshad med pa nyid du ston te /
analyzed: dpe 'di gnyis kyis 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam rgya mtsho'i sprin tshad med pa nyid du ston te /
translated: These two examples show the immeasurability of the ocean-like cloud of world-realms.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam rgya mtsho'i sprin ni chos kyi dbyings dang nam mkha'i khams bzhin du mtha' yas pa'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam rgya mtsho'i sprin ni chos kyi dbyings dang nam mkha'i khams bzhin du mtha' yas pa'o //
translated: The ocean-like cloud of world-realms is limitless like the dharma-dhātu and the space element.

original: rab 'byam ni rgyun la bya ste de rnams kyi tshogs ni sprin no //
analyzed: rab 'byam ni rgyun la bya ste de rnams kyi tshogs ni sprin no //
translated: The word realms refers to a continuum. The collection of those is a cloud.

original: sprin gyi phung po ni rgya mtsho ste /
analyzed: sprin gyi phung po ni rgya mtsho ste /
translated: A cloud-mass is an ocean.

original: rgya mtsho'i sgras ni grangs mtha' med pa nyid du ston te rgya mtsho de dag tu sangs rgyas kyi bya ba mdzad do zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: rgya mtsho'i sgras ni grangs mtha' med pa nyid du ston te rgya mtsho de dag tu sangs rgyas kyi bya ba mdzad do zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: The word “ocean” indicates the absence of a limit to the number of buddhas, and it is to be connected with “he performs the deeds of a buddha in those oceans.”

original: dgos pa ci zhig gi phyir sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa de la 'jug par mdzad ce na /
analyzed: dgos pa ci zhig gi phyir sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa de la 'jug par mdzad ce na /
translated: For what purpose does he engage in that buddha activity?

original: de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes mngon par shes pa mngon par byang chub pa zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes mngon par shes pa mngon par byang chub pa zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, it is said, “the manifest enlightenment of the intuition of the equality of all tathāgatas.”

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes can yin @29a * //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes can yin @29a * //
translated: He is the one who has the intuition of the equality of all tathāgatas,

original: pas na / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kya mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes te /
analyzed: pas na / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kya mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes te /
translated: and so he is the intuition of the equality of all tathāgatas.

original: mnyam pa nyid ni stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: mnyam pa nyid ni stong pa nyid do //
translated: Equality is emptiness.

original: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes nyid mngon par shes pa'o //
analyzed: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes nyid mngon par shes pa'o //
translated: The intuition of equality is itself the superknowledge.

original: 'di'i shin tu mngon par byang chub pa ni mngon par byang chub pa ste /
analyzed: 'di'i shin tu mngon par byang chub pa ni mngon par byang chub pa ste /
translated: His manifest enlightenment is manifest enlightenment.

original: yang dag par thugs su chud pa'o ;
analyzed: yang dag par thugs su chud pa'o ;
translated: It is his perfect realization.

original: / da ni thugs su chud pas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa rdzogs par mdzad pa rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston te /
analyzed: / da ni thugs su chud pas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa rdzogs par mdzad pa rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston te /
translated: Now, in accordance with the sequence of the deeds of the Buddha in all world systems, he teaches the understanding.

original: re zhig dang po kho nar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du gtogs pa'i ma skyes pa'i byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa ni byang chub kyi sems chen po bskyed pa ste /
analyzed: re zhig dang po kho nar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du gtogs pa'i ma skyes pa'i byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa ni byang chub kyi sems chen po bskyed pa ste /
translated: First of all, the generation of the thought of enlightenment belonging to all the Tathagatas is the generation of the great thought of enlightenment.

original: byang chub kyi sems chen po smos pa ni /
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems chen po smos pa ni /
translated: The mention of the great thought of enlightenment

original: nyan thos la sogs pa'i byang chub la ltos pa yin no //
analyzed: nyan thos la sogs pa'i byang chub la ltos pa yin no //
translated: is in contrast to the enlightenment of the Sravakas and so forth.

original: byang chub kyi sems kyi 'og tu spyod pa 'byung bas kun du bzang po zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems kyi 'og tu spyod pa 'byung bas kun du bzang po zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: After the thought of enlightenment, the conduct is mentioned, and so he says, “Samantabhadra’s conduct,” and so forth.

original: thams cad du yongs su dag pas na kun du bzang po ste de'i spyod pa'o /
analyzed: thams cad du yongs su dag pas na kun du bzang po ste de'i spyod pa'o /
translated: It is Samantabhadra’s conduct because it is pure in all ways.

original: de yangs dang pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa dbye ba rnam pa sna tshogs pas bskyed pa ni rdzogs par byas pa'o //
analyzed: de yangs dang pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa dbye ba rnam pa sna tshogs pas bskyed pa ni rdzogs par byas pa'o //
translated: It is perfected by the generation of the various divisions of the perfections and so forth.

original: spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur na bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs mnyes par mdzad de /
analyzed: spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur na bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs mnyes par mdzad de /
translated: When the conduct is fully accomplished, then all the Tathagatas are pleased with the family, because the accumulations of merit and wisdom are fully accomplished.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs te /
translated: The family of all the Tathagatas is the family of all the Tathagatas.

original: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad do //
translated: It is all the Buddhas and Bodhisattvas.

original: de yang 'gro ba ngan pa rnams su thugs rje'i dbang gis thim pas na rigs so //
analyzed: de yang 'gro ba ngan pa rnams su thugs rje'i dbang gis thim pas na rigs so //
translated: And it is a family because it is pervaded by compassion in the lower realms.

original: de mnyes par bya ba ni yongs su dgyes par bya ba'o //
analyzed: de mnyes par bya ba ni yongs su dgyes par bya ba'o //
translated: To please it is to delight it.

original: de'i 'og tu byang chub kyi snying po chen po zhes bya ba 'dzam bu'i gling dang 'og min gyi gnas so //
analyzed: de'i 'og tu byang chub kyi snying po chen po zhes bya ba 'dzam bu'i gling dang 'og min gyi gnas so //
translated: Then, after that, he goes to the great site of enlightenment, which is the place of Jambudvipa and Akanistha.

original: der gshegs pa ni bzhud pa'o //
analyzed: der gshegs pa ni bzhud pa'o //
translated: To go there is to go.

original: bdud ni phung po dang 'chi bdag dang lha'i bu'i dang nyon mongs pa'i bdud rnams te /
analyzed: bdud ni phung po dang 'chi bdag dang lha'i bu'i dang nyon mongs pa'i bdud rnams te /
translated: The demons are the demons of the aggregates, of death, of the son of heaven, and of the afflictions.

original: gsod pa'i phyir bdud de /
analyzed: gsod pa'i phyir bdud de /
translated: They are demons because they kill.

original: dge ba'i srog gi bar du gcod par byed pas so //
analyzed: dge ba'i srog gi bar du gcod par byed pas so //
translated: Because they are the murderers of the life of virtue.

original: de rnams 'dul ba ni tshar gcod par mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams 'dul ba ni tshar gcod par mdzad pa'o //
translated: Their subjugation is their destruction.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyi byang chub chen por mngon par byang chub pa ni thugs su chud pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyi byang chub chen por mngon par byang chub pa ni thugs su chud pa'o //
translated: The realization of the great enlightenment, which has the characteristic of the sameness of all the Tathagatas, is the understanding.

original: dam pa rnams kyi chos yin pas dam pa'i chos so //
analyzed: dam pa rnams kyi chos yin pas dam pa'i chos so //
translated: It is the true Dharma because it is the Dharma of the holy ones.

original: 'di nyid gdul bya rnams kyi rgyud la 'jug par mdzad pas 'khor lo ste /
analyzed: 'di nyid gdul bya rnams kyi rgyud la 'jug par mdzad pas 'khor lo ste /
translated: It is the wheel because it is set in motion in the mindstreams of those to be trained.

original: lan gsum @29b du rnam pa bcu gnyis su yongs su bskor bar mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: lan gsum @29b du rnam pa bcu gnyis su yongs su bskor bar mdzad pa'o //
translated: It is turned three times and in twelve aspects.

original: de yang sdug bsngal yongs su shes par bya zhes pa dang / yongs su shes pa dang / yang shes par byar med pa dang / lan gsum du bzlas pa 'di ni bden pa re re la yang yod de /
analyzed: de yang sdug bsngal yongs su shes par bya zhes pa dang / yongs su shes pa dang / yang shes par byar med pa dang / lan gsum du bzlas pa 'di ni bden pa re re la yang yod de /
translated: The three repetitions are: suffering is to be fully known, it is fully known, and it is not to be fully known again. These three repetitions are for each of the four noble truths.

original: kun 'byung spang bar bya'o zhes pa dang / spangs pa dang yang spang bar bya ba med pa dang / 'gog pa mngon sum du bya ba dang / mngon sum du byas pa dang / yang mngon sum du byar med pa dang / lam bsgom par bya ba dang /
analyzed: kun 'byung spang bar bya'o zhes pa dang / spangs pa dang yang spang bar bya ba med pa dang / 'gog pa mngon sum du bya ba dang / mngon sum du byas pa dang / yang mngon sum du byar med pa dang / lam bsgom par bya ba dang /
translated: The origin of suffering is to be abandoned, and there is neither that which is to be abandoned nor that which is not to be abandoned.🔽Cessation is to be manifested, and there is neither that which is to be manifested nor that which is not to be manifested.🔽The path is to be cultivated, and there is neither that which is to be cultivated nor that which is not to be cultivated.

original: bsgom pa dang / yang bsgom par bya ba med pa'o zhes bya ba ste 'di dag ni rnam pa bcu gnyis so //
analyzed: bsgom pa dang / yang bsgom par bya ba med pa'o zhes bya ba ste 'di dag ni rnam pa bcu gnyis so //
translated: These are the twelve aspects.

original: yang na sems can skal pa ji lta ba bzhin du dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bskor ba'o //
analyzed: yang na sems can skal pa ji lta ba bzhin du dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bskor ba'o //
translated: Or else, it is the wheel of the maṇḍala that is turned in accordance with the fortune of sentient beings.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams lus pa med pa rnams su sems can gyi khams ma lus pa rnams ngan song la sogs pa las yongs su skyob cing 'don par mdzad la /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams lus pa med pa rnams su sems can gyi khams ma lus pa rnams ngan song la sogs pa las yongs su skyob cing 'don par mdzad la /
translated: In all the worlds without exception, all the realms of sentient beings without exception are protected and saved from the lower realms and so forth.

original: phan pa ma yin pa la zhugs pa rnams de las bzlog ste phan 'dogs par mdzad pa ste ;
analyzed: phan pa ma yin pa la zhugs pa rnams de las bzlog ste phan 'dogs par mdzad pa ste ;
translated: Those who are engaged in what is not beneficial are turned away from that and are benefited.

original: phan pa zhes bya ba'i sgras ni ma 'ongs pa'i bde bar 'gyur ba'i bsod nams bya'o //
analyzed: phan pa zhes bya ba'i sgras ni ma 'ongs pa'i bde bar 'gyur ba'i bsod nams bya'o //
translated: The word benefit means merit that will lead to future happiness.

original: bde ba zhes bya ba ni da ltar gyi tshe 'di la 'byung ba chen po'i dbang po tshim pa'i rang bzhin gyi tshor ba'o //
analyzed: bde ba zhes bya ba ni da ltar gyi tshe 'di la 'byung ba chen po'i dbang po tshim pa'i rang bzhin gyi tshor ba'o //
translated: Happiness is the feeling that is the nature of the satisfaction of the great elements and faculties in the present life.

original: thams cad ces smos pa ni re re bzhin yang sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: thams cad ces smos pa ni re re bzhin yang sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: The word all should be applied to each [of the above].

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes te /
translated: The wisdom of all the Tathagatas is the wisdom of all the Tathagatas.

original: de nyid ni mngon par shes pa yin la /
analyzed: de nyid ni mngon par shes pa yin la /
translated: That itself is the superknowledges.

original: dngos grub dam pa yang de dag nyid yin te /
analyzed: dngos grub dam pa yang de dag nyid yin te /
translated: Those are the highest powers.

original: de grub pa la sogs pa zhes bya ba la grub pa ni bskyed pa'o //
analyzed: de grub pa la sogs pa zhes bya ba la grub pa ni bskyed pa'o //
translated: The words their attainment, etc. - attainment means production.

original: sogs pa'i sgras ni rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang / bsam gtan dang mngon par shes pa dang / gzugs med pa rnams bskyed pa gzung ngo //
analyzed: sogs pa'i sgras ni rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang / bsam gtan dang mngon par shes pa dang / gzugs med pa rnams bskyed pa gzung ngo //
translated: The word etc. includes the production of the miracles of teaching, concentration, superknowledge, and the formless [absorptions].

original: 'phel bas na rdzu 'phrul te /
analyzed: 'phel bas na rdzu 'phrul te /
translated: Miracle means increase.

original: sems kyi 'byor pa nam mkha' la 'gro ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sems kyi 'byor pa nam mkha' la 'gro ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: The riches of mind are the ability to fly through the sky, etc.

original: cho 'phrul rnams ni mthu yang dag par ston pa ste /
analyzed: cho 'phrul rnams ni mthu yang dag par ston pa ste /
translated: The miracles are the perfect display of power.🔽For example, when the Lord enters a city, the blind regain their sight, the deaf their hearing, the naked find clothing, and so on.

original: ji ltar bcom ldan 'das grong khyer du 'jug par mdzad pa na long ba rnams kyis mig thob pa dang / 'on pa rnams kyis sgra thos pa dang / gcer bu rnams gos dang bcas par gyur to zhes bya ba la sogs pa bstan cing gsal bar mdzad nas /
analyzed: ji ltar bcom ldan 'das grong khyer du 'jug par mdzad pa na long ba rnams kyis mig thob pa dang / 'on pa rnams kyis sgra thos pa dang / gcer bu rnams gos dang bcas par gyur to zhes bya ba la sogs pa bstan cing gsal bar mdzad nas /
translated: The miracles are taught and made clear, and then

original: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas so zhes bya bar sbyar ro //🔽bar du zhes bya ba'i sgras ni cho 'phrul @30a * //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas so zhes bya bar sbyar ro // bar du zhes bya ba'i sgras ni cho 'phrul @30a * //
translated: the Buddha enters the heart of the Lord Vairocana.

original: chen po dang / mu stegs las rnam par rgyal ba la sogs pa bsdu'o //
analyzed: chen po dang / mu stegs las rnam par rgyal ba la sogs pa bsdu'o //
translated: The word “and” indicates that the great miracles and the victory over the heterodox are included.

original: ci zhig tu gyur nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la bzhugs she na /
analyzed: ci zhig tu gyur nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la bzhugs she na /
translated: In what way does he enter the heart of the Lord Vairocana?

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni kun du bzang po yin pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni kun du bzang po yin pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: The samādhi of Vajrasattva is Samantabhadra.

original: 'di ji lta bu yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'di ji lta bu yin zhe na /
translated: What is this like?

original: gcig tu 'dres pa zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: gcig tu 'dres pa zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: It is said, “completely mixed.”

original: gcig tu zhes bya ba ni cha shas med pa'i rang bzhin te /
analyzed: gcig tu zhes bya ba ni cha shas med pa'i rang bzhin te /
translated: “ Completely” means without parts.

original: chu dang 'o ma bzhin du gcig tu 'dres par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: chu dang 'o ma bzhin du gcig tu 'dres par gyur pa'o //
translated: It is completely mixed, like water and milk.

original: de yang 'dres pa ni brtan pa la bya'o //
analyzed: de yang 'dres pa ni brtan pa la bya'o //
translated: And this mixing is to be understood as firm.

original: ji ltar na 'di gcig tu 'dres par gyur zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar na 'di gcig tu 'dres par gyur zhe na /
translated: How is this completely mixed?

original: kun du bzang po yin pa'i phyir gcig tu gyur pa dang / shin tu bstan pa yin pa'i phyir 'dres shing dbyer mi phyed par gyur to zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: kun du bzang po yin pa'i phyir gcig tu gyur pa dang / shin tu bstan pa yin pa'i phyir 'dres shing dbyer mi phyed par gyur to zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: It is completely mixed because it is Samantabhadra, and it is completely mixed because it is well-taught.

original: kun du bzang po'i thugs bskyed pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du bzhugs pa ni ye shes kyi gzugs te /
analyzed: kun du bzang po'i thugs bskyed pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du bzhugs pa ni ye shes kyi gzugs te /
translated: The generation of the mind of Samantabhadra, residing in the moon-disk, is the form of gnosis.

original: 'di nyid zla ba'i dkyil 'khor las rdo rje'i gzugs su byung nas /
analyzed: 'di nyid zla ba'i dkyil 'khor las rdo rje'i gzugs su byung nas /
translated: This very [mind] arises from the moon-disk in the form of a vajra.

original: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas shing gcig tu gyur nas /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas shing gcig tu gyur nas /
translated: Abiding in the heart of Bhagavat Vairocana, they became one.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang gis spro ba dang sdud pa rnams bstan nas thugs ka nas byung ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang gis spro ba dang sdud pa rnams bstan nas thugs ka nas byung ste /
translated: Then, through the power of the samadhi of Bhagavat, they were emanated and gathered back in, and then came out of his heart.

original: rdo rje'i gzugs su bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag la gnas la /
analyzed: rdo rje'i gzugs su bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag la gnas la /
translated: In the form of a vajra, they remained in the hand of Bhagavat.

original: de las 'od zer gyi gzugs su byung ba dang / de las kyang sangs rgyas kyi sku grangs med pa byung ste /
analyzed: de las 'od zer gyi gzugs su byung ba dang / de las kyang sangs rgyas kyi sku grangs med pa byung ste /
translated: From that, they came out in the form of light rays, and from that, countless buddha bodies came out.

original: sems can gyi skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa ji lta ba bzhin rnams mdzad nas slar 'dus te gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas /
analyzed: sems can gyi skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa ji lta ba bzhin rnams mdzad nas slar 'dus te gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas /
translated: They performed the deeds of the buddhas in all world systems, according to the fortune of sentient beings.🔽Then, having gathered back in, they became one and remained in the form of the great bodhisattva Samantabhadra.

original: byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun du bzang po'i sku'i tshul gyis thugs la gnas nas ci zhig mdzad ce na /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun du bzang po'i sku'i tshul gyis thugs la gnas nas ci zhig mdzad ce na /
translated: What did they do?

original: ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do zhes bya ba 'di gsungs te /
analyzed: ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do zhes bya ba 'di gsungs te /
translated: This is the declaration of the declaration of intent.

original: dris pa'i lan ni lung bstan pa zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: dris pa'i lan ni lung bstan pa zhes bya ba la /
translated: The answer to the question is called “prediction.”

original: dgos pa'i dbang gis ma dris par smras pa ni ched du brjod pa ste ched du brjod pas na ched du brjod pa'o //
analyzed: dgos pa'i dbang gis ma dris par smras pa ni ched du brjod pa ste ched du brjod pas na ched du brjod pa'o //
translated: The statement made without being asked due to the power of necessity is the “purposeful statement.”

original: ched du brjod pa ci zhig brjod ce na /
analyzed: ched du brjod pa ci zhig brjod ce na /
translated: What is the purposeful statement?

original: ae ma'o bdag ni rang byung ba'i //
analyzed: ae ma'o bdag ni rang byung ba'i //
translated: “Amazing! I am self-arisen!”

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: and so on is stated.

original: ae ma'o zhes bya ba ni ngo mtshar skye ba'o //
analyzed: ae ma'o zhes bya ba ni ngo mtshar skye ba'o //
translated: “Amazing!” is the arising of wonder.

original: bdag nyid ces bya ba ni bdag nyid ston par byed pa'o //
analyzed: bdag nyid ces bya ba ni bdag nyid ston par byed pa'o //
translated: “I” is the one who teaches himself.

original: gang gi zhe na /🔽rang byung zhes bya ba ste /🔽rang nyid byung bas na rang byung ste /
analyzed: gang gi zhe na / rang byung zhes bya ba ste / rang nyid byung bas na rang byung ste /
translated: Whose?🔽“Self-arisen” is stated.

original: sangs rgyas so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas so //
translated: “Self-arisen” is a buddha.

original: thams cad du bzang bas na @30b kun du bzang po'o //
analyzed: thams cad du bzang bas na @30b kun du bzang po'o //
translated: “Samantabhadra” is good in all ways.

original: sems dpa' ni sems so //
analyzed: sems dpa' ni sems so //
translated: “Sattva” is mind.

original: brtan pa ni mi phyed pa'o //
analyzed: brtan pa ni mi phyed pa'o //
translated: “Stable” is inseparable.

original: de ni gtan tshigs gang gi phyir bdag rang 'byung gi sems dpa' yin pa de'i phyir brtan pa ste mi phyed pa'o //
analyzed: de ni gtan tshigs gang gi phyir bdag rang 'byung gi sems dpa' yin pa de'i phyir brtan pa ste mi phyed pa'o //
translated: That is the reason. Because I am a self-arisen mind, therefore I am stable, that is, inseparable.

original: gang gi phyir brtan pa des na /
analyzed: gang gi phyir brtan pa des na /
translated: Because of that stability,

original: lus min yang zhes bya ste /
analyzed: lus min yang zhes bya ste /
translated: it is not the body, and yet.

original: sems ni gzugs can ma yin pas na lus ma yin du zin kyang /🔽sems dpa'i lus su gyur pa yin zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: sems ni gzugs can ma yin pas na lus ma yin du zin kyang / sems dpa'i lus su gyur pa yin zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The mind is not a body, because it is not physical.🔽Even though it is not a body, it is the body of the bodhisattva.🔽The mind becomes a physical body.

original: sems kyi lus gzugs can nyid du gyur pa ni ae ma'o ngo mtshar che'o zhes ston to //🔽de ni bcom ldan 'das 'di don gang gi phyir ji skad du smra ba'i phyir gyis byang chub sems dpa'i skur sprul pa de'i las la sbyar bar bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: sems kyi lus gzugs can nyid du gyur pa ni ae ma'o ngo mtshar che'o zhes ston to // de ni bcom ldan 'das 'di don gang gi phyir ji skad du smra ba'i phyir gyis byang chub sems dpa'i skur sprul pa de'i las la sbyar bar bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: How amazing!

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i gzhung lhag ma rnams gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i gzhung lhag ma rnams gsungs pa yin te /
translated: In order to demonstrate the activity of that emanation of the body of the bodhisattva, which is the Bhagavat’s speech, the remaining text is stated, beginning with “Then.”

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan snga ni mdun du ste /🔽de nas bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pa dang / rnam par snang mdzad kyi spyan snga ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan snga ni mdun du ste /🔽de nas bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pa dang / rnam par snang mdzad kyi spyan snga ste /
translated: In front of all the tathāgatas is in front of Akṣobhya and Vairocana.

original: mdun na sngar bshad pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas par gyur nas zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i sku'i las la sbyar ba la pha la bu bzhin du bka' nod par gyur to //
analyzed: mdun na sngar bshad pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas par gyur nas zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i sku'i las la sbyar ba la pha la bu bzhin du bka' nod par gyur to //
translated: Having become situated on the moon-mandala as previously explained, in front means that, having resided on the mandala, he is applied to the activity of the body of the Great Bodhisattva.

original: 'di zhal bzhi pa yin pas na gnyis ka yang mngon sum du lta bas bzhugs pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di zhal bzhi pa yin pas na gnyis ka yang mngon sum du lta bas bzhugs pa yin no //
translated: Since this is a four-faced [form], both [the Bodhisattva and the Buddha] are situated in direct view.

original: sngar ting nge 'dzin gyi snying po dang phyag rgya dang sems dpa' rnams sprul pa mdzad pa yin la /
analyzed: sngar ting nge 'dzin gyi snying po dang phyag rgya dang sems dpa' rnams sprul pa mdzad pa yin la /
translated: Previously, the essence of meditative stabilization, the seal, and the heroes were emanated.

original: da ni de'i las la sbyar ba la yang ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang nyid kyis bya'o zhes bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni de'i las la sbyar ba la yang ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang nyid kyis bya'o zhes bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: Now, in order to demonstrate that even the application to the activity of those [emanations] is to be done by the power of meditative stabilization,

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas ting nge 'dzin gzhan ston pa yin no //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas ting nge 'dzin gzhan ston pa yin no //
translated: [the Bhagavān] teaches another meditative stabilization beginning with thereupon.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni bshad zin to //
translated: The Bhagavān has been explained.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes yin pas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes te de nyid ni dam tshig tu gyur pa'i rdo rje yin pas na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes yin pas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes te de nyid ni dam tshig tu gyur pa'i rdo rje yin pas na /
translated: Since it is the exalted wisdom of all the tathagatas, it is the exalted wisdom of all the tathagatas.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi dam tshig gi rdo rje'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi dam tshig gi rdo rje'o //
translated: Since it is the vajra of the commitment of exalted wisdom of all the tathagatas, it is the vajra of the commitment of exalted wisdom of all the tathagatas.

original: de'i ting nge 'dzin gang gis stsol bar mdzad pa'i ting nge 'dzin de la yang ming de skad ces bya ba nyid yin te /
analyzed: de'i ting nge 'dzin gang gis stsol bar mdzad pa'i ting nge 'dzin de la yang ming de skad ces bya ba nyid yin te /
translated: The samadhi in which he is engaged is also called by that name.

original: de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba de la snyoms par zhugs shing mngon sum du mdzad nas /
analyzed: de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba de la snyoms par zhugs shing mngon sum du mdzad nas /
translated: Therefore, having entered into and actualized the samadhi called the vajra of the commitment of exalted wisdom of all the tathagatas,

original: rdo rje de byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun du bzang po'i lag pa gnyis su byin no zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: rdo rje de byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun du bzang po'i lag pa gnyis su byin no zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: the vajra was given into the hands of the great bodhisattva Samantabhadra.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽ji skad du bshad pa'i dngos grub kyi 'bras @31a * //
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na / ji skad du bshad pa'i dngos grub kyi 'bras @31a * //
translated: Why is that?

original: bu'i rgyu nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: bu'i rgyu nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because it is the cause of the fruit of the powers as they have been explained.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang 'brel pa'i tshul khrims ni rnam par smin pa bsil pa yin pas na tshul khrims so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang 'brel pa'i tshul khrims ni rnam par smin pa bsil pa yin pas na tshul khrims so //
translated: Morality is so called because it is the cooling of the maturation of the seed of the Tathagatas.

original: de yang rnam pa gsum ste so sor thar pa'i sdom pa'i tshul khrims dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad sdud pa'i tshul khrims dang / snying rjes sems can gyi don gyi bya ba bsgrub pa'i sems can gyi don bya ba'i tshul khrims so //
analyzed: de yang rnam pa gsum ste so sor thar pa'i sdom pa'i tshul khrims dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad sdud pa'i tshul khrims dang / snying rjes sems can gyi don gyi bya ba bsgrub pa'i sems can gyi don bya ba'i tshul khrims so //
translated: It is threefold: the morality of restraint by the pratimoksa vows, the morality of the amassing of virtuous natures, and the morality of working the weal of sentient beings by means of compassion.

original: ting nge 'dzin ces smos pas ni bsam gtan dang gzugs med pa rnams bzung ngo //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin ces smos pas ni bsam gtan dang gzugs med pa rnams bzung ngo //
translated: By mentioning concentration, meditation and the formless [absorptions] are included.

original: shes rab ces bya ba ni chos rab tu rnam bar 'byed pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab ces bya ba ni chos rab tu rnam bar 'byed pa'o //
translated: Wisdom is the thorough analysis of things.

original: 'di dag ni bslab pa rnam pa gsum yin te /
analyzed: 'di dag ni bslab pa rnam pa gsum yin te /
translated: These are the three educations.

original: tshul khrims ni lhag pa'i tshul khrims kyi bslab pa'o //
analyzed: tshul khrims ni lhag pa'i tshul khrims kyi bslab pa'o //
translated: Morality is the education of superior morality.

original: ting nge 'dzin ni lhag pa'i sems kyi bslab pa'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin ni lhag pa'i sems kyi bslab pa'o //
translated: Concentration is the education of superior mind.

original: shes rab ni lhag pa'i shes rab kyi bslab pa ste /
analyzed: shes rab ni lhag pa'i shes rab kyi bslab pa ste /
translated: Wisdom is the education of superior wisdom.

original: bslab pa de lta bu la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams la ni rnam par grol ba gsal bar 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: bslab pa de lta bu la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams la ni rnam par grol ba gsal bar 'gyur zhing /
translated: For yogis who abide in such training, liberation becomes clear.

original: 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams las sems rnam par grol bas na sems rnam par grol ba'o //
analyzed: 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams las sems rnam par grol bas na sems rnam par grol ba'o //
translated: Since their minds are liberated from afflictions such as attachment, they are liberated minds.

original: sems rnam par grol ba rnams ni rnam par grol ba'o zhes ye shes mthong ba la 'jug pas na rnam par grol ba dang / ye shes mthong ba ni rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba ste /
analyzed: sems rnam par grol ba rnams ni rnam par grol ba'o zhes ye shes mthong ba la 'jug pas na rnam par grol ba dang / ye shes mthong ba ni rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba ste /
translated: Those with liberated minds are liberated. Since they engage the wisdom of seeing, they are liberated. The wisdom of seeing liberation is the wisdom of seeing liberation.

original: 'di dag ni zag pa med pa'i phung po lnga zhes bshad do //
analyzed: 'di dag ni zag pa med pa'i phung po lnga zhes bshad do //
translated: These are explained as the five uncontaminated aggregates.

original: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba zhes bya ba ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba zhes bya ba ni bshad zin to //
translated: The turning of the wheel of Dharma has already been explained.

original: sems can gyi don bya ba la zhes pa la /
analyzed: sems can gyi don bya ba la zhes pa la /
translated: Regarding the performance of the welfare of sentient beings,

original: las dang nyon mongs pa'i dbang gis 'khor bar chags pa'i phyir na sems can no //
analyzed: las dang nyon mongs pa'i dbang gis 'khor bar chags pa'i phyir na sems can no //
translated: sentient beings are so called because they are attached to saṃsāra through the power of karma and afflictions.

original: de rnams kyi gang 'dod cing don du gnyer ba de byed pa ni sems can gyi don bya ba'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi gang 'dod cing don du gnyer ba de byed pa ni sems can gyi don bya ba'o //
translated: Performing the welfare of those who desire and strive for that is the performance of the welfare of sentient beings.

original: bsams pa'i don myur du byed pas thob par byed pas na thabs te /🔽shes rab kyi khyad par 'ga' zhig la bya la /
analyzed: bsams pa'i don myur du byed pas thob par byed pas na thabs te / shes rab kyi khyad par 'ga' zhig la bya la /

analyzed: thabs chen po zhes bya ba ni thabs kyang yin la chen po yang yin pas na thabs chen po'o //
