original: khams sna tshogs pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / @31b thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / mngon par shes pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / mos pa sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / smon lam mkhyen pa'i stobs ni bcu pa'o //
analyzed: khams sna tshogs pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / @31b thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / mngon par shes pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / mos pa sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / smon lam mkhyen pa'i stobs ni bcu pa'o //
translated: The power of knowing the various elements, the power of knowing the paths that lead everywhere, the power of knowing miracles and superknowledges, the power of knowing the various aspirations, and the power of knowing the vows—these are the ten.

original: sku'i stobs kyang tshad med pa yin par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: sku'i stobs kyang tshad med pa yin par shes par bya'o //
translated: The power of the body should be understood as immeasurable.

original: brtson 'grus ni dge ba'i chos rnams la spro ste /🔽brtson 'grus 'ba' zhig grogs gyur pas //🔽go 'phang bla na med pa brnyes //
analyzed: brtson 'grus ni dge ba'i chos rnams la spro ste / brtson 'grus 'ba' zhig grogs gyur pas // go 'phang bla na med pa brnyes //
translated: Vigor is enthusiasm for virtuous dharmas.

original: zhes ji skad bshad pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: zhes ji skad bshad pa lta bu'o //
translated: As it is said:🔽“The unsurpassed state is attained🔽through vigor alone as a companion.”

original: ye shes kyang yin la chen po yang yin pas ye shes chen po ste /
analyzed: ye shes kyang yin la chen po yang yin pas ye shes chen po ste /
translated: It is great intuition, because it is intuition and it is great.

original: don thams cad la khyab pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la bya bar gzung ste /
analyzed: don thams cad la khyab pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la bya bar gzung ste /
translated: It is the intuition of omniscience, because it pervades all objects.

original: de lta bu'i yon tan dang ldan pa'i rdo rje ni dam tshig ces bya ba'i sgrar bshad do //
analyzed: de lta bu'i yon tan dang ldan pa'i rdo rje ni dam tshig ces bya ba'i sgrar bshad do //
translated: The vajra that possesses such qualities is explained by the term “commitment.”

original: de yang ci'i phyir byin zhes rtog pa la sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas gang gi phyir stsal ba de ston pa yin te /
analyzed: de yang ci'i phyir byin zhes rtog pa la sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas gang gi phyir stsal ba de ston pa yin te /
translated: This shows why he gave.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa rnams su sems can gyi khams lus pa med pa yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir zhes pa ste /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa rnams su sems can gyi khams lus pa med pa yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir zhes pa ste /
translated: In order to protect the entire realm of sentient beings without exception in all worldly realms means

original: yongs su zhes kun nas bskyab pa'i phyir yongs su bskyab pa ste /🔽ngan 'gro dang 'khor ba'i nyon mongs pa'i dgra rnams las sems can gyi khams te /
analyzed: yongs su zhes kun nas bskyab pa'i phyir yongs su bskyab pa ste / ngan 'gro dang 'khor ba'i nyon mongs pa'i dgra rnams las sems can gyi khams te /
translated: entire means completely. Protect means to protect completely.🔽The realm of sentient beings means the class of sentient beings.

original: sems can gyi rigs yongs su skyob cing skyong ba'i don gyis na yongs su bskyab pa'o //
analyzed: sems can gyi rigs yongs su skyob cing skyong ba'i don gyis na yongs su bskyab pa'o //
translated: It is protected because it is completely protected and cared for from the enemies of the lower realms and the afflictions of cyclic existence.

original: ci don gyi bya ba 'di tsam 'ba' zhig mdzad dam zhe na /
analyzed: ci don gyi bya ba 'di tsam 'ba' zhig mdzad dam zhe na /
translated: Does he perform only this much activity for their sake?🔽 He says to be the lord of all

original: thams cad kyi dbang por bya ba dang zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: thams cad kyi dbang por bya ba dang zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: because he acts as the lord of all.🔽

original: thams cad du bdag por mdzad pas na thams cad kyi dbang por bya ba ste /
analyzed: thams cad du bdag por mdzad pas na thams cad kyi dbang por bya ba ste /
translated: To be the lord of all means to be the lord of all.

original: bla na med pa'i chos kyi rgyal po thob par mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: bla na med pa'i chos kyi rgyal po thob par mdzad pa'o //
translated: He has attained the sovereignty of the unexcelled Dharma.

original: thams cad kyi bdag por mdzad pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi gzhan yang thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba myong bar bya ba zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: thams cad kyi bdag por mdzad pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi gzhan yang thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba myong bar bya ba zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Not only does he act as the lord of all, but he also experiences the happiness and well-being of all.

original: bde ba dang yid bde ba ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa ste /
analyzed: bde ba dang yid bde ba ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa ste /
translated: Happiness and well-being are mundane and supramundane.

original: de myong bar bya ba ni kun du tshor bar bya ba'o //
analyzed: de myong bar bya ba ni kun du tshor bar bya ba'o //
translated: To experience them is to feel them all.

original: 'dis ni nyid kyi don yongs su rdzogs par bya ba bstan pa yin la /
analyzed: 'dis ni nyid kyi don yongs su rdzogs par bya ba bstan pa yin la /
translated: This shows the fulfillment of his own aim.

original: snga mas ni gzhan gyi don yongs su rdzogs par bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: snga mas ni gzhan gyi don yongs su rdzogs par bstan pa yin no //
translated: The previous verse shows the fulfillment of others' aims.

original: ji skad du smos pa'i yon tan rnams ma lus par smras pa ma yin pas na bar du zhes pa'i sgras ni ma smras pa'i phan yon rnams yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: ji skad du smos pa'i yon tan rnams ma lus par smras pa ma yin pas na bar du zhes pa'i sgras ni ma smras pa'i phan yon rnams yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir te /
translated: Since he does not speak of all the qualities mentioned, the word et cetera indicates the benefits that are not mentioned.

original: yon tan de rnams dang sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa dang / dran pa nye bar @32a * //
analyzed: yon tan de rnams dang sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa dang / dran pa nye bar @32a * //
translated: Those qualities, the stages, the perfections, the close mindfulness, the correct exertions, the bases of supernatural power, the faculties, the powers, the branches of enlightenment, and the branches of the path, are the ten topics.

original: gzhag pa nas ji srid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes mngon par shes pa'i mthar thug gi bar 'di ni bla na med pa'i theg pa chen po'o //
analyzed: gzhag pa nas ji srid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes mngon par shes pa'i mthar thug gi bar 'di ni bla na med pa'i theg pa chen po'o //
translated: This is the unsurpassed Great Vehicle, from the placement of the vajra up to the culmination of the superknowledges of the gnosis of the equality of all the tathāgatas.

original: de'i yon tan gyi tshogs ma lus pa 'di mngon par rtogs pa ni thugs su chud pa ste /
analyzed: de'i yon tan gyi tshogs ma lus pa 'di mngon par rtogs pa ni thugs su chud pa ste /
translated: The full realization of this entire collection of qualities is the understanding.

original: de nyid ni dngos grub kyi mchog go //
analyzed: de nyid ni dngos grub kyi mchog go //
translated: That itself is the supreme attainment.

original: de thob pa ni rnyed pa'o //
analyzed: de thob pa ni rnyed pa'o //
translated: The attainment of that is the acquisition.

original: de nyid ni 'bras bu ste de dag gi phyir rdo rje ste byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun du bzang po'i sngar bsgrub pa'i lag par sbyin no zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: de nyid ni 'bras bu ste de dag gi phyir rdo rje ste byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun du bzang po'i sngar bsgrub pa'i lag par sbyin no zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: That itself is the fruit. For that reason, the vajra is given into the hand of the great bodhisattva Samantabhadra, who was previously established.

original: gang gi dbang du mdzad nas rdo rje de de la byin zhe na /🔽de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor los sgyur ba nyid du zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: gang gi dbang du mdzad nas rdo rje de de la byin zhe na / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor los sgyur ba nyid du zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: With regard to whom was that vajra given?🔽The statement “in order to turn the wheel of all the tathāgatas” is made.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo yin pas na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo yin pas na /
translated: Because it is the wheel of all the tathāgatas,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo ste 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo ste 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: the wheel of all the Tathagatas, that is, the circle of the retinue.

original: de bsgyur ba'i ngang tshul mnga' bas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor los sgyur ba ste /
analyzed: de bsgyur ba'i ngang tshul mnga' bas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor los sgyur ba ste /
translated: He is the universal monarch of all the Tathagatas because he has the nature of turning that.

original: bsgyur ba ni sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis rim bzhin du sprul pa'o //
analyzed: bsgyur ba ni sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis rim bzhin du sprul pa'o //
translated: Turning means the transformation by the Buddha's blessing.

original: de'i ngo bo nyid yin pas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor los sgyur ba nyid do //
analyzed: de'i ngo bo nyid yin pas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor los sgyur ba nyid do //
translated: He is the universal monarch of all the Tathagatas because he has the nature of that.

original: de'i dbang du mdzad nas zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de'i dbang du mdzad nas zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: With reference to that, it is said.

original: ci zhig mdzad nas she na /🔽yid bzhin gyi zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: ci zhig mdzad nas she na / yid bzhin gyi zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: What did he do?

original: de dbang bskur ba ni bskur sti bya ba'o //
analyzed: de dbang bskur ba ni bskur sti bya ba'o //
translated: He conferred the consecration, that is, the honor.

original: ci zhig gis dbang bskur zhe na /🔽de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku zhes bya ba la gsungs te /
analyzed: ci zhig gis dbang bskur zhe na / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku zhes bya ba la gsungs te /
translated: By what was he consecrated?🔽By the body of all the Tathagatas.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku yin pas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku yin pas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku ste /
translated: He is the body of all the Tathagatas because he is the body of all the Tathagatas.

original: de nyid rin po che yin pas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku rin po che ste /
analyzed: de nyid rin po che yin pas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku rin po che ste /
translated: Since that is a precious gem, it is the precious body of all tathāgatas.

original: de ni dbu rgyan yin pas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku rin po che'i dbu rgyan te des dbang bskur ba'o //
analyzed: de ni dbu rgyan yin pas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku rin po che'i dbu rgyan te des dbang bskur ba'o //
translated: Since that is a crown, it is the precious crown of all tathāgatas, and it is the empowerment conferred by that.

original: de 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi cod pan bcings pas kyang dbang bskur ba ste /
analyzed: de 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi cod pan bcings pas kyang dbang bskur ba ste /
translated: Not only that, one is also empowered by tying on the diadem.

original: cod pan ni zheng du khru gang chur ni khru nyi shu rtsa lnga'i dar dkar po ste /
analyzed: cod pan ni zheng du khru gang chur ni khru nyi shu rtsa lnga'i dar dkar po ste /
translated: The diadem is a white silk cloth one cubit wide and twenty-five cubits long.

original: des mgo la dbu rgyan du rtsa bar ze'u ka mang du dkris la ngos gnyis kyi rna ba'i steng du bcug ste /
analyzed: des mgo la dbu rgyan du rtsa bar ze'u ka mang du dkris la ngos gnyis kyi rna ba'i steng du bcug ste /
translated: With that, tie the crown many times at the base of the head and insert it above the ears on both sides.

original: gyen du sor bzhi tsam phyung nas nam mkha' lding gi gshog pa lta bur byas la /
analyzed: gyen du sor bzhi tsam phyung nas nam mkha' lding gi gshog pa lta bur byas la /
translated: Having extended it upward four fingerbreadths, make it like the wings of a garuḍa.

original: lhag ma'i mtha' ma byin pa la thug gi bar du brkyang ba ni cod pan bcing ba ste des dbang bskur nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams @32b cad kyi zhes bya ba rnam par snang mdzad kyis bsgrubs pa'i phyir dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' ste /
analyzed: lhag ma'i mtha' ma byin pa la thug gi bar du brkyang ba ni cod pan bcing ba ste des dbang bskur nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams @32b cad kyi zhes bya ba rnam par snang mdzad kyis bsgrubs pa'i phyir dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' ste /
translated: The remaining extension up to the bestowal of the diadem is the empowerment. Having empowered him, all the Tathagatas, i.e., Vairochana, accomplish him, and the Vajrasattva of all the Tathagatas.

original: des bsgrubs pas 'og nas bshad pa rnams kyi rdo rje de las grub pas na de ni grub pa'i rdo rje zhes bya'o //
analyzed: des bsgrubs pas 'og nas bshad pa rnams kyi rdo rje de las grub pas na de ni grub pa'i rdo rje zhes bya'o //
translated: Since he is accomplished by that, the vajra of those to be explained below is accomplished from that vajra, and therefore it is called the accomplished vajra.

original: de zhes bya ba ni sngar bsgrubs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang 'brel pa ste byang chub sems dpa' chen po de'i lag tu byin pa'o //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni sngar bsgrubs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang 'brel pa ste byang chub sems dpa' chen po de'i lag tu byin pa'o //
translated: That refers to the previously accomplished one who is connected with all the Tathagatas, and he is given into the hand of that great being.

original: lag par zhes bya ba 'dis ni rje sar bya ba bstan te /
analyzed: lag par zhes bya ba 'dis ni rje sar bya ba bstan te /
translated: By this “in the hand” it shows the service to be done,

original: sems dpa' rin po che de la 'jig rten pa rnams gus pa bskyed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sems dpa' rin po che de la 'jig rten pa rnams gus pa bskyed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the worldly ones generate respect for that jewel being.

original: 'di yang rdo rje'i dbang bskur ba ste gsum pa'o //
analyzed: 'di yang rdo rje'i dbang bskur ba ste gsum pa'o //
translated: This is also a vajra empowerment, the third.

original: de'i rjes thogs la de la dbang bskur ba gang zhig byin zhe na /
analyzed: de'i rjes thogs la de la dbang bskur ba gang zhig byin zhe na /
translated: What is the consecration that was conferred upon him?

original: ming gi dbang bskur ro zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: ming gi dbang bskur ro zhes gsungs te /
translated: The consecration of the name.

original: phyag na rdo rje mnga' bas na phyag na rdo rje ste /
analyzed: phyag na rdo rje mnga' bas na phyag na rdo rje ste /
translated: Vajrapani is so called because he holds a vajra in his hand.

original: 'dis ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis ming gi dbang bskur ba yin no //🔽de nas zhes bya ba ni de'i rjes thogs la ste /
analyzed: 'dis ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis ming gi dbang bskur ba yin no // de nas zhes bya ba ni de'i rjes thogs la ste /
translated: This is the consecration of the name by all the Tathagatas.🔽Then, immediately after that, what did the Bodhisattva-Mahasattva

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i rjes thogs nyid la ci zhig mdzad ce na /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i rjes thogs nyid la ci zhig mdzad ce na /
translated: Vajrapani do immediately after the consecration?

original: g-yon pa rdo rje bsgyings pa gsor ba nyid kyis phyag g-yas pas rdo rje de nyid kyi thugs kar gtod pa'i tshul du 'dzin cing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: g-yon pa rdo rje bsgyings pa gsor ba nyid kyis phyag g-yas pas rdo rje de nyid kyi thugs kar gtod pa'i tshul du 'dzin cing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: He brandished the vajra in his left hand, and with his right hand he took hold of the vajra at his heart, as if to indicate it, and uttered this utterance.

original: g-yon pa rdo rje zhes bya ba ni g-yon gyi rdo rje khu tshur ro //
analyzed: g-yon pa rdo rje zhes bya ba ni g-yon gyi rdo rje khu tshur ro //
translated: The vajra in the left means the vajra fist in the left hand.

original: de'i bsgyings pa ni mngon pa'i nga rgyal can du ston pa ste /
analyzed: de'i bsgyings pa ni mngon pa'i nga rgyal can du ston pa ste /
translated: Its brandishing is the display of its arrogance.

original: 'khor los sgyur ba'i dbang thob pas zla med par ston pa dang / 'jig rten gsum po gang gis kyang bdag zil gyis mi non pa'o //
analyzed: 'khor los sgyur ba'i dbang thob pas zla med par ston pa dang / 'jig rten gsum po gang gis kyang bdag zil gyis mi non pa'o //
translated: Since he has obtained the power of a universal monarch, he is shown to be unrivaled, and the three worlds are not able to overpower him.

original: ji lta zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: dper na 'khor los sgyur ba rang gi yul na zla med par ston pa dang 'dra'o //
analyzed: dper na 'khor los sgyur ba rang gi yul na zla med par ston pa dang 'dra'o //
translated: For example, a universal monarch is shown to be unrivaled in his own realm.

original: gsor ba ni g-yon pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur de sta zur gyi g-yon phyogs su bzhag la dkur 'degs pa ste /
analyzed: gsor ba ni g-yon pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur de sta zur gyi g-yon phyogs su bzhag la dkur 'degs pa ste /
translated: Throwing means that the left vajra fist is placed on the left side of the hip and held there.

original: lhas byin la sogs pa gzhan 'ga' zhig kyang rdo rje sems dpa'i dbang gis dbang bskur la /
analyzed: lhas byin la sogs pa gzhan 'ga' zhig kyang rdo rje sems dpa'i dbang gis dbang bskur la /
translated: Some others, such as Devadatta, are empowered by the empowerment of Vajrasattva.

original: des kyang 'di ltar sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje la lhag par mos nas gnas na 'jig rten gsum gyis kyang lung bsgo ba spyi bos len par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des kyang 'di ltar sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje la lhag par mos nas gnas na 'jig rten gsum gyis kyang lung bsgo ba spyi bos len par 'gyur ro //
translated: If they also abide with such conviction in the vajra body, speech, and mind, the three worlds will accept the prophecy on their heads.

original: phyag g-yon pa'i rdo rje bsgyings pa gsor ba ni phyag g-yon pa'i rdo rje bsgyings pa gsor ba ste de ngo bo nyid yin pas na g-yon pa'i rdo rje bsgyings pas gsor ba nyid yin la de'i rgyur gyur pas rdo rje phyag g-yas pas nyid kyi thugs @33a
analyzed: phyag g-yon pa'i rdo rje bsgyings pa gsor ba ni phyag g-yon pa'i rdo rje bsgyings pa gsor ba ste de ngo bo nyid yin pas na g-yon pa'i rdo rje bsgyings pas gsor ba nyid yin la de'i rgyur gyur pas rdo rje phyag g-yas pas nyid kyi thugs @33a
translated: The vajra-fist of the left hand is extended, that is, the vajra-fist of the left hand is extended, and since that is its nature, it is the vajra-fist of the left hand extended.

original: * // kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la 'degs pa'i tshul gyis zhes gyen du 'jog pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par mdzad cing 'jog pa ste /
analyzed: * // kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la 'degs pa'i tshul gyis zhes gyen du 'jog pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par mdzad cing 'jog pa ste /
translated: The right hand is the cause of that, and the right hand holds the vajra at the heart, on a moon-disk, in the manner of uplifting, that is, in the manner of holding it up.

original: de ltar 'jog pa 'dis bde ba dang yid bde ba thob par ston pa dang / bdag nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa nyid du ston pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar 'jog pa 'dis bde ba dang yid bde ba thob par ston pa dang / bdag nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa nyid du ston pa yin no //
translated: This shows the attainment of bliss and mental bliss, and shows the sealing of oneself with the seal of all the Tathagatas.

original: 'di skad ston te /
analyzed: 'di skad ston te /
translated: This is what is shown.

original: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad zla ba dang rdo rje dang phyag rgya las yongs su grub nas 'jig rten gsum gyi bla mar gyur pa'i bka' las ni 'da' bar bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad zla ba dang rdo rje dang phyag rgya las yongs su grub nas 'jig rten gsum gyi bla mar gyur pa'i bka' las ni 'da' bar bya ba ma yin no //
translated: Just as the Tathāgatas, having been accomplished from the moon, the vajra, and the seal, are not to be transgressed by the command of the guru of the three worlds,

original: de bzhin du bdag kyang de rnams kyi sems dpa'i rdo rje phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa yin pas bdag kyang 'jig rten gsum gyi bla ma yin pas /
analyzed: de bzhin du bdag kyang de rnams kyi sems dpa'i rdo rje phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa yin pas bdag kyang 'jig rten gsum gyi bla ma yin pas /
translated: in the same way, I too am sealed by the seal of the mind vajra of those [Tathāgatas]. Therefore, I too am the guru of the three worlds.

original: de'i bsgo ba yang sems can thams cad kyis 'da' bar mi bya ba yin no //
analyzed: de'i bsgo ba yang sems can thams cad kyis 'da' bar mi bya ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, his command is also not to be transgressed by any sentient being.

original: gang sems can gzhan dag gis kyang phyag rgya 'di dag yang dag par rang gi snying ga'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la shin tu bsgom par byas nas /
analyzed: gang sems can gzhan dag gis kyang phyag rgya 'di dag yang dag par rang gi snying ga'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la shin tu bsgom par byas nas /
translated: If others too, having thoroughly cultivated these seals in their own moon maṇḍala at the heart,

original: de yang 'jig rten gsum gyi bla mar 'gyur zhing lung bsgo ba tsam gyis kyang 'jig rten gsum dbang du byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de yang 'jig rten gsum gyi bla mar 'gyur zhing lung bsgo ba tsam gyis kyang 'jig rten gsum dbang du byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: they too will become the guru of the three worlds, and merely by giving the prophecy, they will bring the three worlds under control.

original: phyag rgya de de ltar 'dzin cing 'di ci zhig mdzad ce na /
analyzed: phyag rgya de de ltar 'dzin cing 'di ci zhig mdzad ce na /
translated: How does one hold that seal and what does one do with it?

original: ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do zhes gsungs te /
translated: This is the expression of the declaration.

original: ched kar brjod pas na ched du brjod pa ste /
analyzed: ched kar brjod pas na ched du brjod pa ste /
translated: It is a declaration because it is declared.

original: thugs la mnga' ba'i don ma zhus kyang brjod pa ni ched du brjod pa'o zhes ston pa yin no //
analyzed: thugs la mnga' ba'i don ma zhus kyang brjod pa ni ched du brjod pa'o zhes ston pa yin no //
translated: It is a declaration because it is expressed even though the meaning that is possessed is not requested.

original: 'di zhes bya ba ni phyag gi mthil na gnas pa'o //
analyzed: 'di zhes bya ba ni phyag gi mthil na gnas pa'o //
translated: This is the one that is located in the palm of the hand.

original: de zhes bya ba ni gang las bdag sngar skyes pa'o //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni gang las bdag sngar skyes pa'o //
translated: That is the one from which I was born previously.

original: su zhig gi 'di zhe na /
analyzed: su zhig gi 'di zhe na /
translated: Whose is this?

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi zhes bya ba gsungs so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi zhes bya ba gsungs so //
translated: The text states, “of all the buddhas.”

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi ci zhig ce na /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi ci zhig ce na /
translated: What of all the buddhas?

original: grub pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: grub pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: The text states, “the vajra of achievement.”

original: dngos kyi don gyi rdo rje ni grub pa'i rdo rje'o //
analyzed: dngos kyi don gyi rdo rje ni grub pa'i rdo rje'o //
translated: The vajra of the actual meaning is the vajra of achievement.

original: rdo rje grub pa gzhan rnams kyis kyang grub pa'i rdo rje srid do zhe na /
analyzed: rdo rje grub pa gzhan rnams kyis kyang grub pa'i rdo rje srid do zhe na /
translated: If it is asked whether the vajra of achievement is also achieved by other achievements,

original: de las khyad par du bya ba'i phyir bla na med pa zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de las khyad par du bya ba'i phyir bla na med pa zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: in order to distinguish it, the text states, “unsurpassed.”

original: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi rdo rje yin gyi /
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi rdo rje yin gyi /
translated: It is the vajra of the gnosis of omniscience.

original: tha mal pa ma yin no zhes ston pa yin no //
analyzed: tha mal pa ma yin no zhes ston pa yin no //
translated: This shows that it is not ordinary.

original: bdag ste zhes bya ba 'dis ni rdo rje 'di dang bdag la tha dad du bya ba med de /
analyzed: bdag ste zhes bya ba 'dis ni rdo rje 'di dang bdag la tha dad du bya ba med de /
translated: By I, he shows that there is no difference between this vajra and I,

original: de las skyes pa'i phyir zhes ston te /
analyzed: de las skyes pa'i phyir zhes ston te /
translated: because it is born from that.

original: de gang gi lag tu byin zhe na /
analyzed: de gang gi lag tu byin zhe na /
translated: In whose hand is it given?

original: bdag gi lag tu byin zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: bdag gi lag tu byin zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: He says, in my hand,

original: 'di las tha mi dad pas so //
analyzed: 'di las tha mi dad pas so //
translated: because there is no difference from this.

original: de nyid kyi phyir /🔽rdo rje la ni rdo rje gnas //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir / rdo rje la ni rdo rje gnas //
translated: For that very reason,

original: zhes bya ba gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs so //
translated: he says, The vajra is in the vajra.

original: sems @33b dpa'i rdo rje la phyag rgya'i rdo rje gnas pa'o //
analyzed: sems @33b dpa'i rdo rje la phyag rgya'i rdo rje gnas pa'o //
translated: The seal-vajra is in the bodhisattva-vajra.

original: 'di skad ston te /🔽bdag gang yin pa de ni bdag gi phyag rgya yin la /
analyzed: 'di skad ston te / bdag gang yin pa de ni bdag gi phyag rgya yin la /
translated: This is what is shown.🔽That which is I is my seal,

original: bdag gi phyag rgya gang yin pa de ni bdag yin no zhes ston to //
analyzed: bdag gi phyag rgya gang yin pa de ni bdag yin no zhes ston to //
translated: and that which is my seal is I.

original: ji ltar ting nge 'dzin 'di la snying po bskyed pa dang / snying po las phyag rgya'i dbye ba bskyed pa dang / phyag rgya bsdus pa las spro ba dang / bsdu ba dang / rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag na gnas pa dang / de las 'od zer byung ba dang /🔽de rnams las sangs rgyas kyi sku bskyed pa dang / de rnams kyis kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad nas /
analyzed: ji ltar ting nge 'dzin 'di la snying po bskyed pa dang / snying po las phyag rgya'i dbye ba bskyed pa dang / phyag rgya bsdus pa las spro ba dang / bsdu ba dang / rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag na gnas pa dang / de las 'od zer byung ba dang / de rnams las sangs rgyas kyi sku bskyed pa dang / de rnams kyis kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad nas /
translated: Just as in this samādhi, the essence is generated, from the essence the divisions of the mudrā are generated, from the condensed mudrā emanation, from the dissolution the Vairocana in the hand, from that the light rays arise,🔽from those the buddha bodies are generated, and those also perform the deeds of a buddha in all world systems,🔽and having dissolved again, they become the form of the bodhisattva and remain in the form of the buddha, and they utter the declaration, and they remain on their seats, and again they are empowered by samādhi, and the mudrā is given,

original: slar 'dus te sems dpa'i gzugs su gyur nas sangs rgyas kyi gzugs su gnas pa dang / ched du brjod pa gsung pa dang // nyid kyi gdan la bzhugs pa dang / yang ting nge 'dzin gyis dbang bskur ba dang / phyag rgya byin pa dang /
analyzed: slar 'dus te sems dpa'i gzugs su gyur nas sangs rgyas kyi gzugs su gnas pa dang / ched du brjod pa gsung pa dang // nyid kyi gdan la bzhugs pa dang / yang ting nge 'dzin gyis dbang bskur ba dang / phyag rgya byin pa dang /

original: ming btags pa dang / nyid kyi phyag rgya'i las bstan pa dang / yang ched du brjod pa gsungs pa bzhin du 'og nas 'byung ba'i sems dpa' bco lnga la yang gal te kha cig tu gzhung mangs kyis dogs nas cung zad las ma smos mod kyi /
analyzed: ming btags pa dang / nyid kyi phyag rgya'i las bstan pa dang / yang ched du brjod pa gsungs pa bzhin du 'og nas 'byung ba'i sems dpa' bco lnga la yang gal te kha cig tu gzhung mangs kyis dogs nas cung zad las ma smos mod kyi /
translated: In the same way, although in some places below, fearing prolixity, I have not written more than a little about the fifteen heroes that occur,

original: de lta na yang don gyi go rims 'di ji lta ba bzhin du rgyas par khong du chud par bya'o //
analyzed: de lta na yang don gyi go rims 'di ji lta ba bzhin du rgyas par khong du chud par bya'o //
translated: nevertheless, one should understand the order of the meaning in this way in detail.

original: dkyil 'khor du gdul bya rnams kyi byang chub kyi sems yang dag par sbyang ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub kyi sems ni rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du bzhag pa yin no //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor du gdul bya rnams kyi byang chub kyi sems yang dag par sbyang ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub kyi sems ni rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du bzhag pa yin no //
translated: In order to purify the thought of enlightenment of the disciples in the mandala, the thought of enlightenment of all the transcendent lords is established as Vajrasattva.

original: byang chub tu sems bskyed nas ni sems can rnams bsdu dgos pas de'i thabs su gyur pa bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi'i ngo bo nyid kyi sems dpa'i snying po dang / phyag rgya la sogs pa bskyed par bya ba'i phyir de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: byang chub tu sems bskyed nas ni sems can rnams bsdu dgos pas de'i thabs su gyur pa bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi'i ngo bo nyid kyi sems dpa'i snying po dang / phyag rgya la sogs pa bskyed par bya ba'i phyir de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Having generated the Thought of Enlightenment, one must gather sentient beings, so for the sake of that, in order to generate the essence of the Bodhisattva, the nature of the four means of gathering, and the seals, etc., he says, “Then, etc.”

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni bshad zin to //
translated: “ Then, the Lord” has been explained.

original: yang zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya gzhan bskyed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yang zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya gzhan bskyed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: “ Again” is for the sake of generating another seal.

original: gdon mi za ba zhes bya ba ni rang gi las rnams la don yod par mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: gdon mi za ba zhes bya ba ni rang gi las rnams la don yod par mdzad pa'o //
translated: “ Unfailing” means that one’s actions are meaningful.

original: las de nyid kyis gzhan rnams las bdag por gyur pa'i phyir rgyal po ste /
analyzed: las de nyid kyis gzhan rnams las bdag por gyur pa'i phyir rgyal po ste /
translated: By that very action, one becomes the master of others, so he is a king.

original: gdon mi za ba yang yin la rgyal po yang yin pas na gdon mi za ba'i rgyal po'o //
analyzed: gdon mi za ba yang yin la rgyal po yang yin pas na gdon mi za ba'i rgyal po'o //
translated: Since he is both unfailing and a king, he is the unfailing king.

original: gdon mi za ba'i rgyal po yang yin la byang chub sems dpa' chen po yang yin pas na /
analyzed: gdon mi za ba'i rgyal po yang yin la byang chub sems dpa' chen po yang yin pas na /
translated: Since he is the unfailing king and a great Bodhisattva,

original: byang chub sems dpa' chen po gdon mi za ba'i rgyal po ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' chen po gdon mi za ba'i rgyal po ste /
translated: The great bodhisattva is the king who is invincible.

original: byang chub kyi sems @34a * //
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems @34a * //
translated: The thought of enlightenment

original: zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: is the meaning of the word bodhicitta.

original: de'i dam tshig ni snying po dang phyag rgya la sogs pa la byang chub sems dpa' chen po gdon mi za ba'i rgyal po'i dam tshig ces bya'o //
analyzed: de'i dam tshig ni snying po dang phyag rgya la sogs pa la byang chub sems dpa' chen po gdon mi za ba'i rgyal po'i dam tshig ces bya'o //
translated: The commitment of that is the commitment of the great bodhisattva who is the king who is invincible, in the essence-mantra, the seal, etc.

original: de gang las byung ba'i sems dpa'i khyad par gang yin pa de ni byung ba'i sems dpa' ste /
analyzed: de gang las byung ba'i sems dpa'i khyad par gang yin pa de ni byung ba'i sems dpa' ste /
translated: The bodhisattva who is the source of that is the source bodhisattva.

original: de byin gyis brlab cing brtan par bya ba'i phyir rdo rje ste don dang mthun pa'i ming 'di nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa'i ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par bzhugs pa ni mngon sum du mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: de byin gyis brlab cing brtan par bya ba'i phyir rdo rje ste don dang mthun pa'i ming 'di nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa'i ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par bzhugs pa ni mngon sum du mdzad pa'o //
translated: The vajra of that is the vajra of the consecration and the stabilization of that. This very vajra of the consecration and the stabilization of that is the name of the samadhi that is in accord with the meaning. To enter into that samadhi is to actualize it.

original: spyan drang ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba ni spyan drang pa la dam tshig yin pas na spyan drang ba'i dam tshig ste /
analyzed: spyan drang ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba ni spyan drang pa la dam tshig yin pas na spyan drang ba'i dam tshig ste /
translated: The commitment of the invocation is the commitment in the invocation.

original: bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi'i ngo bo nyid do //
analyzed: bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi'i ngo bo nyid do //
translated: It is the nature of the four means of gathering disciples.

original: dam tshig gi sgra ni 'dir spyan 'dren pa'i snying po dang / phyag rgya nyid la ming 'di skad ces bya ba nyid yin te /
analyzed: dam tshig gi sgra ni 'dir spyan 'dren pa'i snying po dang / phyag rgya nyid la ming 'di skad ces bya ba nyid yin te /
translated: The term “pledge” here is the essence of the invocation, and the very name of the seal.

original: sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to bring all sentient beings to full maturity,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs la gnas pas na 'di'i yon tan la ming de skad ces btags pa yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs la gnas pas na 'di'i yon tan la ming de skad ces btags pa yin no //
translated: it abides in the mind of all the tathāgatas, and so this quality is named.

original: 'di zhes bya ba ni thugs la gnas pa'o //
analyzed: 'di zhes bya ba ni thugs la gnas pa'o //
translated: “This” means that it abides in the mind.

original: bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid de zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid de zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: “That very Bhagavān Vajrapāṇi” and so forth.

original: gang sngar kun du bzang po nyid du bshad pa de nyid kyi phyag na rdo rje rab tu gnas pas na phyag na rdo rje zhes bya'o //
analyzed: gang sngar kun du bzang po nyid du bshad pa de nyid kyi phyag na rdo rje rab tu gnas pas na phyag na rdo rje zhes bya'o //
translated: That which was previously explained as Samantabhadra is the very one who is present as Vajrapāṇi, and so he is called “Vajrapāṇi.”

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi lcags kyu chen po zhes bya ba ni las dang rjes su mthun par phyag rgya'i sprul pa bstan pa yin te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi lcags kyu chen po zhes bya ba ni las dang rjes su mthun par phyag rgya'i sprul pa bstan pa yin te /
translated: “The great hook of all tathāgatas” is the display of the emanation of the seal in accordance with the activity.

original: de bzhin du ting nge 'dzin des byin gyi rlabs kyi dbang dang smon lam dang ye shes kyi dbang gis gcig tu 'dus par gyur te byung nas bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag gnyis su gnas par gyur pa ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du ting nge 'dzin des byin gyi rlabs kyi dbang dang smon lam dang ye shes kyi dbang gis gcig tu 'dus par gyur te byung nas bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag gnyis su gnas par gyur pa ste /
translated: Likewise, through the power of the transformation of that meditative concentration, through the power of his prayers and his pristine wisdom, they all came together and arose, and they came to rest in the two hands of the Lord.

original: de la gnas zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de la gnas zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of “came to rest” is that they came to rest there.

original: spyan drang pa la sogs pa zhes smos pa ni 'di'i phrin las spyan drang ba gtso bo yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: spyan drang pa la sogs pa zhes smos pa ni 'di'i phrin las spyan drang ba gtso bo yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: The phrase “and so forth” refers to the activity of summoning, because that is the principal activity here.

original: spyan drang ba ni bod pa'o //
analyzed: spyan drang ba ni bod pa'o //
translated: Summoning is inviting.

original: de yang snga ma ni byang chub kyi sems yang dag par sbyang ba gtso bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de yang snga ma ni byang chub kyi sems yang dag par sbyang ba gtso bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Moreover, the former is principal in purifying the spirit of enlightenment.

original: sangs rgyas rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul yin pas na sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul yin pas na sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul te /
translated: Since it is the magical power of the buddhas, it is the magical power of all the buddhas.

original: nam mkha' la 'gro ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: nam mkha' la 'gro ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: It is the ability to travel through space, and so forth.

original: sems kyi 'byor pa la mnga' brnyes zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: sems kyi 'byor pa la mnga' brnyes zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of “having attained mastery over the mind” is that he has attained mastery over the mind.

original: cho 'phrul ni rnam par 'phrul pa ste /
analyzed: cho 'phrul ni rnam par 'phrul pa ste /
translated: Magical power is a magical transformation.

original: ngo mtshar dpag tu med par ston par mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: ngo mtshar dpag tu med par ston par mdzad pa'o //
translated: He displays the inconceivable.

original: rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul ni rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul te /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul ni rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul te /
translated: The miracles and the marvelous abilities are the miracles and the marvelous abilities.

original: de rnams byas nas so //
analyzed: de rnams byas nas so //
translated: Having performed those,

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin zhes @34b bya ba ni bsam pa'i don chud mi zos pa'i 'bras bur gyur bas na rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba'i don to //🔽gdon mi za ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba ni rab tu gdon mi za bas na shin tu gdon mi za ba'o //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin zhes @34b bya ba ni bsam pa'i don chud mi zos pa'i 'bras bur gyur bas na rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba'i don to // gdon mi za ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba ni rab tu gdon mi za bas na shin tu gdon mi za ba'o //
translated: the samādhi of Vajrasattva is the samādhi of Vajrasattva because it is the result of the non-wastage of the intended meaning.

original: shin tu gdon mi za ba yang yin la rgyal po yang yin pas na shin tu gdon mi za ba'i rgyal po ste /🔽de'i ngo bo nyid ni gdon mi za ba'i rgyal po nyid yin pa'o //
analyzed: shin tu gdon mi za ba yang yin la rgyal po yang yin pas na shin tu gdon mi za ba'i rgyal po ste / de'i ngo bo nyid ni gdon mi za ba'i rgyal po nyid yin pa'o //
translated: The king of inevitability is the king of inevitability because of being extremely inevitable due to being extremely inevitable.

original: shin tu gdon mi za ba'i rgyal po nyid yin pas na rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin to zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: shin tu gdon mi za ba'i rgyal po nyid yin pas na rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin to zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Since he is the king of inevitability, the meaning of the samādhi of Vajrasattva is the samādhi of Vajrasattva.

original: 'dis ni mang po yang 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid gcig pa nyid yin par ston to //
analyzed: 'dis ni mang po yang 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid gcig pa nyid yin par ston to //
translated: This shows that even many are of the same nature as the effect.

original: shin tu brtan pa'i phyir zhes bya ba nyid kyis ni 'dres pa nyid brtan pa ste /
analyzed: shin tu brtan pa'i phyir zhes bya ba nyid kyis ni 'dres pa nyid brtan pa ste /
translated: By the words “because of extreme firmness” he shows that the mixture is firm.

original: de bas na gcig tu 'dres par gyur to zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: de bas na gcig tu 'dres par gyur to zhes gsungs so //
translated: Therefore, he says, “they became one.”

original: gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas ci zhig tu gyur zhe na /
analyzed: gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas ci zhig tu gyur zhe na /
translated: What happened after they became one?

original: de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i lus su gyur nas zhes bya ba gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i lus su gyur nas zhes bya ba gsungs pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, he says, “having become the body of the Bodhisattva.”

original: ae ma'o zhes bya ba ni ngo mtshar du gyur pa ste /🔽gang gi phyir rdo rje las byung ba'i lcags kyu zhes bya ba la 'jig rten na rgyu 'dra ba las 'bras bu 'dra ba nyid du 'byung bar snang na /
analyzed: ae ma'o zhes bya ba ni ngo mtshar du gyur pa ste / gang gi phyir rdo rje las byung ba'i lcags kyu zhes bya ba la 'jig rten na rgyu 'dra ba las 'bras bu 'dra ba nyid du 'byung bar snang na /
translated: “Ah!” is a sense of wonder.

original: 'dir rdo rje las lcags kyu 'byung ba ni 'bras bu mi 'dra bar byung bas ngo mtshar che'o //
analyzed: 'dir rdo rje las lcags kyu 'byung ba ni 'bras bu mi 'dra bar byung bas ngo mtshar che'o //
translated: Since in the world, effects are seen to be similar to their causes, it is a wonder that a hook arises from a vajra, since the effect is dissimilar.

original: 'di skad ston te /
analyzed: 'di skad ston te /
translated: This is what is shown:

original: rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi sems kyi dbang gis 'di dag 'byung bas na /
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi sems kyi dbang gis 'di dag 'byung bas na /
translated: Since these arise by the power of the mind of the yogis,

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi rnal 'byor gyi yul ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o zhes bya ba gsungs pa de ni legs par gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi rnal 'byor gyi yul ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o zhes bya ba gsungs pa de ni legs par gsungs pa yin no //
translated: the statement of the Lord, “The domain of the yogis’ yoga is inconceivable,” is well said.

original: bdag ces bya ba 'dis ni de las byung ba yin pa'i phyir lcags kyu dang tha mi dad pa nyid du ston te /
analyzed: bdag ces bya ba 'dis ni de las byung ba yin pa'i phyir lcags kyu dang tha mi dad pa nyid du ston te /
translated: By the word “self” he shows that it is not different from the hook, because it arises from that.

original: ngo mtshar du gyur pa'i lcags kyu des ngo mtshar ci zhig byed ce na /
analyzed: ngo mtshar du gyur pa'i lcags kyu des ngo mtshar ci zhig byed ce na /
translated: What is the wonder that is done by that wonderful hook?

original: gang gi phyir kun du zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir kun du zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: To show that, he says, “Since the Buddhas, etc.

original: gang gi phyir sangs rgyas ni thams cad du khyab cing kun du son pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang thams cad du khyab pa ltar spyan 'dren pa ni mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir sangs rgyas ni thams cad du khyab cing kun du son pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang thams cad du khyab pa ltar spyan 'dren pa ni mdzad pa'o //
translated: Since the Buddhas, who are all-pervading, are invited, as it were, by the hook of the yogis’ mind, which is all-pervading like the Buddhas, the Buddhas are invited.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ji ltar spyan drang zhe na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ji ltar spyan drang zhe na /
translated: How are the Buddhas invited?

original: rnal 'byor ba rnams kyi sems kyi dbang gis te /
analyzed: rnal 'byor ba rnams kyi sems kyi dbang gis te /
translated: By the power of the mind of the yogis.

original: de'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas nas /
analyzed: de'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas nas /
translated: Abiding in that meditative concentration,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ji ltar lhag par mos par byas pa de lta bu'i rnam pa nyid du byon zhing mthong pa dang / ston par yang mdzad do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ji ltar lhag par mos par byas pa de lta bu'i rnam pa nyid du byon zhing mthong pa dang / ston par yang mdzad do //
translated: the Tathagatas come and are seen in just those forms in which they are imagined, and they also teach.

original: ci'i phyir spyan drang zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir spyan drang zhe na /
translated: Why are they invited?

original: grub pa'i phyir zhes bya ba @35a * //
analyzed: grub pa'i phyir zhes bya ba @35a * //
translated: It is said, “for the sake of accomplishment.”

original: gsungs te / gdul bya rnams kyi mngon par 'dod pa'i don grub par bya ba'i phyir zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gsungs te / gdul bya rnams kyi mngon par 'dod pa'i don grub par bya ba'i phyir zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is: for the sake of accomplishing the aim that is desired by those to be trained.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi g-yas phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi g-yas phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas zhes bya ba la /
translated: Abiding in the lunar disc to the right of all the Tathagatas,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces bya ba'i sgras ni 'dir bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pa gzung ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces bya ba'i sgras ni 'dir bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pa gzung ste /
translated: the word “all the Tathagatas” here refers to Lord Akshobhya.

original: de'i g-yas phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'o //
analyzed: de'i g-yas phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'o //
translated: He abides in the lunar disc to his right.

original: yang zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa' la ltos pa'o //
analyzed: yang zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa' la ltos pa'o //
translated: “Again” refers to Vajrasattva.

original: bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to zhes bya ba ni rang gi las la sbyor bar gsol ba 'debs so zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to zhes bya ba ni rang gi las la sbyor bar gsol ba 'debs so zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The phrase and stood waiting for the command means that they were supplicating him to engage in his own activity.

original: sngar rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs kyi bka' nod pa ni byang chub kyi sems yang dag par sbyang pa'i phyir yin la /
analyzed: sngar rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs kyi bka' nod pa ni byang chub kyi sems yang dag par sbyang pa'i phyir yin la /
translated: Previously, they received the command in the form of Vajrasattva in order to purify the spirit of enlightenment.

original: da ltar ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drang ba'i phyir bka' nod pa yin no //🔽de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan 'dren pa yin pas /
analyzed: da ltar ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drang ba'i phyir bka' nod pa yin no // de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan 'dren pa yin pas /
translated: Now, they receive the command in order to summon all the tathagatas.🔽Then, the Blessed One, the Tathagata Akshobya, etc.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan 'dren pa ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan 'dren pa ste /
translated: All the tathagatas means the tathagatas of the ten directions and four times.

original: spyan 'dren pa ni 'gugs pa'o //
analyzed: spyan 'dren pa ni 'gugs pa'o //
translated: Summoning means attracting.

original: de'i dam tshig ni lcags kyu'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: de'i dam tshig ni lcags kyu'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: His pledge is the iron hook gesture.

original: de nyid ni mi phyed pa'i don gyis na rdo rje ste /
analyzed: de nyid ni mi phyed pa'i don gyis na rdo rje ste /
translated: That itself is a vajra in the sense of being indivisible.

original: ting nge 'dzin gang la de dmigs par gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin de la ming de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la de dmigs par gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin de la ming de skad ces bya'o //
translated: That samadhi in which that is the object is named after that.

original: ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs nas de'i lag par de bzhin du byin no zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs nas de'i lag par de bzhin du byin no zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: Having entered into that meditative concentration, he gave it to his hand, as before.

original: ci zhig byin zhe na /
analyzed: ci zhig byin zhe na /
translated: What was given?

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan 'dren pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba gsungs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan 'dren pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba gsungs so //
translated: The pledge called summoning all the transcendent lords.

original: ci'i phyir byin zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir byin zhe na /
translated: Why was it given?

original: spyan drang ba'i phyir zhes pa'o //
analyzed: spyan drang ba'i phyir zhes pa'o //
translated: In order to summon.

original: bar du zhes bya ba'i sgras ni don grub pa la sogs pa gzung ngo //
analyzed: bar du zhes bya ba'i sgras ni don grub pa la sogs pa gzung ngo //
translated: The word “also” indicates Amoghasiddhi and so on.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thams cad 'du ba ni 'dus par mdzad pa ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thams cad 'du ba ni 'dus par mdzad pa ste /
translated: The gathering of all the transcendent lords is their assembly.

original: de'i byin gyis brlabs pa ni de byed pa'o //
analyzed: de'i byin gyis brlabs pa ni de byed pa'o //
translated: The consecration of that is the consecration of that assembly.

original: 'du ba'i byin gyis brlabs pa nyid dngos grub pa ste /
analyzed: 'du ba'i byin gyis brlabs pa nyid dngos grub pa ste /
translated: The consecration of the assembly is the accomplishment.

original: de'i phyir gdon mi za ba'i rgyal po de la byin pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir gdon mi za ba'i rgyal po de la byin pa'o //
translated: Therefore, the vajra of that consecration was given to the king.

original: ci zhig mdzad nas she na de bzhin du zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: ci zhig mdzad nas she na de bzhin du zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: What was done? As before.

original: 'dis ci zhig ston ce na /
analyzed: 'dis ci zhig ston ce na /
translated: What does this indicate?

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i rin po che'i dbu rgyan dang cod pan gyis dbang bskur bar ston to //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i rin po che'i dbu rgyan dang cod pan gyis dbang bskur bar ston to //
translated: It shows the empowerment of the head ornament and diadem of the Tathāgata’s body.

original: de bas na phyag rgya'i dbang bskur ba'i rjes thogs la ming gi dbang bskur ba ni rdo rje 'gugs pa zhes gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: de bas na phyag rgya'i dbang bskur ba'i rjes thogs la ming gi dbang bskur ba ni rdo rje 'gugs pa zhes gsungs pa yin te /
translated: Therefore, after the empowerment of the seal, the empowerment of the name is taught, “the vajra hook.”

original: 'gugs par byed pas na 'gugs pa'o //
analyzed: 'gugs par byed pas na 'gugs pa'o //
translated: It is a hook because it hooks.

original: @35b rdo rje bzhin du 'gugs pa mi 'da' ba'i don gang yin pa de ni rdo rje 'gugs pa'o //
analyzed: @35b rdo rje bzhin du 'gugs pa mi 'da' ba'i don gang yin pa de ni rdo rje 'gugs pa'o //
translated: The meaning of the non-transgression of hooking like a vajra is the vajra hook.

original: yang na 'dis 'gugs pas na 'gugs pa ste /
analyzed: yang na 'dis 'gugs pas na 'gugs pa ste /
translated: Or, it is a hook because it hooks with this.

original: rdo rje lcags kyu'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje lcags kyu'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: It is the seal of the vajra hook.

original: rdo rje las 'gugs pa gang yin pa de ni rdo rje 'gugs pa ste /
analyzed: rdo rje las 'gugs pa gang yin pa de ni rdo rje 'gugs pa ste /
translated: The vajra hook is that which hooks from the vajra.

original: rdo rje ni byang chub kyi sems yin la de las byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rdo rje ni byang chub kyi sems yin la de las byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The vajra is the thought of awakening, and it arises from that.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rdo rje lcags kyu des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drang zhing bsdus nas ci zhig byed ce na /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rdo rje lcags kyu des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drang zhing bsdus nas ci zhig byed ce na /
translated: Then, etc. Having invited and gathered all the tathāgatas with that vajra hook, what does one do?

original: ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do zhes bya bar sbyar te /
analyzed: ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do zhes bya bar sbyar te /
translated: This is the expression of the special exclamation.

original: ched du brjod pa zhes bya ba 'di bshad zin to //
analyzed: ched du brjod pa zhes bya ba 'di bshad zin to //
translated: The expression of the special exclamation has already been explained.

original: 'di zhes bya ba ni lag pa'i mthil la gnas pa'o //
analyzed: 'di zhes bya ba ni lag pa'i mthil la gnas pa'o //
translated: This means that it is located in the palm of the hand.

original: de zhes bya ba 'dis ni gang las bdag skyes pa zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba 'dis ni gang las bdag skyes pa zhes pa'i don to //
translated: This means that it is the one from whom I was born.

original: de gang zhe na /
analyzed: de gang zhe na /
translated: What is that?

original: rdo rje ye shes bla med pa //🔽zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: rdo rje ye shes bla med pa // zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The unsurpassed vajra intuition.

original: rdo rje ye shes ni mi g-yo ba'i ye shes te /
analyzed: rdo rje ye shes ni mi g-yo ba'i ye shes te /
translated: Vajra intuition is unwavering intuition,

original: chos kyi dbyings rab tu rtogs pa'i mtshan nyid can no //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings rab tu rtogs pa'i mtshan nyid can no //
translated: characterized by the realization of the reality realm.

original: ye shes de su zhig gi yin zhe na /
analyzed: ye shes de su zhig gi yin zhe na /
translated: Whose intuition is it?

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi zhes bya ba gsungs so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi zhes bya ba gsungs so //
translated: It is said to be that of all buddhas.

original: ci'i phyir de sangs rgyas yin par bshad ce na /🔽sangs rgyas kun gyi don grub phyir //
analyzed: ci'i phyir de sangs rgyas yin par bshad ce na / sangs rgyas kun gyi don grub phyir //
translated: Why is it said to be a buddha?

original: zhes bya ba gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs so //
translated: It is said to be for the sake of accomplishing the goal of all buddhas.

original: de'i ngo bo nyid ji lta bu yin zhe na /🔽kun nas spyan drangs dam pa'o //
analyzed: de'i ngo bo nyid ji lta bu yin zhe na / kun nas spyan drangs dam pa'o //
translated: What is its nature?

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: It is the supreme universal summoning.

original: 'dis kun nas spyan 'dren pas na kun nas spyan drangs zhes bya ste /
analyzed: 'dis kun nas spyan 'dren pas na kun nas spyan drangs zhes bya ste /
translated: Since this hook completely summons, it is called the complete summoner.🔽It is a hook.

original: lcags kyu'o // de yang 'gugs pa gzhan dag las khyad par du gyur pa'i phyir dam pa zhes bya'o //🔽don gang gi phyir sangs rgyas kun gyi don thams cad spyan 'dren pa de gang yin zhe na /
analyzed: lcags kyu'o // de yang 'gugs pa gzhan dag las khyad par du gyur pa'i phyir dam pa zhes bya'o // don gang gi phyir sangs rgyas kun gyi don thams cad spyan 'dren pa de gang yin zhe na /
translated: And since it is superior to other hooks, it is called the supreme.🔽For what purpose does it summon the purpose of all buddhas?

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi gang gdul bya'i sems can rnams kyi don grub pa ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi gang gdul bya'i sems can rnams kyi don grub pa ste /
translated: It is the purpose of all buddhas to accomplish the welfare of sentient beings who are to be trained.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yun ring po nas mngon par bzhed pa yin pa'i phyir don de ni /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yun ring po nas mngon par bzhed pa yin pa'i phyir don de ni /
translated: Since that purpose has long been the aspiration of all the transcendent ones, that purpose

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi don grub phyir //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi don grub phyir //
translated: is called the accomplishment of the purpose of all buddhas.

original: zhes bya'o // bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi'i rang bzhin rdo rje lcags kyus sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams bsdus pa yin la /
analyzed: zhes bya'o // bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi'i rang bzhin rdo rje lcags kyus sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams bsdus pa yin la /
translated: The vajra hook, which is the nature of the four means of gathering, summons the buddhas and bodhisattvas.

original: bsdus pa de rnams ni nges par mnyes par bya dgos te /
analyzed: bsdus pa de rnams ni nges par mnyes par bya dgos te /
translated: And those who are summoned must definitely be pleased.

original: gzhan du na sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams bsdus pa la don med pa nyid du 'gyur ro zhes bstan par bya ba'i phyir de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa sems dpa' gsum pa 'byung ba'i thabs ston pa yin no //
analyzed: gzhan du na sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams bsdus pa la don med pa nyid du 'gyur ro zhes bstan par bya ba'i phyir de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa sems dpa' gsum pa 'byung ba'i thabs ston pa yin no //
translated: In order to teach this, the method of the appearance of the third hero is taught, beginning with “then.”

original: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa rnams 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyis skrag nas /🔽nyan @36a * //
analyzed: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa rnams 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyis skrag nas / nyan @36a * //
translated: Those who have generated the Thought of Awakening are frightened by the sufferings of cyclic existence.🔽Those who have entered the Śrāvaka Vehicle

original: thos kyi theg pa la zhugs pa rnams de las 'pho bar mdzad pa ni gsod pa zhes bya ste /🔽de bas na gsod par byed pa'i phyir bdud ces bya la byang chub sems dpa' chen po yang yin la /
analyzed: thos kyi theg pa la zhugs pa rnams de las 'pho bar mdzad pa ni gsod pa zhes bya ste / de bas na gsod par byed pa'i phyir bdud ces bya la byang chub sems dpa' chen po yang yin la /
translated: are caused to turn away from that.🔽Therefore, because he kills, he is called a “demon.”🔽He is a great Bodhisattva, and he is a demon,

original: bdud kyang yin pas na byang chub sems dpa' chen po bdud do //
analyzed: bdud kyang yin pas na byang chub sems dpa' chen po bdud do //
translated: so he is a “great Bodhisattva demon.”

original: de'i dam tshig ni snying po dang phyag rgya yin pas byang chub sems dpa' chen po bdud ces bya ba'i dam tshig go //
analyzed: de'i dam tshig ni snying po dang phyag rgya yin pas byang chub sems dpa' chen po bdud ces bya ba'i dam tshig go //
translated: His pledge is the essence-mantra and the seal, so it is the pledge of the great Bodhisattva demon.

original: de las byung ba ni gang las sems dpa' ste /
analyzed: de las byung ba ni gang las sems dpa' ste /
translated: The one who has arisen from that is the hero.

original: sems dpa' dang de'i byin rlabs te brtan par bya ba'i phyir rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa'i ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs pa ni mngon sum du mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: sems dpa' dang de'i byin rlabs te brtan par bya ba'i phyir rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa'i ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs pa ni mngon sum du mdzad pa'o //
translated: The samadhi called “vajra” is the hero and his blessing, in order to stabilize it.

original: 'di zhes bya ba ni thugs la gnas pa'o //
analyzed: 'di zhes bya ba ni thugs la gnas pa'o //
translated: “Here” means in the mind.

original: de gang yin zhe na /
analyzed: de gang yin zhe na /
translated: What is that?

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjes su mnyes par byed pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba gsungs te mnyes par byed pa'i dam tshig ni rjes su chags par byed pa'i mtshan ma ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjes su mnyes par byed pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba gsungs te mnyes par byed pa'i dam tshig ni rjes su chags par byed pa'i mtshan ma ste /
translated: He declares the pledge that pleases all tathagatas, the sign of generating passion.

original: gang gis byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa las bzlog ste /
analyzed: gang gis byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa las bzlog ste /
translated: By which the bodhisattva turns away from the vehicles of the disciples and the solitary Buddhas,

original: theg pa chen po la 'jug par byed pa'o //
analyzed: theg pa chen po la 'jug par byed pa'o //
translated: and enters into the Great Vehicle.

original: yang na sems can mi dge ba la zhugs pa rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la dgod par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: yang na sems can mi dge ba la zhugs pa rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la dgod par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: Or else, in order to establish sentient beings who are engaged in non-virtue in the path of the ten virtues,

original: gang gis rjes su chags par byed pa de la rjes su chags par byed pa'i dam tshig ces bya'o //
analyzed: gang gis rjes su chags par byed pa de la rjes su chags par byed pa'i dam tshig ces bya'o //
translated: That which causes passion is called the pledge of passion.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po zhes bya ba la /
translated: The essence of all the transcendent lords means

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni sangs rgyas thams cad de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni sangs rgyas thams cad de /
translated: all the buddhas.

original: de rnams kyi thugs la mnga' ba'i don la sems can thams cad rjes su chags par bya ba'i phyir 'di 'di ltar gyur cig ces bya ba'i don 'di sgra gang gis ston par byed pa'i sgra de la yang snying po zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi thugs la mnga' ba'i don la sems can thams cad rjes su chags par bya ba'i phyir 'di 'di ltar gyur cig ces bya ba'i don 'di sgra gang gis ston par byed pa'i sgra de la yang snying po zhes bya'o //
translated: The meaning that is in their minds is this: “May all sentient beings become passionate in this way.” The sound that teaches this meaning is also called the essence.🔽That itself is the flower, etc. That itself is the flower, etc.

original: de nyid de zhes bya ba la sogs pa la de zhes bya ba la ni gang sngar rdo rje rgyal por bdag nyid ston par byed pa 'di /
analyzed: de nyid de zhes bya ba la sogs pa la de zhes bya ba la ni gang sngar rdo rje rgyal por bdag nyid ston par byed pa 'di /
translated: That which was previously taught as the vajra monarch is this.

original: de nyid me tog gi dmar gyur nas zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de nyid me tog gi dmar gyur nas zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: It is the flower, having become red.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang 'brel pa'i me tog gi mda' ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang 'brel pa'i me tog gi mda' ste /
translated: It is the flower arrow connected with all the transcendent lords.

original: me tog gis mtshan pa'i mda' dang bcas pa'i gzhu'i dbyibs su gyur nas byung ba'o //
analyzed: me tog gis mtshan pa'i mda' dang bcas pa'i gzhu'i dbyibs su gyur nas byung ba'o //
translated: It came forth in the form of a bow with an arrow marked with a flower.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjes su mnyes par byed pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la mnyes par byed pa ni sems can gyi don la rgyab kyis phyogs shing nyan thos kyi lam kun du 'dzin pa sngar gsal ba'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjes su mnyes par byed pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la mnyes par byed pa ni sems can gyi don la rgyab kyis phyogs shing nyan thos kyi lam kun du 'dzin pa sngar gsal ba'o //
translated: With respect to the one who delights all the Tathagatas, etc., delighting means turning away from the welfare of sentient beings and holding to the path of the Sravakas, as was previously clarified.

original: rjes su zhes bya @36b ba'i sgras ni phyi nas zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rjes su zhes bya @36b ba'i sgras ni phyi nas zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The word after means later.

original: sems can rnams yongs su smin pa la sogs par byed pa ni rjes su chags par byed pa'o //
analyzed: sems can rnams yongs su smin pa la sogs par byed pa ni rjes su chags par byed pa'o //
translated: The one who delights sentient beings, etc., is the one who delights them.

original: de yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang 'brel pa yin te /
analyzed: de yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang 'brel pa yin te /
translated: And that is connected with all the Tathagatas.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams gzung la sangs rgyas rnams kyi rjes su mnyes par bya ba ni mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas thugs las chung ba la thugs gzhol te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams gzung la sangs rgyas rnams kyi rjes su mnyes par bya ba ni mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas thugs las chung ba la thugs gzhol te /
translated: The all tathāgatas are the Bhagavān buddhas and bodhisattvas. The pleasing of the buddhas is that after attaining manifest, perfect buddhahood, they incline their minds to the lesser activities.

original: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar mi mdzad pa la /
analyzed: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar mi mdzad pa la /
translated: They do not turn the wheel of dharma.

original: sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir tshangs pas bcom ldan 'das sems can dbang po rno ba yang mchis dbang po 'bring po yang mchis pas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor du gsol zhes bcom ldan 'das la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i phyir gsol ba btab pa yin
analyzed: sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir tshangs pas bcom ldan 'das sems can dbang po rno ba yang mchis dbang po 'bring po yang mchis pas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor du gsol zhes bcom ldan 'das la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i phyir gsol ba btab pa yin
translated: Brahmā supplicates the Bhagavān to turn the wheel of dharma for the sake of sentient beings, saying, “Bhagavān, please turn the wheel of dharma for the sake of sentient beings who have sharp faculties and those who have middling faculties.”

original: la / 'di ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi mnyes par bya ba ste /
analyzed: la / 'di ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi mnyes par bya ba ste /
translated: This is the pleasing of the buddhas.

original: sems can gyi don mdzad par bzhed pa bskyed pa'o ;
analyzed: sems can gyi don mdzad par bzhed pa bskyed pa'o ;
translated: It is the generation of the wish to act for the welfare of sentient beings.

original: / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yang sems can gyi don la g-yel ba rnams la de la 'dod pa bskyed pa ni rjes su mnyes par bya ba'o //
analyzed: / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yang sems can gyi don la g-yel ba rnams la de la 'dod pa bskyed pa ni rjes su mnyes par bya ba'o //
translated: And for the bodhisattvas, it is the delighting of those who have lost interest in working for the welfare of sentient beings.

original: sogs pa zhes smos pa ni sngar bshad pa'i byang chub kyi sems sbyong ba ni sogs pa gzung ngo //
analyzed: sogs pa zhes smos pa ni sngar bshad pa'i byang chub kyi sems sbyong ba ni sogs pa gzung ngo //
translated: The phrase “and so on” refers to the previously mentioned purification of the spirit of enlightenment.

original: shin tu bdud byed pa zhes bya ba ni rang gi las rnams kyi mchog tu mthar phyin pa'o //
analyzed: shin tu bdud byed pa zhes bya ba ni rang gi las rnams kyi mchog tu mthar phyin pa'o //
translated: “They are well-performed” means that they are the best of all actions and are brought to completion.

original: de nyid kyi phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur pa ste /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur pa ste /
translated: For that very reason, they are “completely fused.”

original: shin tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: shin tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of “completely fused” is that they are extremely firm.

original: ched du brjod pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la dris pa med par ched du smras pa ni ched du brjod pa'o //
analyzed: ched du brjod pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la dris pa med par ched du smras pa ni ched du brjod pa'o //
translated: The phrase “an expression of amazement” refers to an exclamation that is uttered without having been asked.

original: ae ma'o zhes bya ba ni ngo mtshar du gyur pa'o ;
analyzed: ae ma'o zhes bya ba ni ngo mtshar du gyur pa'o ;
translated: “Oh!” is an expression of amazement.

original: / bdag gi rang bzhin dag ces bya ba ni ngo bo nyid dag pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: / bdag gi rang bzhin dag ces bya ba ni ngo bo nyid dag pa'i phyir te /
translated: “The purity of my own nature” means the purity of their own essence.

original: gang gis kyang 'dus byas pa la sogs pas sbyangs pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gang gis kyang 'dus byas pa la sogs pas sbyangs pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is not purified by anything, such as being conditioned.

original: khyed ji ltar na rang bzhin gyis dag pa nyid yin te /
analyzed: khyed ji ltar na rang bzhin gyis dag pa nyid yin te /
translated: How can it be pure by nature?

original: gang gi phyir 'jig rten pa'i bu dang chung ma la sogs pa zang zing gi yul gyi longs spyod la chags pa yin pa de ni kun nas nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa dang / mi dge ba'i las kyi lam kun nas slong bar byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'jig rten pa'i bu dang chung ma la sogs pa zang zing gi yul gyi longs spyod la chags pa yin pa de ni kun nas nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa dang / mi dge ba'i las kyi lam kun nas slong bar byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because those who are attached to the enjoyment of material objects such as sons, wives, etc. in the world are defiled and generate the paths of nonvirtuous actions.

original: de'i mthong ba'i chos nyid la yang sems can gzhan rnams kyi sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba skyed pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i @37a * //
analyzed: de'i mthong ba'i chos nyid la yang sems can gzhan rnams kyi sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba skyed pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i @37a * //
translated: Even in this very life, it is the nature of those other sentient beings to generate suffering and mental unhappiness.

original: phyir dang / skye ba gzhan du bdag nyid sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba mtha' yas pa'i rgyur gyur pa nyid dang / 'khor bar 'ching ba'i rgyu nyid yin te /
analyzed: phyir dang / skye ba gzhan du bdag nyid sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba mtha' yas pa'i rgyur gyur pa nyid dang / 'khor bar 'ching ba'i rgyu nyid yin te /
translated: In other lives, it becomes the cause of infinite suffering and mental unhappiness for oneself and is the cause of bondage in saṃsāra.

original: de bas na yongs su ma dag pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de bas na yongs su ma dag pa yin no zhe na /
translated: Therefore, it is impure.

original: gang yang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la rjes su chags pa de ni rang gi rgyud yongs su dag pa'i rgyu yin la /
analyzed: gang yang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la rjes su chags pa de ni rang gi rgyud yongs su dag pa'i rgyu yin la /
translated: And the attachment to bringing sentient beings to full maturity is the cause of purifying one's own mindstream.

original: de yang bdag nyid kyi phyir ma yin gyi sems can de rnams nyid 'khor ba las yongs su sgrol ba'i phyir bla na med pa'i ye shes khong du chud pas bdag nyid snod du rung bar byed pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus su chags pa des sems can rnams kyang skal pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'khor ba las sgrol bar byed cing /
analyzed: de yang bdag nyid kyi phyir ma yin gyi sems can de rnams nyid 'khor ba las yongs su sgrol ba'i phyir bla na med pa'i ye shes khong du chud pas bdag nyid snod du rung bar byed pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus su chags pa des sems can rnams kyang skal pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'khor ba las sgrol bar byed cing /
translated: Moreover, it is not for one's own sake, but in order to liberate those sentient beings from cyclic existence, one makes oneself a suitable recipient by internalizing unsurpassed pristine wisdom, and in the future, through that attachment, one liberates sentient beings from cyclic existence in accordance with their fortune.

original: rjes su chags par bya bas rang dbang du byas nas dus ji lta ba bzhin du 'khor ba'i longs spyod kyis bsdus te /
analyzed: rjes su chags par bya bas rang dbang du byas nas dus ji lta ba bzhin du 'khor ba'i longs spyod kyis bsdus te /
translated: Having attracted them through attachment, one brings them to full maturity by means of the enjoyments of cyclic existence in accordance with the time.

original: yongs su smin par byas nas phyin ci ma log pa'i lung phog pa byin pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
analyzed: yongs su smin par byas nas phyin ci ma log pa'i lung phog pa byin pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
translated: And having brought them to full maturity, one causes them to attain omniscience by giving them unmistaken instructions.

original: de bas na bdag dang gzhan gyi rgyud rnam par dag pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i phyir dang / zag pa med pa'i bde ba dang yid bde ba mang po'i rgyur gyur pa'i phyir de la ni rang bzhin gyis dag pa zhes bshad do //
analyzed: de bas na bdag dang gzhan gyi rgyud rnam par dag pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i phyir dang / zag pa med pa'i bde ba dang yid bde ba mang po'i rgyur gyur pa'i phyir de la ni rang bzhin gyis dag pa zhes bshad do //
translated: Therefore, because it is the cause of the purification of one's own and others' mental continuums, and because it is the cause of the many kinds of uncontaminated bliss and mental joy, it is said to be naturally pure.

original: rjes su chags par byed pas na dgyes par byed pa'o //
analyzed: rjes su chags par byed pas na dgyes par byed pa'o //
translated: It is a delight because it delights.

original: de lta bu de gang gi rjes su chags pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: de lta bu de gang gi rjes su chags pa yin zhe na /
translated: In what is it delighted?

original: rang 'byung zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: rang 'byung zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: It is said to be in the self-arisen.

original: rang 'byung ba'i phyir rang 'byung ste /🔽sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i tshul la brten nas /
analyzed: rang 'byung ba'i phyir rang 'byung ste / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i tshul la brten nas /
translated: It is self-arisen because it arises by itself.

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams la yang bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams la yang bya'o //
translated: It is to be applied to the Buddhas, the Blessed Ones, and also to the Bodhisattvas, in dependence on the mode of arising.

original: rang 'byung ba rnams kyi rjes su chags pa de lta bu 'di yin par ji ltar shes she na /
analyzed: rang 'byung ba rnams kyi rjes su chags pa de lta bu 'di yin par ji ltar shes she na /
translated: How is it known that this is the delight of the self-arisen?

original: gang gi phyir 'dod chags bral rnams zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'dod chags bral rnams zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: It is said, because they are free from attachment, etc.

original: sangs rgyas kyi rigs can gyi gdul bya rnams nyan thos kyi theg par lhung zhing 'dod chags dang bral ba yongs su ma dag pa rnams slar yang theg pa chen po la dgod pa'i phyir 'dod chags kyis gdul bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi rigs can gyi gdul bya rnams nyan thos kyi theg par lhung zhing 'dod chags dang bral ba yongs su ma dag pa rnams slar yang theg pa chen po la dgod pa'i phyir 'dod chags kyis gdul bar byed pa'o //
translated: In order to establish disciples who are of the spiritual family of the Buddha but have fallen into the Śrāvaka Vehicle and are not completely pure due to their lack of passion, he arouses passion in order to convert them to the Great Vehicle.

original: 'di skad ston te /
analyzed: 'di skad ston te /
translated: This is what is being taught:

original: sems can gyi don la rgyab kyis phyogs pa rnams sems can rnams smin pa dang grol bar bya ba'i phyir 'dod chags bskyed ces bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: sems can gyi don la rgyab kyis phyogs pa rnams sems can rnams smin pa dang grol bar bya ba'i phyir 'dod chags bskyed ces bya ba'i don to //
translated: Those who turn their back on the welfare of sentient beings arouse passion in order to ripen and liberate sentient beings.

original: da ni bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gi don du mngon par 'du mdzad pa'i las de la bsnyen bkur sngon du 'jug pas las la sbyar bar @37b gsol ba 'debs pa ni bka' nod cing zhes bya ba 'dis bstan te /
analyzed: da ni bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gi don du mngon par 'du mdzad pa'i las de la bsnyen bkur sngon du 'jug pas las la sbyar bar @37b gsol ba 'debs pa ni bka' nod cing zhes bya ba 'dis bstan te /
