translated: Now, in order to serve the activity for the sake of which the Blessed One has manifested, he requests that he be applied to the activity with the statement, “I will do as I am told.”

original: bka' ni rang gi las rnams la lung bsgo ba'o //
analyzed: bka' ni rang gi las rnams la lung bsgo ba'o //
translated: “To be told” means to be ordered to one’s own activities.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par byed pa la sogs pa la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par byed pa la sogs pa la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad de /
translated: In order to please all the tathagatas, and so on, all the tathagatas are all the buddhas and bodhisattvas.🔽They are not like the sravakas, who are frightened by samsara.

original: nyan thos bzhin du 'khor bas kun du skrag pa la phyag rgya'i khyad par gang gis rjes su chags par byas pa'o //
analyzed: nyan thos bzhin du 'khor bas kun du skrag pa la phyag rgya'i khyad par gang gis rjes su chags par byas pa'o //
translated: The special mudra is the one by which they are pleased.

original: de'i byin gyi rlabs ni nyid kyi las rnams la mthu skyed pa ste /🔽de la brtan par nus pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin te de la ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes pa'i byin rlabs rdo rje zhes bya ste /
analyzed: de'i byin gyi rlabs ni nyid kyi las rnams la mthu skyed pa ste / de la brtan par nus pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin te de la ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes pa'i byin rlabs rdo rje zhes bya ste /
translated: The empowerment of that is the generation of power in their own activities.🔽That is the samadhi that is able to stabilize that, and it is called the vajra empowerment of pleasing all the tathagatas.🔽Having entered and actualized that samadhi called that, what does he do?

original: de skad ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs shing mngon sum du mdzad nas ci zhig mdzad ces 'dir rtog pa la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdud rdo rje'i dam tshig ces bya ba ste /
analyzed: de skad ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs shing mngon sum du mdzad nas ci zhig mdzad ces 'dir rtog pa la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdud rdo rje'i dam tshig ces bya ba ste /
translated: Here, in order to imagine that, it is called the vajra pledge of all tathagatas.

original: rdo rje mda' byang chub sems dpa' chen po bdud ces bya ba de'i lag tu byin no zhes bya bar sbyar ro /
analyzed: rdo rje mda' byang chub sems dpa' chen po bdud ces bya ba de'i lag tu byin no zhes bya bar sbyar ro /
translated: and the great bodhisattva Māra, and he gave it to him.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdud rdo rje'i dam tshig ces bya ba la /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdud rdo rje'i dam tshig ces bya ba la /
translated: The pledge of the vajra Māra of all the transcendent ones.

original: bdud ni rang dgar 'jug pa las bzlog cing gzhan gyi dbang gi byed pa'o //
analyzed: bdud ni rang dgar 'jug pa las bzlog cing gzhan gyi dbang gi byed pa'o //
translated: Māra is the activity of the power of others, which is the opposite of acting as one wishes.

original: de la rdo rje bzhin du mi phyed pa'i dam tshig gang yin pa de ni bdud rdo rje'i dam tshig go //
analyzed: de la rdo rje bzhin du mi phyed pa'i dam tshig gang yin pa de ni bdud rdo rje'i dam tshig go //
translated: The pledge is like a vajra, which is indivisible.

original: sems can gyi khams ma lus shing zhes bya ba ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: sems can gyi khams ma lus shing zhes bya ba ni bshad zin to //
translated: The realm of sentient beings without exception is as explained above.

original: bar du zhes bya ba'i sgras ni byang chub kyi sems la sogs pa ma smos pa rnams kyang ston pa yin no //
analyzed: bar du zhes bya ba'i sgras ni byang chub kyi sems la sogs pa ma smos pa rnams kyang ston pa yin no //
translated: The word “and” indicates that the bodhisattva deeds and so forth are also included.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdud kyi las ni sangs rgyas kyi rigs can rnams nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa las 'pho bar byed pa dang / sangs rgyas rnams kyang thugs las chung ngu las bskyod par byed pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdud kyi las ni sangs rgyas kyi rigs can rnams nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa las 'pho bar byed pa dang / sangs rgyas rnams kyang thugs las chung ngu las bskyod par byed pa'o //
translated: The evil deeds of all the Tathagatas are to cause those who belong to the Buddha lineage to leave the vehicles of the Sravakas and Pratyekabuddhas, and to cause the Buddhas to leave their state of little concern.

original: bdud kyi las de nyid ni dngos grub kyi mchog ste /
analyzed: bdud kyi las de nyid ni dngos grub kyi mchog ste /
translated: That very evil deed is the supreme attainment.

original: de 'thob pa ni dngos grub kyi mchog thob pa'o //
analyzed: de 'thob pa ni dngos grub kyi mchog thob pa'o //
translated: The attainment of that is the attainment of the supreme attainment.

original: de nyid ni 'bras bu yin pas na dngos grub kyi mchog thob pa'i 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: de nyid ni 'bras bu yin pas na dngos grub kyi mchog thob pa'i 'bras bu'o //
translated: That itself is the fruit, so it is the fruit of the attainment of the supreme attainment.

original: de dag gi phyir de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i rin po che'i dbu rgyan dang cod pan gyi dbang bskur ba byin no zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de dag gi phyir de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i rin po che'i dbu rgyan dang cod pan gyi dbang bskur ba byin no zhes bya ba ste /
translated: For that reason, the empowerment of the crown and the crest jewel of the Tathagata is bestowed.

original: stsal to zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: stsal to zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of “is bestowed” is “is given.”

original: de bas na phyag rgya'i dbang bskur ba'i rjes la ming gi dbang bskur ba bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de bas na phyag rgya'i dbang bskur ba'i rjes la ming gi dbang bskur ba bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: Therefore, in order to teach the empowerment of the name after the empowerment of the seal,

original: rdo rje gzhu zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: rdo rje gzhu zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: the vajra bow is stated.

original: 'dis sngar gzhu zhes ma smos su zin kyang mda' de gzhu med par nges de'i las mi srid pa'i phyir @38a * //
analyzed: 'dis sngar gzhu zhes ma smos su zin kyang mda' de gzhu med par nges de'i las mi srid pa'i phyir @38a * //
translated: Although the bow was not mentioned previously, the arrow is definitely dependent on the bow, because its function is not possible without it.

original: mda' zhes smos pas gzhu ma smos su zin kyang don gyis smos pa kho na yin par ston to //
analyzed: mda' zhes smos pas gzhu ma smos su zin kyang don gyis smos pa kho na yin par ston to //
translated: Thus, although the bow is not mentioned by the word “arrow,” it is mentioned by implication.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bdud byed cing zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bdud byed cing zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “He acts as Mara to all Tathagatas”

original: sangs rgyas kyi rigs dang ldan pa rnams nyan thos kyi theg pa las 'pho bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi rigs dang ldan pa rnams nyan thos kyi theg pa las 'pho bar byed pa'o //
translated: means that he causes those who possess the Buddha lineage to turn away from the vehicle of the Sravakas.

original: ci zhig ce na /
analyzed: ci zhig ce na /
translated: What does he do?

original: ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do zhes bya ba ste /
translated: He utters this utterance.

original: 'di zhes bya ba ni lag mthil na gnas pa'i mda'i gzugs so //
analyzed: 'di zhes bya ba ni lag mthil na gnas pa'i mda'i gzugs so //
translated: “This” refers to the form of the arrow which is in the palm of his hand.

original: 'di ci zhig yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'di ci zhig yin zhe na /
translated: What is this?

original: 'dod chags kyi ye shes so //
analyzed: 'dod chags kyi ye shes so //
translated: It is the knowledge of passion.

original: su zhig gi zhe na /
analyzed: su zhig gi zhe na /
translated: Whose?

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi'o //
translated: Of all the Buddhas.

original: 'dod chags kyi rgyu'i ye shes yin pas na 'dod chags kyi ye shes te /
analyzed: 'dod chags kyi rgyu'i ye shes yin pas na 'dod chags kyi ye shes te /
translated: The knowledge of passion is the knowledge which is the cause of passion.

original: ye shes kyis de sprul pa yin pa'i phyir de nyid la ye shes zhes bya'o //
analyzed: ye shes kyis de sprul pa yin pa'i phyir de nyid la ye shes zhes bya'o //
translated: Since it is emanated by intuition, it is called intuition.

original: rnyog pa med pas na dri ma med pa ste /
analyzed: rnyog pa med pas na dri ma med pa ste /
translated: It is immaculate, since it is uncontaminated.

original: longs spyod kyi srid pa ma 'dres pa'i phyir rnyog pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: longs spyod kyi srid pa ma 'dres pa'i phyir rnyog pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Since it is not mixed with the life of enjoyment, it is called uncontaminated.

original: 'di dri ma med pa yin par ci mngon zhe na /🔽'dod chags kyis ni chags bral bcom //
analyzed: 'di dri ma med pa yin par ci mngon zhe na / 'dod chags kyis ni chags bral bcom //
translated: How is it known that this is immaculate?

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: It is said:🔽“Free from attachment is destroyed by attachment. ”

original: bcom pa ni brlag pa'o //
analyzed: bcom pa ni brlag pa'o //
translated: Destroyed means annihilated.

original: gang zhig ce na chags bral zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: gang zhig ce na chags bral zhes bya ba ste /
translated: What is it? It is called free from attachment.

original: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thugs las chung ngu la gzhol ba'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thugs las chung ngu la gzhol ba'o //
translated: It is the small-heartedness of the Buddhas and bodhisattvas.

original: gang gis bcom zhe na /
analyzed: gang gis bcom zhe na /
translated: By what is it destroyed?

original: 'dod chags kyis te /
analyzed: 'dod chags kyis te /
translated: By attachment.

original: sems can rnams smin pa dang grol ba'i 'dod chags kyis 'dod chags dang bral ba bcom pa'o //
analyzed: sems can rnams smin pa dang grol ba'i 'dod chags kyis 'dod chags dang bral ba bcom pa'o //
translated: The freedom from attachment of those who are free from attachment is destroyed by the attachment to the liberation and maturation of living beings.

original: bcom nas ci zhig mdzad ce na //
analyzed: bcom nas ci zhig mdzad ce na //
translated: Having been destroyed, what does it do?

original: bde ba thams cad sbyin par byed //🔽ces bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: bde ba thams cad sbyin par byed //🔽ces bya ba gsungs te /
translated: It gives all happiness.

original: bde ba thams cad ni sangs rgyas kyi bde ba bla na med pa'o //
analyzed: bde ba thams cad ni sangs rgyas kyi bde ba bla na med pa'o //
translated: All happiness is the unsurpassed happiness of the Buddha.

original: byang chub kyi sems kyi phyag rgya bskyed nas de'i 'og tu byang chub kyi sems la sems can bsdus nas dgod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems kyi phyag rgya bskyed nas de'i 'og tu byang chub kyi sems la sems can bsdus nas dgod pa'i phyir /
translated: Having generated the seal of the Thought of Enlightenment, then, in order to establish sentient beings in the Thought of Enlightenment,

original: sems can bsdu ba'i phyag rgya bskyed pa yin la /
analyzed: sems can bsdu ba'i phyag rgya bskyed pa yin la /
translated: he generated the seal of gathering sentient beings.

original: sems can bsdu ba bstan nas sems can de dag rjes su chags par bya ba'i phyag rgya bstan to /
analyzed: sems can bsdu ba bstan nas sems can de dag rjes su chags par bya ba'i phyag rgya bstan to /
translated: Having taught the gathering of sentient beings, he taught the seal of being attached to those sentient beings.

original: rjes su chags par bya ba rnams ni dga' bar bya dgos pa de'i phyir /
analyzed: rjes su chags par bya ba rnams ni dga' bar bya dgos pa de'i phyir /
translated: Those who are to be attached must be delighted, and therefore

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i gzhung smos pa yin no //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i gzhung smos pa yin no //
translated: he said, “Then, etc.”

original: rab tu dga' ba ni yid bde ba'o //
analyzed: rab tu dga' ba ni yid bde ba'o //
translated: Joy is mental pleasure.

original: de bskyed par bya ba la dbang du gyur pa nyid kyi phyir rgyal po yin pas na rab tu dga' ba'i rgyal po'o //
analyzed: de bskyed par bya ba la dbang du gyur pa nyid kyi phyir rgyal po yin pas na rab tu dga' ba'i rgyal po'o //
translated: Since he is the king who has control over the generation of that, he is the king of joy.

original: byang chub sems dpa' chen po yang yin la rab tu dga' ba'i rgyal po yang yin pas na byang chub sems dpa' chen po rab tu dga' ba'i rgyal po'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' chen po yang yin la rab tu dga' ba'i rgyal po yang yin pas na byang chub sems dpa' chen po rab tu dga' ba'i rgyal po'o //
translated: He is a great bodhisattva and also a king of the highest joy, thus he is the great bodhisattva king of the highest joy.

original: de'i dam @38b tshig ni snying po dang phyag rgya la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de'i dam @38b tshig ni snying po dang phyag rgya la sogs pa ste /
translated: His pledge is the essence-mantra, the seal, etc.

original: de sems dpa'i sems kyi khyad par gang las byung ba de byin gyis brlab cing mthu bskyed pa'i phyir rdo rje ste /
analyzed: de sems dpa'i sems kyi khyad par gang las byung ba de byin gyis brlab cing mthu bskyed pa'i phyir rdo rje ste /
translated: That is the vajra which arises from the special thought of the bodhisattva, in order to bless and increase its power.

original: ming de skad ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de tshig 'di dag gis ston pa yin no //
analyzed: ming de skad ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de tshig 'di dag gis ston pa yin no //
translated: That samādhi which has that name is taught by these words.

original: de la snyoms par zhugs pa ni mngon sum du mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: de la snyoms par zhugs pa ni mngon sum du mdzad pa'o //
translated: Entering into it means actualizing it.

original: rab tu dga' ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni rab tu dga' ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba ste /
analyzed: rab tu dga' ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni rab tu dga' ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba ste /
translated: The pledge seal of the highest joy is called the pledge of the highest joy.

original: rab tu dga' ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po'o //
analyzed: rab tu dga' ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po'o //
translated: That which is called the pledge of the highest joy is the essence of all the tathāgatas.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mi bskyod pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mi bskyod pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: All the Tathagatas are Akshobhya and so forth.

original: de dag gi thugs ka la 'di'i don gnas pas na snying po'o //
analyzed: de dag gi thugs ka la 'di'i don gnas pas na snying po'o //
translated: Since they abide in the heart of these, they are the essence.

original: de ston par byed pa'i sgra la yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po'o zhes bshad do //
analyzed: de ston par byed pa'i sgra la yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po'o zhes bshad do //
translated: The sound that teaches that is also called the essence of all the Tathagatas.

original: rang gi thugs ka zhes bshad de /
analyzed: rang gi thugs ka zhes bshad de /
translated: It is explained as one's own heart.

original: rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs ka ste /
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs ka ste /
translated: It is the heart of Vairochana.

original: de las phyung ba'o //
analyzed: de las phyung ba'o //
translated: It is produced from that.

original: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid ces bya ba ni gang sngar 'di'i gzugs su byung ba ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid ces bya ba ni gang sngar 'di'i gzugs su byung ba ste /
translated: That very Blessed Vajra Holder, who previously appeared in this form,

original: da ni legs so zhes bya bar gyur nas zhes pa phyag gnyis se gol rdebs pa'i tshul gyis mchog tu yongs su dga' ba'i rgyu dang 'bras bu mngon par ston pa'i tshul du byung ngo //
analyzed: da ni legs so zhes bya bar gyur nas zhes pa phyag gnyis se gol rdebs pa'i tshul gyis mchog tu yongs su dga' ba'i rgyu dang 'bras bu mngon par ston pa'i tshul du byung ngo //
translated: now becomes excellent and with two hands in the manner of snapping the fingers, appears in the manner of demonstrating the cause and result of supreme delight.

original: 'dis kyang mnyes par byed pa ston te /
analyzed: 'dis kyang mnyes par byed pa ston te /
translated: This also shows the pleasing.🔽Just as that very ritual is complete, the Blessed Buddhas are pleased,

original: ji ltar cho ga de nyid rdzogs pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyes te /
analyzed: ji ltar cho ga de nyid rdzogs pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyes te /
translated: and

original: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa la legs so legs so zhes ston par mdzad pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa la legs so legs so zhes ston par mdzad pa lta bu'o //
translated: The Bhagavat Vajradhara says, Excellent, excellent!

original: rdo rje dgyes pa'i dbyibs su zhes bya ba ni legs so zhes bya ba sbyin pa'i phyag rgya'i gzugs su'o //
analyzed: rdo rje dgyes pa'i dbyibs su zhes bya ba ni legs so zhes bya ba sbyin pa'i phyag rgya'i gzugs su'o //
translated: The form of the gesture of bestowing excellent is the shape of Vajra-Delight.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis legs so zhes bya ba la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni sems dpa' 'di rang gi las 'di la legs so zhes bya ba ni sbyin par byed pa yin te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis legs so zhes bya ba la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni sems dpa' 'di rang gi las 'di la legs so zhes bya ba ni sbyin par byed pa yin te /
translated: All Tathagatas say excellent, etc. This hero bestows excellent on this his own deed.

original: sogs pa zhes bya ba'i sgras ni sngar gyi sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa thams cad bsdu'o //
analyzed: sogs pa zhes bya ba'i sgras ni sngar gyi sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa thams cad bsdu'o //
translated: The word etc. includes all the deeds of the former Buddhas.

original: shin tu dga' bar byed pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: shin tu dga' bar byed pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: The phrase causing great delight, etc.

original: rab tu mi dga' ba nyid rab tu dga' ba bskyed pa'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu bsgoms pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rab tu mi dga' ba nyid rab tu dga' ba bskyed pa'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu bsgoms pa'i phyir ro //
translated: is because he has cultivated the samadhi of generating great delight in the very discontented.

original: shin tu bsgoms pa ni sems la dbang du gyur pa ste /
analyzed: shin tu bsgoms pa ni sems la dbang du gyur pa ste /
translated: Cultivation is mastery of mind.

original: shin tu bsgoms pa'i phyir gcig tu gyur la rab tu brtan pa'i phyir 'dres par gyur pa ste /
analyzed: shin tu bsgoms pa'i phyir gcig tu gyur la rab tu brtan pa'i phyir 'dres par gyur pa ste /
translated: Because of being very cultivated, they become one. Because of being very stable, they become mixed.

original: snying po zhes bya ba'i don to //🔽de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i lus @39a * //
analyzed: snying po zhes bya ba'i don to // de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i lus @39a * //
translated: This is the meaning of “essence.

original: 'di sprul nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di sprul nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod pa yin no //
translated: ” Thus, having emanated this body of the bodhisattva, he uttered this utterance.

original: kye ma'o zhes bya ba 'di ngo mtshar du gyur pa'o //
analyzed: kye ma'o zhes bya ba 'di ngo mtshar du gyur pa'o //
translated: “Ah! ” is the wonder.

original: 'dir ci zhig ngo mtshar che zhe na /
analyzed: 'dir ci zhig ngo mtshar che zhe na /
translated: What is so wonderful here?

original: gang gi phyir gzugs med pa'i sems kyi ngo bo nyid yin du zin kyang bdag gzugs can du gyur ba'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir gzugs med pa'i sems kyi ngo bo nyid yin du zin kyang bdag gzugs can du gyur ba'o //
translated: Because, although it is the nature of a formless mind, it becomes a body.

original: ci zhig gi ngo bo zhe na /
analyzed: ci zhig gi ngo bo zhe na /
translated: What is its nature?

original: legs par sbyin pa'i ngo bo nyid du'o //
analyzed: legs par sbyin pa'i ngo bo nyid du'o //
translated: It is the nature of giving good gifts.

original: ci phyogs gcig pa'am zhe na /
analyzed: ci phyogs gcig pa'am zhe na /
translated: Is it only a part?

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: This is not so.🔽

original: thams cad ces bya ba smos te /
analyzed: thams cad ces bya ba smos te /
translated: It is said to be “all.

original: legs par bya ba thams cad kyi legs pa sbyin pa'o //
analyzed: legs par bya ba thams cad kyi legs pa sbyin pa'o //
translated: ” Giving good gifts is good for all good deeds.

original: su zhig gi legs pa sbyin pa zhe na /
analyzed: su zhig gi legs pa sbyin pa zhe na /
translated: To whom does it give good gifts?

original: thams cad mkhyen pa kun gyi zhes bya ba gsungs so //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa kun gyi zhes bya ba gsungs so //
translated: It is said to be “of all omniscience.🔽”

original: khyad par ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: khyad par ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is the distinction?

original: mchog ces bya ba ste dam pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: mchog ces bya ba ste dam pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: It is supreme, that is, it is excellent.

original: ji ltar dam pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar dam pa yin zhe na /
translated: How is it excellent?

original: rnam rtog bral ba de dag gi / nges par dgyes pa bskyed pa yin //🔽zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rnam rtog bral ba de dag gi / nges par dgyes pa bskyed pa yin // zhes bya ba'o //
translated: They are certainly delighted by that freedom from conceptualization.

original: 'di skad ston te /
analyzed: 'di skad ston te /
translated: This is what is being taught.

original: dga' ba ni yid bde ba yin la /
analyzed: dga' ba ni yid bde ba yin la /
translated: Joy is mental satisfaction.

original: de yang rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba yin mod kyi /
analyzed: de yang rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba yin mod kyi /
translated: And that is indeed free from conceptualization.

original: 'dis ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob cing rnam par rtog pa spangs pa rnams kyi yang gang gi phyir dgyes pa skyed par byed pa yin pas na de'i phyir mchog go //
analyzed: 'dis ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob cing rnam par rtog pa spangs pa rnams kyi yang gang gi phyir dgyes pa skyed par byed pa yin pas na de'i phyir mchog go //
translated: But this is supreme because it is the cause of delight for those who have attained the concentration free from conceptualization and have abandoned conceptualization.

original: nges par zhes bya ba ni gdon mi za bar ro //
analyzed: nges par zhes bya ba ni gdon mi za bar ro //
translated: Certainly means without a doubt.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //🔽mnyes par byed pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa la mnyes par byed pa'i phyir rdo rje yin pas na /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o // mnyes par byed pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa la mnyes par byed pa'i phyir rdo rje yin pas na /
translated: Then, etc. is easy to understand.

original: mnyes par byed pa'i rdo rje'o //
analyzed: mnyes par byed pa'i rdo rje'o //
translated: The vajra of service, etc. The vajra of service is the vajra of service because it is a vajra for the sake of service.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang 'brel pa'i rab tu dga' ba bskyed pa'i phyir phyag rgya bstan par bya ba'i phyir rdo rje ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang 'brel pa'i rab tu dga' ba bskyed pa'i phyir phyag rgya bstan par bya ba'i phyir rdo rje ste /
translated: The vajra is the seal that is taught in order to generate the joy that is connected with all the tathagatas.

original: ming de skad ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de la snyoms par zhugs pa ni mngon sum du mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: ming de skad ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de la snyoms par zhugs pa ni mngon sum du mdzad pa'o //
translated: The samadhi called by that name, he entered: he actualized it.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rab tu dgyes pa bla na med pa zhes bya ba la rab tu dgyes pa ni yid bde ba'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rab tu dgyes pa bla na med pa zhes bya ba la rab tu dgyes pa ni yid bde ba'o //
translated: The unsurpassed joy of all the tathagatas: joy is mental satisfaction.

original: 'di'i gong na yod pa ma yin pas na /
analyzed: 'di'i gong na yod pa ma yin pas na /
translated: Since there is nothing higher than this,

original: bla na med pa'o //
analyzed: bla na med pa'o //
translated: it is unsurpassed.

original: de mkhyen pa'i ye shes yin pas na rab tu dgyes pa bla na med pa'i ye shes te /
analyzed: de mkhyen pa'i ye shes yin pas na rab tu dgyes pa bla na med pa'i ye shes te /
translated: Since that is the gnosis, it is the unsurpassed gnosis of joy.

original: de la ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rab tu dgyes pa bla na med pa'i ye shes zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de la ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rab tu dgyes pa bla na med pa'i ye shes zhes bya'o //
translated: That is called the unsurpassed gnosis of joy of all the tathagatas.

original: de'i dam tshig ni phyag rgya ste /
analyzed: de'i dam tshig ni phyag rgya ste /
translated: Its commitment is the seal.

original: de skyed par byed pa'i mtshan ma de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rab tu dgyes pa bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi dam tshig ces bya ste /
analyzed: de skyed par byed pa'i mtshan ma de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rab tu dgyes pa bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi dam tshig ces bya ste /
translated: The sign that generates that is called the pledge of the gnosis of the unexcelled joy of all the Tathagatas.

original: rdo rje dgyes pa de byang chub sems dpa' chen po rab tu dga' ba'i rgyal po de'i @39b lag tu byin no zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: rdo rje dgyes pa de byang chub sems dpa' chen po rab tu dga' ba'i rgyal po de'i @39b lag tu byin no zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: The vajra joy is given into the hand of that great bodhisattva, the king of joy.

original: dgyes pa'i ro zhes bya ba la sogs pa la dgyes pa ni yid bde ba'i khyad par ste /
analyzed: dgyes pa'i ro zhes bya ba la sogs pa la dgyes pa ni yid bde ba'i khyad par ste /
translated: The taste of joy, etc. Joy is a special mental satisfaction,

original: spu ldang ba la sogs pa'i rgyu'o //
analyzed: spu ldang ba la sogs pa'i rgyu'o //
translated: the cause of the rising of the hairs, etc.

original: de nyid ni tshim par byed pa yin pa'i phyir bla na med pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid ni tshim par byed pa yin pa'i phyir bla na med pa'o //
translated: That itself is unexcelled because it satisfies.

original: 'di nyid ni bsgrub pa dam pa zhes kyang bya'o //
analyzed: 'di nyid ni bsgrub pa dam pa zhes kyang bya'o //
translated: This is also called the highest practice.

original: lhag ma rnams ni go sla'o //
analyzed: lhag ma rnams ni go sla'o //
translated: The rest is easy to understand.

original: da ni de'i las kyi phyag rgya bstan pa'i phyir de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: da ni de'i las kyi phyag rgya bstan pa'i phyir de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: Now, in order to teach the karma-mudra of that, he says, Then, etc.

original: rdo rje'i ming gi mtshan pa'i dgyes pa ni rdo rje dgyes pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje'i ming gi mtshan pa'i dgyes pa ni rdo rje dgyes pa'o //
translated: Vajra joy is the joy of the name-emblem of the vajra.

original: rdo rje dgyes pa'i se gol de'i tshul gyis phyag rgya des dkyil 'khor ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams la legs so zhes bya bas rab tu dgyes par byed cing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do //
analyzed: rdo rje dgyes pa'i se gol de'i tshul gyis phyag rgya des dkyil 'khor ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams la legs so zhes bya bas rab tu dgyes par byed cing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do //
translated: By that method of the vajra-applause, with that seal, all the Tathagatas in the mandala and the Bodhisattvas are delighted with the “excellent” and utter this utterance.

original: 'di zhes bya ba ni lag na gnas pa'o //
analyzed: 'di zhes bya ba ni lag na gnas pa'o //
translated: “This” refers to what is in the hand.

original: de zhes bya ba ni bdag gang las byung ba'o //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni bdag gang las byung ba'o //
translated: “That” refers to what the self has come from.

original: 'di su zhig gi zhe na /
analyzed: 'di su zhig gi zhe na /
translated: Whose is this?

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhes bya ba gsungs te /🔽las ci zhig byed ce na legs sbyin pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhes bya ba gsungs te / las ci zhig byed ce na legs sbyin pa /
translated: It is said, “of the Buddhas.”

original: 'di ni rab tu 'jig byed pas /
analyzed: 'di ni rab tu 'jig byed pas /
translated: What action does it perform? It is the “excellent gift.”

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: This is said:🔽“It is the destroyer of the utterly destroyed.”

original: thams cad mgu bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: thams cad mgu bar byed pa'o //
translated: It delights all.

original: rdo rje zhes bya ba ni rang gi las la gzhan gyi mi phyed pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rdo rje zhes bya ba ni rang gi las la gzhan gyi mi phyed pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: “Vajra” means that it is not divided by others with regard to its own action.

original: 'di ni lha rnams kyi yin pas na lha rdzas so //
analyzed: 'di ni lha rnams kyi yin pas na lha rdzas so //
translated: Since this is of the gods, it is divine.

original: 'dis ni ci zhig byed ce na /
analyzed: 'dis ni ci zhig byed ce na /
translated: What does it do?

original: dgyes pa spel ba'o zhes bya ba gsungs so //
analyzed: dgyes pa spel ba'o zhes bya ba gsungs so //
translated: It is said, “it increases delight.”

original: byang chub kyi sems chen po zhes bya ba ni byang chub tu gsol ba 'debs pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems chen po zhes bya ba ni byang chub tu gsol ba 'debs pa'o //
translated: The great mind of enlightenment is the supplication for enlightenment.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drang ba'i dam tshig ni bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drang ba'i dam tshig ni bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi'i rang bzhin no //
translated: The pledge of inviting all the transcendent ones is the nature of the four means of gathering disciples.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par byed pa'i ye shes ni sems can thams cad kyi sems dang sems las byung ba dang rjes su mthun par 'jug pa'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par byed pa'i ye shes ni sems can thams cad kyi sems dang sems las byung ba dang rjes su mthun par 'jug pa'i rang bzhin no //
translated: The pristine awareness that delights all transcendent ones is the nature of engaging in accordance with the minds and mental states of all sentient beings.

original: dgyes pa chen po ni dga' ba dang yid bde ba'i rang bzhin no //🔽dam tshig chen po'i sems dpa'o zhes bya ba la byang chub chen po'i dam tshig yin pas na /
analyzed: dgyes pa chen po ni dga' ba dang yid bde ba'i rang bzhin no // dam tshig chen po'i sems dpa'o zhes bya ba la byang chub chen po'i dam tshig yin pas na /
translated: Great delight is the nature of joy and mental satisfaction.

original: dam tshig chen po ste de thob par byed pa'i rgyu'i sems dpa' la dam tshig chen po'i sems dpa' zhes bya'o //
analyzed: dam tshig chen po ste de thob par byed pa'i rgyu'i sems dpa' la dam tshig chen po'i sems dpa' zhes bya'o //
translated: The great pledge being is so called because it is the cause for attaining the great pledge, which is the pledge of great enlightenment.

original: de bas na yon tan de bzhi ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yon tan ma lus pa thob pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de bas na yon tan de bzhi ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yon tan ma lus pa thob pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Therefore, these four qualities are the cause for attaining all the qualities of the Bhagavans, the Buddhas.

original: dkyil 'khor du phyag rgya chen po bzhi'i ngo bo nyid du sprul pa la ni dam tshig sems dpa' zhes bya'o //🔽de dag gi don gyi dbang gis na go rims bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i @40a * //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor du phyag rgya chen po bzhi'i ngo bo nyid du sprul pa la ni dam tshig sems dpa' zhes bya'o // de dag gi don gyi dbang gis na go rims bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i @40a * //
translated: In the mandala, the emanation in the nature of the four great seals is called the pledge being.

original: rigs yin no //
analyzed: rigs yin no //
translated: By the power of their meaning, one is respectively of the Tathagata lineage.

original: de ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams yongs su mnyes par byas pa'i rjes la /
analyzed: de ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams yongs su mnyes par byas pa'i rjes la /
translated: After pleasing the Buddhas and Bodhisattvas,

original: ji ltar rgyal po'i bu dge zhing 'ongs pa rnams la rang gi yul gyi bdag por dbang bskur ba de bzhin du /
analyzed: ji ltar rgyal po'i bu dge zhing 'ongs pa rnams la rang gi yul gyi bdag por dbang bskur ba de bzhin du /
translated: just as a king's son who is virtuous is anointed as the lord of his own country,

original: ji skad du smos pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams thugs shin tu dgyes te bla na med pa'i chos kyi rgyal por dbang bskur ba stsol bar mdzad do zhes bstan par bya ba'i phyir de
analyzed: ji skad du smos pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams thugs shin tu dgyes te bla na med pa'i chos kyi rgyal por dbang bskur ba stsol bar mdzad do zhes bstan par bya ba'i phyir de
translated: The bodhisattva who has the qualities mentioned above is very much pleased by the buddhas and bodhisattvas, and they bestow the consecration of the unsurpassed Dharma king.

original: nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: In order to teach this, [the Bhagavān] declares, “Then,” and so on.

original: de nas zhes bya ba ni de'i rjes thogs la'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba ni de'i rjes thogs la'o //
translated: “ Then” means immediately after that.

original: nam mkha' nyid kyi skye gnas yod pas na /
analyzed: nam mkha' nyid kyi skye gnas yod pas na /
translated: Since he has the birthplace of space itself,

original: nam mkha'i snying po'o //
analyzed: nam mkha'i snying po'o //
translated: he is Ākāśagarbha.

original: byang chub sems dpa' chen po yang yin la nam mkha'i snying po yang yin pas na /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' chen po yang yin la nam mkha'i snying po yang yin pas na /
translated: Since he is a great bodhisattva and Ākāśagarbha,

original: byang chub sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po'o //
translated: he is the great bodhisattva Ākāśagarbha.

original: de'i dam tshig ni snying po dang phyag rgya la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de'i dam tshig ni snying po dang phyag rgya la sogs pa'o //
translated: His commitment is the essence, the seal, and so on.

original: de gang las byung ba rin po che zhes bya ba ni dad pa'i nor bu rin po che las so //
analyzed: de gang las byung ba rin po che zhes bya ba ni dad pa'i nor bu rin po che las so //
translated: That which arises from it is the jewel.

original: de'i byin rlabs ni de'i mthu bskyed par bya ba'i phyir rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa'i ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs shing mngon sum du mdzad nas so //
analyzed: de'i byin rlabs ni de'i mthu bskyed par bya ba'i phyir rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa'i ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs shing mngon sum du mdzad nas so //
translated: Having entered into and actualized that samādhi,

original: ci zhig mdzad ce na /
analyzed: ci zhig mdzad ce na /
translated: what did he do?

original: de'i phyir smras pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po rang gi thugs ka nas phyung  ngo zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir smras pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po rang gi thugs ka nas phyung  ngo zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: Therefore, it is said, “he brought forth from his heart center the essence of all tathāgatas.”

original: de la ming ji skad ces bya ba yin zhe na /
analyzed: de la ming ji skad ces bya ba yin zhe na /
translated: What is its name?

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstan to //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstan to //
translated: It is taught by “all tathāgatas” and so forth.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i dam tshig yin pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i dam tshig ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i dam tshig yin pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i dam tshig ste /
translated: Since it is the pledge of the consecration of all tathāgatas, it is the pledge of the consecration of all tathāgatas.

original: 'dir dam tshig ni rin po che'i phyag rgya ston pa'i sgra la bya'o //
analyzed: 'dir dam tshig ni rin po che'i phyag rgya ston pa'i sgra la bya'o //
translated: Here, pledge refers to the sound of displaying the jewel mudra.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i snying po gang yin pa de la ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i dam tshig ces bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i snying po gang yin pa de la ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i dam tshig ces bya'o //
translated: That essence which is called the pledge of the consecration of all the Ones-Gone-Thus is called the pledge of the consecration of all the Ones-Gone-Thus.

original: ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is it like?

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po zhes bya ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po zhes bya ste /
translated: It is called the essence of all the Ones-Gone-Thus.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka la ji skad du smras pa'i dbang bskur ba'i don du gnas pa ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka la ji skad du smras pa'i dbang bskur ba'i don du gnas pa ste /
translated: It is the consecration of all the Ones-Gone-Thus abiding in the heart as it is said,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po de rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ba'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po de rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ba'o //
translated: and that essence of all the Ones-Gone-Thus is emitted from one's heart.

original: thams cad nam mkha' dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la dngos po thams cad ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs so @40b zhes chos bdag med pa rab tu rtogs pas na /
analyzed: thams cad nam mkha' dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la dngos po thams cad ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs so @40b zhes chos bdag med pa rab tu rtogs pas na /
translated: All is space and so forth. By thoroughly realizing the objective selflessness, all is space-like.

original: thams cad nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid de de'i ye shes ni thams cad nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: thams cad nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid de de'i ye shes ni thams cad nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i ye shes so //
translated: The exalted wisdom of that is the exalted wisdom of all being space-like.

original: de shin tu rtogs pa ni yang dag par thugs su chud ces bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de shin tu rtogs pa ni yang dag par thugs su chud ces bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of “he fully realized” is that he completely understood.

original: de'i ngo bo nyid yin pas na thams cad nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes shin tu rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i ngo bo nyid yin pas na thams cad nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes shin tu rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is his essence, he fully realized the wisdom that is the sameness of all phenomena with space.

original: su zhig gi yin zhe na rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin te /
analyzed: su zhig gi yin zhe na rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin te /
translated: Whose? The concentration of Vajrasattva.

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i sgra ni byang chub kyi sems la bya la /
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i sgra ni byang chub kyi sems la bya la /
translated: The term “Vajrasattva” refers to the thought of awakening.

original: de nyid ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de nyid ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Because that itself is the same as space,

original: ting nge 'dzin gyi sgrar bshad de rtse gcig pa'i phyir /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gyi sgrar bshad de rtse gcig pa'i phyir /
translated: it is explained as the term “concentration” because it is one-pointed.

original: gzhan la mi dmigs pas na rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin te /
analyzed: gzhan la mi dmigs pas na rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin te /
translated: It is the concentration of Vajrasattva because it does not focus on anything else.

original: 'di skad ston te /
analyzed: 'di skad ston te /
translated: This is what is being taught.

original: don dam par chos thams cad nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid du shes par byas la /
analyzed: don dam par chos thams cad nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid du shes par byas la /
translated: Having understood that ultimately all phenomena are the same as space,🔽and having understood that conditioned phenomena depend on conceptualization,

original: 'dus byas rnams ni rnam par rtog pa la rag las pa nyid du khong du chud nas mnyam par bzhag pa'i sems shin tu bsgoms pas /
analyzed: 'dus byas rnams ni rnam par rtog pa la rag las pa nyid du khong du chud nas mnyam par bzhag pa'i sems shin tu bsgoms pas /
translated: one should cultivate the mind of meditative equipoise.

original: ji lta ji ltar rtogs pa de lta de ltar 'gyur ro zhes shes nas /
analyzed: ji lta ji ltar rtogs pa de lta de ltar 'gyur ro zhes shes nas /
translated: Just as it is understood, so it is.

original: dgos pa'i dbang gis nam mkha'i 'od zer rnams su gyur te byung bas na nam mkha' thams cad kyi 'od zer rnams su gyur nas byung ba zhes bya ste /
analyzed: dgos pa'i dbang gis nam mkha'i 'od zer rnams su gyur te byung bas na nam mkha' thams cad kyi 'od zer rnams su gyur nas byung ba zhes bya ste /
translated: Since it arose as the light rays of space through the power of necessity, it is called “arising as the light rays of all space.”

original: ri rab kyi ngos bee d'urya'i rang bzhin du gnas pa'i dbang gis nam mkha' dngul rdo bcag pa'i mdog bzhin du snang ste /
analyzed: ri rab kyi ngos bee d'urya'i rang bzhin du gnas pa'i dbang gis nam mkha' dngul rdo bcag pa'i mdog bzhin du snang ste /
translated: Since it abides as the nature of vaidurya on the side of Mount Meru, the sky appears like the color of crushed silver ore.

original: de dang 'dra ba'i 'od zer du gyur nas byung ngo zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de dang 'dra ba'i 'od zer du gyur nas byung ngo zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it arose as light rays similar to that.

original: thams cad nam mkha'i dbyings lta bur gyur to zhes bya ba ni bshad ma thag pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad nam mkha'i rang bzhin gyi 'od zer gyis reg pa'i mthus spro ba'i dus su de'i ngo bor gyur pa'o //
analyzed: thams cad nam mkha'i dbyings lta bur gyur to zhes bya ba ni bshad ma thag pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad nam mkha'i rang bzhin gyi 'od zer gyis reg pa'i mthus spro ba'i dus su de'i ngo bor gyur pa'o //
translated: Everything became like the realm of space means that all the worlds just explained became of that nature through the power of being touched by the light rays of the nature of space at the time of emanation.

original: de nas de bzhin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: de nas de bzhin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Then, through the empowerment of all tathāgatas, and so on.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs yin pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs yin pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs te /
translated: Since it is the blessing of all the Tathagatas, it is the blessing of all the Tathagatas.

original: byin gyi rlabs ni 'di ltar gyur cig ces dgongs pa yin pas de nas nam mkha'i dbyings de dag thams cad bsdu ba mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: byin gyi rlabs ni 'di ltar gyur cig ces dgongs pa yin pas de nas nam mkha'i dbyings de dag thams cad bsdu ba mdzad pa'o //
translated: Since the thought is, “May the blessing be like this,” then all those realms of space are gathered.

original: lhag ma rnams ni go sla'o //
analyzed: lhag ma rnams ni go sla'o //
translated: The rest is easy to understand.

original: shin tu bsgoms pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa la shin tu zhes pa'o //
analyzed: shin tu bsgoms pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa la shin tu zhes pa'o //
translated: With regard to “because of thorough cultivation,” etc., “thorough” is an intensifier.

original: mchog tu yang kun nas yongs su bsgoms shing bslab pa'i phyir shin tu bsgoms pa'o //🔽yang zhes bya ba'i sgra ni thams cad nam mkha' dang mnyam @41a * //
analyzed: mchog tu yang kun nas yongs su bsgoms shing bslab pa'i phyir shin tu bsgoms pa'o // yang zhes bya ba'i sgra ni thams cad nam mkha' dang mnyam @41a * //
translated: Since it is cultivated and trained in to the highest degree, it is thoroughly cultivated.

original: pa nyid kyi ye shes shin tu rtogs pa'i phyir zhes sngar bshad pa dang sbyar bar bya ste /
analyzed: pa nyid kyi ye shes shin tu rtogs pa'i phyir zhes sngar bshad pa dang sbyar bar bya ste /
translated: The word “also” should be connected with the previous explanation, “because of thorough realization of the wisdom of the sameness of all things with space.”

original: sngar rtogs pa'i sgras ni khong du chud pa tsam du bstan pa yin la /
analyzed: sngar rtogs pa'i sgras ni khong du chud pa tsam du bstan pa yin la /
translated: The word “realization” in the previous passage indicates mere understanding,

original: da ltar ni de la dbang du gyur ba nyid brnyes pa yin te /
analyzed: da ltar ni de la dbang du gyur ba nyid brnyes pa yin te /
translated: but now it is the attainment of mastery over that.

original: bye brag ni de yod do //
analyzed: bye brag ni de yod do //
translated: The particular is that it exists.

original: nam mkha'i khams thams cad ces bya ba 'di ni sngar bshad pa'i beed'urya lta bu'i 'od zer gyi tshogs so //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams thams cad ces bya ba 'di ni sngar bshad pa'i beed'urya lta bu'i 'od zer gyi tshogs so //
translated: This is the collection of light rays like beryl explained above.

original: skye gnas ni skye ba'i gnas te skye ba'i rgyu'o //
analyzed: skye gnas ni skye ba'i gnas te skye ba'i rgyu'o //
translated: The place of birth is the place of birth, the cause of birth.

original: rdo rje rin po che chen po'i dbyibs zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rdo rje rin po che chen po'i dbyibs zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The shape of the great vajra jewel is

original: rdo rje rin po che yang yin la rin po che'i dbyibs kyang yin pas na rdo rje rin po che chen po'i dbyibs so //
analyzed: rdo rje rin po che yang yin la rin po che'i dbyibs kyang yin pas na rdo rje rin po che chen po'i dbyibs so //
translated: a great vajra jewel, and it is also the shape of a jewel, so it is the shape of a great vajra jewel.

original: gyur nas zhes bya ba ni der reng ba ste /
analyzed: gyur nas zhes bya ba ni der reng ba ste /
translated: Having become means having arisen from that.

original: spro ba dang bsdu ba mdzad nas bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag gnyis su gnas so //
analyzed: spro ba dang bsdu ba mdzad nas bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag gnyis su gnas so //
translated: Having emanated and reabsorbed, it abides in the two hands of the Bhagavān.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa rdo rje rin po che zhes bya ba rdo rje smos pa ni /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa rdo rje rin po che zhes bya ba rdo rje smos pa ni /
translated: Then, the vajra jewel, etc. The mention of vajra

original: de rdo rje sems dpa' las byung ba yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de rdo rje sems dpa' las byung ba yin pa'i phyir /
translated: is because it arises from that vajra being.

original: de'i rang gi las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbang bskur ba yin par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de'i rang gi las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbang bskur ba yin par 'gyur te /
translated: Its own action is the consecration of all tathāgatas.

original: des de la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byas nas so //
analyzed: des de la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byas nas so //
translated: Having performed the deeds of a Buddha, such as these,

original: nam mkha'i khams thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: in all the realms of space, etc.

original: nam mkha'i khams kyang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas na nam mkha'i khams thams cad do //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams kyang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas na nam mkha'i khams thams cad do //
translated: Space is also a realm and it is all, thus it is all the realms of space.

original: de nyid ni skye gnas yin pa'i phyir snying po yin la /
analyzed: de nyid ni skye gnas yin pa'i phyir snying po yin la /
translated: That itself is the essence because it is the place of origin.

original: de las rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu bzang po las byung ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de las rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu bzang po las byung ba'i phyir /
translated: Since the excellent vajra-being samādhi arises from that,

original: 'di ni nam mkha'i khams thams cad kyi snying po las shin tu byung ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni nam mkha'i khams thams cad kyi snying po las shin tu byung ba'o //
translated: this is the excellent arising from the essence of all the realms of space.

original: de la dmigs pas de shin tu bsgoms ba ni /
analyzed: de la dmigs pas de shin tu bsgoms ba ni /
translated: Since it is focused on that, it is the excellent meditation on that.

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin yin pas gcig tu gyur pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin yin pas gcig tu gyur pa'o //
translated: Since it is the vajra-being samādhi, it is the single identity.

original: rab tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres pa'o //
analyzed: rab tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres pa'o //
translated: Since it is very firm, it is the single identity.

original: byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje rin po che'i skur gyur nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje rin po che'i skur gyur nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
translated: Having become the great vajra-jewel being, etc. is easy to understand.

original: ae ma'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa la ae ma'o zhes bya ba ngo mtshar ba'o //
analyzed: ae ma'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa la ae ma'o zhes bya ba ngo mtshar ba'o //
translated: The phrase Amazing! and so on.

original: 'dir ci zhig ngo mtshar che zhe na /🔽gang bdag gis dbang bskur na chags med rgyal ba yang ste /
analyzed: 'dir ci zhig ngo mtshar che zhe na / gang bdag gis dbang bskur na chags med rgyal ba yang ste /
translated: What is amazing here?

original: chags pa thams cad spangs pa'i rgyal ba rnams kyang khams gsum gyi bdag por dgongs pas na zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: chags pa thams cad spangs pa'i rgyal ba rnams kyang khams gsum gyi bdag por dgongs pas na zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The phrase even the victorious ones who are free from attachment means that even the victorious ones who have abandoned all attachment are considered to be the lords of the three realms when they are consecrated by me.

original: 'di ni 'dir ngo mtshar du gyur pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni 'dir ngo mtshar du gyur pa yin no //
translated: This is what is amazing here.

original: 'di skad ston te /
analyzed: 'di skad ston te /
translated: This is what is being taught.

original: nyon mongs pa bag chags dang bcas pa spangs pa'i chags pa med pa'i rgyal ba yang khams gsum gyi chos kyi rgyal por bskos shing khams gsum gyi @41b bdag por zhes bya bar dgongs pas na /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa bag chags dang bcas pa spangs pa'i chags pa med pa'i rgyal ba yang khams gsum gyi chos kyi rgyal por bskos shing khams gsum gyi @41b bdag por zhes bya bar dgongs pas na /
translated: Even the victorious ones who are free from attachment, who have abandoned the afflictions along with their imprints, are consecrated as the Dharma kings of the three realms and are considered to be the lords of the three realms.

original: mu stegs byed pa gzhan rnams la 'di lta bu'i khong du chud pa med de /
analyzed: mu stegs byed pa gzhan rnams la 'di lta bu'i khong du chud pa med de /
translated: Other tīrthikas do not have such an understanding.

original: de ltar na thun mong ma yin pa'i chos thugs su chud pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de ltar na thun mong ma yin pa'i chos thugs su chud pa'i phyir /
translated: Thus, because of their understanding of the uncommon Dharma,

original: rgyal ba nyid khams gsum gyi bdag por dgongs pa yin no //
analyzed: rgyal ba nyid khams gsum gyi bdag por dgongs pa yin no //
translated: The Victor himself is considered to be the lord of the three realms.

original: rdo rje rin chen zhes bya ba ni rdo rje ming gis mtshan pa'i rin po che'o //
analyzed: rdo rje rin chen zhes bya ba ni rdo rje ming gis mtshan pa'i rin po che'o //
translated: The “vajra jewel” is the jewel marked with the vajra name.

original: dam pa'i dbang ni shin tu bzang po'i dbang bskur ba ste /
analyzed: dam pa'i dbang ni shin tu bzang po'i dbang bskur ba ste /
translated: The “excellent consecration” is the consecration of the excellent.

original: 'dis dbang bskur ba yin pas na dbang ngo //
analyzed: 'dis dbang bskur ba yin pas na dbang ngo //
translated: It is a consecration because it consecrates with this.

original: ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is it like?

original: mchog ces bya ba ste bla na med pa'o //
analyzed: mchog ces bya ba ste bla na med pa'o //
translated: It is called “supreme,” that is, unsurpassed.

original: byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje rin po che 'di yang don gyis na zhal bzhi pa nyid yin par blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje rin po che 'di yang don gyis na zhal bzhi pa nyid yin par blta bar bya'o //
translated: This great bodhisattva Vajraratna should be seen as having four faces in meaning.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
translated: “Then” and so forth is easy to understand.

original: bka' nod pa ni rang gi las la nges par sbyar bar gsol ba 'debs pa'o //
analyzed: bka' nod pa ni rang gi las la nges par sbyar bar gsol ba 'debs pa'o //
translated: “Receiving the command” is requesting to be definitely applied to one’s own activity.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbang bskur bar bya ba'i phyir ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas te /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbang bskur bar bya ba'i phyir ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas te /
translated: Then, from “the Bhagavān” and so forth, in order to consecrate all the tathāgatas, abiding in which samādhi,
