original: kyi rdo rje rin po che zhes bya ba ste /🔽ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs shing mngon sum du mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: kyi rdo rje rin po che zhes bya ba ste / ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs shing mngon sum du mdzad pa'o //
translated: The consecration of the vajra gem is the samadhi in which the vajra gem is given to the Bodhisattva, with the words Consecrate all Tathagatas with this vajra gem as unsurpassed Dharma kings.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /🔽de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa ni kye ma'o nam bdag gis thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rtogs nas chos kyi rgyal po byed snyam du dgongs pa'o //🔽de yongs su rdzogs pa ni bla na med pa'i chos kyi rgyal por dbang bskur ba'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /🔽de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa ni kye ma'o nam bdag gis thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rtogs nas chos kyi rgyal po byed snyam du dgongs pa'o //🔽de yongs su rdzogs pa ni bla na med pa'i chos kyi rgyal por dbang bskur ba'o //
translated: The consecration of the vajra gem is the samadhi in which the vajra gem is given to the Bodhisattva, with the words Consecrate all Tathagatas with this vajra gem

original: de'i dam tshig ni rdo rje rin po che'i phyag rgya gang gis dbang bskur ba 'di ni /
analyzed: de'i dam tshig ni rdo rje rin po che'i phyag rgya gang gis dbang bskur ba 'di ni /
translated: The pledge of that is:🔽The pledge to fulfill the transcendent

original: dgongs pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i dam tshig ni /
analyzed: dgongs pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i dam tshig ni /
translated: intention is:

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i dam tshig ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i dam tshig ste /
translated: The pledge to fulfill the transcendent intention of all transcendent ones.

original: byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje rin po che'i lag tu byin no zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje rin po che'i lag tu byin no zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: The pledge is to place the vajra-jewel empowerment in the hand of the great vajra-being.

original: da ni de gang gi phyir byin pa gzhung lhag ma rnams kyis ston pa yin no //
analyzed: da ni de gang gi phyir byin pa gzhung lhag ma rnams kyis ston pa yin no //
translated: Now, the remaining passages show why it was given.

original: ma lus pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la sems can gyi khams ma lus pa don thams cad yongs su grub pa ni mngon par 'dod pa'i don thob pa'o //
analyzed: ma lus pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la sems can gyi khams ma lus pa don thams cad yongs su grub pa ni mngon par 'dod pa'i don thob pa'o //
translated: As for the phrase “the entire realm of sentient beings,” the entire realm of sentient beings is the accomplishment of all aims, the attainment of the desired aim.

original: don thob pa des ni thams cad kyi bde ba dang / yid bde ba myong bar bya'o //
analyzed: don thob pa des ni thams cad kyi bde ba dang / yid bde ba myong bar bya'o //
translated: By attaining the aim, one should experience the happiness and mental joy of all.

original: @42a * // bar du zhes bya ba'i sgras ni chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / mu stegs las rnam par rgyal ba dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bzhag pa la sogs pa bsdu'o //🔽de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi don phun sum tshogs pa ni sems can rnams 'khor ba las bton te ;
analyzed: @42a * // bar du zhes bya ba'i sgras ni chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / mu stegs las rnam par rgyal ba dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bzhag pa la sogs pa bsdu'o // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi don phun sum tshogs pa ni sems can rnams 'khor ba las bton te ;
translated: The word “also” includes the turning of the wheel of the Dharma, the victory over the extremists, and the establishment of sentient beings in the path of the ten virtues.

original: mya ngan las 'das pa la rab tu 'jog pa'o //
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa la rab tu 'jog pa'o //
translated: The perfection of the purpose of all the Tathāgatas is the deliverance of sentient beings from cyclic existence and their establishment in nirvāṇa.

original: de nyid ni dngos grub dam pa yin la de thob par bya ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni de rnyed par bya ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de nyid ni dngos grub dam pa yin la de thob par bya ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni de rnyed par bya ba'i phyir ro //
translated: That itself is the highest power, and for the sake of attaining that, i.e., for the sake of acquiring that.

original: lhag ma rnams ni go sla'o //
analyzed: lhag ma rnams ni go sla'o //
translated: The rest is easy to understand.

original: rdo rje rin po che'i 'khor lo bskor ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: rdo rje rin po che'i 'khor lo bskor ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: The “turning of the wheel of the vajra gem” and so forth.

original: rdo rje rin po ches nye bar mtshan pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba ni rdo rje rin po che'i 'khor lo bskor ba ste /
analyzed: rdo rje rin po ches nye bar mtshan pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba ni rdo rje rin po che'i 'khor lo bskor ba ste /
translated: The turning of the wheel of the vajra gem is the turning of the wheel by the universal monarch who is characterized by the vajra gem.

original: 'khor lo ni dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'o //
analyzed: 'khor lo ni dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'o //
translated: The wheel is the wheel of the maṇḍala.

original: de bskor zhing sprul pa'i ngang tshul 'di la mnga' bas na rdo rje rin po che'i 'khor lo bskor ba'o //
analyzed: de bskor zhing sprul pa'i ngang tshul 'di la mnga' bas na rdo rje rin po che'i 'khor lo bskor ba'o //
translated: Since he is the master of this nature of turning and emanating, he is the turner of the vajra jewel wheel.

original: de'i ngo bo nyid ni rdo rje rin po che'i 'khor lo bskor ba nyid do //
analyzed: de'i ngo bo nyid ni rdo rje rin po che'i 'khor lo bskor ba nyid do //
translated: His essence is the turning of the vajra jewel wheel.

original: rdo rje rin po che'i myu gu ni rdo rje rin po che'i myu gu'i phyag rgya ste /
analyzed: rdo rje rin po che'i myu gu ni rdo rje rin po che'i myu gu'i phyag rgya ste /
translated: The vajra jewel sprout is the seal of the vajra jewel sprout.

original: rdo rje rin po che'i phyag rgya 'di dang / khyod kyis rin po che'i 'khor lo bskor bar gyis shig ces rdo rje rin po che myu gu'i dbang de la bskur bas na 'khor los sgyur bar dbang bskur ba ste /
analyzed: rdo rje rin po che'i phyag rgya 'di dang / khyod kyis rin po che'i 'khor lo bskor bar gyis shig ces rdo rje rin po che myu gu'i dbang de la bskur bas na 'khor los sgyur bar dbang bskur ba ste /
translated: Since he is empowered with the vajra jewel sprout empowerment with the words You must turn the jewel wheel with this vajra jewel seal, he is empowered as a wheel-turner.

original: rdo rje rin po che'i myu gu'i dbang bskur ba 'di ni don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po la dbang bskur ba'i phyir yin no //
analyzed: rdo rje rin po che'i myu gu'i dbang bskur ba 'di ni don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po la dbang bskur ba'i phyir yin no //
translated: This vajra jewel sprout empowerment is for the sake of empowering him in the great maṇḍala of all accomplishments.

original: 'dir yang sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan gyi dbang bskur ba nyid yin par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dir yang sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan gyi dbang bskur ba nyid yin par shes par bya'o //
translated: Here also, one should understand that it is the empowerment of the crown of the five buddhas.

original: de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po de la /
analyzed: de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po de la /
translated: Then, to that great bodhisattva,

original: rdo rje snying po rdo rje snying po zhes rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur ro zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: rdo rje snying po rdo rje snying po zhes rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur ro zhes bya ba la /
translated: the vajra essence, the vajra essence, the vajra name empowerment is conferred.

original: rdo rje nyid kyi skye gnas mnga' bas na /
analyzed: rdo rje nyid kyi skye gnas mnga' bas na /
translated: Since he possesses the vajra as his birthplace,

original: rdo rje snying po ste rdo rje nor bu las skyes pa'i phyir snying po ni skye gnas la bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje snying po ste rdo rje nor bu las skyes pa'i phyir snying po ni skye gnas la bya'o //
translated: he is the vajra essence. The essence is the birthplace, because he is born from the vajra gem.

original: rdo rje nor bu zhes bya ba'i sgra ni mtha' mi mngon par byas nas rdo rje snying po zhes brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: rdo rje nor bu zhes bya ba'i sgra ni mtha' mi mngon par byas nas rdo rje snying po zhes brjod pa yin no //
translated: The word vajra gem is stated as vajra essence, with the end elided.

original: 'di zhes bya ba ni lag pa la gnas pa'o //
analyzed: 'di zhes bya ba ni lag pa la gnas pa'o //
translated: This means he is located in the hand.

original: de gang yin zhe na /
analyzed: de gang yin zhe na /
translated: What is that?

original: sems can khams ni dbang bskur ba ste /
analyzed: sems can khams ni dbang bskur ba ste /
translated: The realm of sentient beings is empowered.

original: khams gsum gyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor du 'jig rten gsum gyi 'gro ba rnams 'dus pa la yang des dbang bskur bas na /
analyzed: khams gsum gyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor du 'jig rten gsum gyi 'gro ba rnams 'dus pa la yang des dbang bskur bas na /
translated: Since he empowers the assembly of beings of the three worlds in the mandala of the wheel of the three realms,

original: sems can khams ni dbang bskur ba //
analyzed: sems can khams ni dbang bskur ba //
translated: he is the realm of sentient beings is empowered.

original: zhes bya'o // de zhes bya ba ni bdag gang las skyes pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya'o // de zhes bya ba ni bdag gang las skyes pa'o //
translated: That means he is born from the vajra.

original: bdag yin te zhes bya ba 'dis ni phyag rgya dang khyad par med par ston te /🔽bdag gang yin pa de ni @42b bdag gi phyag rgya yin la /
analyzed: bdag yin te zhes bya ba 'dis ni phyag rgya dang khyad par med par ston te / bdag gang yin pa de ni @42b bdag gi phyag rgya yin la /
translated: This is the self shows that there is no difference between the seal and the self.

original: bdag gi phyag rgya gang yin pa de ni bdag yin no zhes pa'o //
analyzed: bdag gi phyag rgya gang yin pa de ni bdag yin no zhes pa'o //
translated: That which is the self is the seal of the self, and that which is the seal of the self is the self.

original: 'di yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi dad pa'i nor bu rin po che'i yon tan te /
analyzed: 'di yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi dad pa'i nor bu rin po che'i yon tan te /
translated: This is the jewel of faith of the Bhagavat Vairocana.

original: gdul bya'i sems can rnams la thugs brtse bas dbang bskur bar bya ba'i phyir sems dpa' dang phyag rgya'i gzugs su sprul bar mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: gdul bya'i sems can rnams la thugs brtse bas dbang bskur bar bya ba'i phyir sems dpa' dang phyag rgya'i gzugs su sprul bar mdzad pa'o //
translated: Out of compassion for sentient beings to be trained, he emanates in the form of the sattva and the seal in order to confer empowerment.

original: da ni dbang bskur bar thob pa rnams gzi byin bskyed par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni dbang bskur bar thob pa rnams gzi byin bskyed par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: Now, in order to generate the splendor of those who have obtained empowerment,

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas sems dpa'i phyag rgya gzhan mos pa yin no //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas sems dpa'i phyag rgya gzhan mos pa yin no //
translated: the other seal of the sattva is the wish, as stated by then, and so on.

original: byang chub sems dpa' chen po gzi brjid chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' chen po gzi brjid chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: The great sattva of great splendor, and so on, is as follows.

original: byang chub sems dpa' chen po yang yin la gzi brjid chen po yang yin pas na /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' chen po yang yin la gzi brjid chen po yang yin pas na /
translated: He is a great bodhisattva and also has great splendor,

original: byang chub sems dpa' chen po gzi brjid chen po'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' chen po gzi brjid chen po'o //
translated: thus he is a great bodhisattva with great splendor.

original: de'i dam tshig ni snying po dang phyag rgya la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de'i dam tshig ni snying po dang phyag rgya la sogs pa ste /
translated: His pledge is the essence-mantra, seal, etc.🔽The name of that concentration is “Vajra-Adaman-tine-Splendor.”

original: de'i bsam pa'i rin po che gang las byung ba de byin gyis brlab cing brtan par bya ba'i phyir ming rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs pa ni mngon du mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: de'i bsam pa'i rin po che gang las byung ba de byin gyis brlab cing brtan par bya ba'i phyir ming rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs pa ni mngon du mdzad pa'o //
translated: He entered it, i.e., he manifested it, in order to bless and stabilize the jewel of his intention, from which the pledge of all the tathagatas arises.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi dam tshig yin pas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi dam tshig ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi dam tshig yin pas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi dam tshig ste /
translated: It is the pledge of the light rays of all the tathagatas, thus it is the pledge of the light rays of all the tathagatas.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi dam tshig ces bya ba'i snying po gang yin pa de'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi dam tshig ces bya ba'i snying po gang yin pa de'o //
translated: It is the essence called “The Pledge of the Light Rays of All the Tathagatas.”

original: 'di skad ston te /
analyzed: 'di skad ston te /
translated: This is what is being taught:

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gdul bya'i skye bo rnams sad par bya ba'i phyir phyag rgya'i khyad par gang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang 'dra bas 'od zer rab tu 'gyed par mdzad pa'i phyag rgya'i khyad par 'di la ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi🔽'od zer gyi dam tshig ces bya la /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gdul bya'i skye bo rnams sad par bya ba'i phyir phyag rgya'i khyad par gang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang 'dra bas 'od zer rab tu 'gyed par mdzad pa'i phyag rgya'i khyad par 'di la ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi dam tshig ces bya la /
translated: This special mudra is called the commitment of all the tathagatas' light rays.

original: de ston par byed pa'i sgra la yang ming de skad ces bya bar bshad do //
analyzed: de ston par byed pa'i sgra la yang ming de skad ces bya bar bshad do //
translated: The sound that teaches this is also explained to have that name.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa'i dam tshig de ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa'i dam tshig de ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po zhes bya ba ste /
translated: That commitment of all the tathagatas' emission of light rays is called the essence of all tathagatas.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs la gnas pas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs la gnas pas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po zhes bya'o //
translated: Since it abides in the minds of all tathagatas, it is called the essence of all tathagatas.

original: de nyid ces bya ba la sogs pas ni gang 'di ni nam mkha'i 'od zer du gyur te byung ba de nyid /
analyzed: de nyid ces bya ba la sogs pas ni gang 'di ni nam mkha'i 'od zer du gyur te byung ba de nyid /
translated: The line beginning with that itself explains that which becomes the light rays of space and arises.

original: da 'dir dgos pa gzhan gyi dbang gis nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor lta bu'i zlum por gyur nas 'byung ngo zhes bya ba'i don to //🔽de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor rdo rje sems dpas sprul pa yin @43a * //
analyzed: da 'dir dgos pa gzhan gyi dbang gis nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor lta bu'i zlum por gyur nas 'byung ngo zhes bya ba'i don to // de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor rdo rje sems dpas sprul pa yin @43a * //
translated: Now, by the power of another need, it arises as a circle like the orb of the sun.🔽Then, etc. The orb of the sun is the emanation of Vajrasattva.

original: pas na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la rdo rje nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du gtogs pa yin la /
analyzed: pas na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la rdo rje nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du gtogs pa yin la /
translated: Since it is included in the orb of the vajra sun,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa ni sems dpa' 'di'i las yin pas na thog mar bstan pa yin te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa ni sems dpa' 'di'i las yin pas na thog mar bstan pa yin te /
translated: the emission of the light rays of all the Ones-Gone-Thus is the activity of this hero, and thus it is taught first.

original: de la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad nas so //
analyzed: de la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad nas so //
translated: Having performed the deeds of a Buddha such as that, etc.

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gang shin tu gzi brjid che ba 'di la ni rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu gzi brjid che ba zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gang shin tu gzi brjid che ba 'di la ni rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu gzi brjid che ba zhes bya ba la /
translated: The vajra-hero concentration of Vajrasattva, which is very powerful, is called the vajra-hero concentration of Vajrasattva, which is very powerful.

original: de'i ngo bo nyid yin pas na shin tu gzi brjid che ba nyid do //
analyzed: de'i ngo bo nyid yin pas na shin tu gzi brjid che ba nyid do //
translated: Since it has the nature of that, it is very powerful.

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la dmigs pa phul du byung bar shin tu bsgoms pas na de'i phyir gcig tu zhes bya ba la rab tu brtan pas na 'dus pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la dmigs pa phul du byung bar shin tu bsgoms pas na de'i phyir gcig tu zhes bya ba la rab tu brtan pas na 'dus pa'o //
translated: “united” because of being extremely firm.

original: ae ma'o zhes bya ba ni ngo mtshar du gyur pa'o //
analyzed: ae ma'o zhes bya ba ni ngo mtshar du gyur pa'o //
translated: “Amazing!” means “astonishing!”

original: sems can khams kun snang byed ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: sems can khams kun snang byed ces bya ba ni /
translated: “Illuminating the entire realm of sentient beings”

original: ye shes kyi snang bas mi shes pa'i mun pa bsal ba'o //
analyzed: ye shes kyi snang bas mi shes pa'i mun pa bsal ba'o //
translated: means that the light of wisdom removes the darkness of ignorance.

original: de gang zhe na /
analyzed: de gang zhe na /
translated: What is that?

original: gzi brjid dpe med ces bya ba ste /
analyzed: gzi brjid dpe med ces bya ba ste /
translated: “Incomparable splendor”

original: 'di la dpe yod pa ma yin pas na dpe med pa'o //
analyzed: 'di la dpe yod pa ma yin pas na dpe med pa'o //
translated: means that it is incomparable because it has no example.

original: 'dir ci zhig ngo mtshar zhe na /
analyzed: 'dir ci zhig ngo mtshar zhe na /
translated: What is astonishing here?

original: gang phyir sangs rgyas dag pa yi //
analyzed: gang phyir sangs rgyas dag pa yi //
translated: “Because the pure buddhas

original: 'dren pa rnams kyang sbyong bar byed //🔽ces bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: 'dren pa rnams kyang sbyong bar byed //🔽ces bya ba gsungs te /
translated: also purify the guides.”

original: sangs rgyas rnams ni nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa bag chags dang bcas pa'i dri ma dang bral bas na dag pa dang / gnas yongs su gyur pa brnyes pas kyang shin tu dag pa yin no //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnams ni nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa bag chags dang bcas pa'i dri ma dang bral bas na dag pa dang / gnas yongs su gyur pa brnyes pas kyang shin tu dag pa yin no //
translated: The buddhas are pure because they are free from the stains of the afflictive obstructions and the obstructions to omniscience, together with their propensities.🔽And they are very pure because they have attained the transmutation of the basis.

original: sangs rgyas dag pa rnams kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'dom gang tsam gyi tshad du rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor du gnas pa de yang yongs su sbyong bar byed ces pa 'phel bar byed pa ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas dag pa rnams kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'dom gang tsam gyi tshad du rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor du gnas pa de yang yongs su sbyong bar byed ces pa 'phel bar byed pa ste /
translated: The buddhas, who are pure, have a halo of light that extends a fathom in the natural mandala, and that is what is purified, that is, increased.

original: phyogs thams cad snang bar byed ces bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: phyogs thams cad snang bar byed ces bya ba'i don to //
translated: It is said that they illuminate all directions.

original: 'dren pa zhes bya ba la 'dis 'dren par byed pas na 'dren par byed pa ste /
analyzed: 'dren pa zhes bya ba la 'dis 'dren par byed pas na 'dren par byed pa ste /
translated: The guide is he who guides,

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o //
translated: the noble eightfold path.

original: 'dren pa de gang la yod pa ni 'dren pa'o //
analyzed: 'dren pa de gang la yod pa ni 'dren pa'o //
translated: The one who has that guide is the guide.

original: de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid ces bya ba la /
analyzed: de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid ces bya ba la /
translated: Then the great bodhisattva Vimalatejā said to the Blessed One,

original: gang la dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid yod pa de ni dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid de /
analyzed: gang la dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid yod pa de ni dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid de /
translated: He who has stainless splendor is the stainless splendor.

original: lhag ma rnams ni go sla'o //
analyzed: lhag ma rnams ni go sla'o //
translated: The rest is easy to understand.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Then, the Blessed One, etc.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor du byin gyis brlab pa ni de dang 'dra ba'i gzung ba'i cha brtan par byed pa ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor du byin gyis brlab pa ni de dang 'dra ba'i gzung ba'i cha brtan par byed pa ste /
translated: The consecration as the orb of light of all the Tathagatas is the stabilization of the apprehended aspect similar to that.

original: de'i rdo rje ni shin tu brtan pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de'i rdo rje ni shin tu brtan pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: His vajra is called “very firm.”

original: de lta bas na @43b ting nge 'dzin 'di'i ming yang las dang rjes su mthun par btags pa yin te /
analyzed: de lta bas na @43b ting nge 'dzin 'di'i ming yang las dang rjes su mthun par btags pa yin te /
translated: Therefore, the name of this samadhi is also designated in accordance with its action.

original: de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa'o //
analyzed: de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa'o //
translated: He entered into evenness in that kind of samadhi.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi dam tshig ces bya ba la /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi dam tshig ces bya ba la /
translated: The pledge of the light rays of all the Tathagatas.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rgyab tu gnas te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rgyab tu gnas te /
translated: He stood behind all the Tathagatas.

original: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgyas gdul bya'i skye bo rnams sad par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgyas gdul bya'i skye bo rnams sad par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: With the seal of the orb of the sun, in order to awaken the beings to be trained,

original: 'od zer rnams 'gyed par mdzad pa gang yin pa de ni 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa'i dam tshig go //
analyzed: 'od zer rnams 'gyed par mdzad pa gang yin pa de ni 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa'i dam tshig go //
translated: The pledge of radiating light rays is to radiate light rays.

original: 'di dang gzi brjid 'dra ba med pas na /
analyzed: 'di dang gzi brjid 'dra ba med pas na /
translated: Since there is no one equal to him in splendor,

original: gzi brjid mtshungs pa med pa'o //
analyzed: gzi brjid mtshungs pa med pa'o //
translated: he is the one without equal splendor.

original: sems can gyi khams ma lus pa 'jig rten gyi khams lus pa med pa rnams su gzi brjid mtshungs pa med pa myong bas bla na med pa'i bde ba dang yid bde ba myong bar bya ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sems can gyi khams ma lus pa 'jig rten gyi khams lus pa med pa rnams su gzi brjid mtshungs pa med pa myong bas bla na med pa'i bde ba dang yid bde ba myong bar bya ba'i phyir ro //
translated: He experiences the splendor that is unequaled in all the realms of sentient beings, in all the worlds, in order to experience the unsurpassed bliss and mental joy.

original: bar du zhes bya ba'i sgras ni byang chub kyi sems yongs su sbyong ba dang / kun du bzang po'i spyod pa yongs su rdzogs pa la sogs pa bsdu'o //
analyzed: bar du zhes bya ba'i sgras ni byang chub kyi sems yongs su sbyong ba dang / kun du bzang po'i spyod pa yongs su rdzogs pa la sogs pa bsdu'o //
translated: The word “also” includes the purification of the spirit of enlightenment and the completion of the conduct of Samantabhadra.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang gi 'od ni mtha' yas pa ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang gi 'od ni mtha' yas pa ste /
translated: The light of all the transcendent lords is infinite.

original: de thob pa ni rnyed pa'o //
analyzed: de thob pa ni rnyed pa'o //
translated: To attain that is to obtain it.

original: de nyid grub pa dam pa ste //
analyzed: de nyid grub pa dam pa ste //
translated: That itself is the highest accomplishment.

original: de'i phyir rdo rje nyi ma ste //
analyzed: de'i phyir rdo rje nyi ma ste //
translated: Therefore, he is the vajra sun.

original: byang chub sems dpa' chen po gzi brjid chen po de'i lag tu byin no zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' chen po gzi brjid chen po de'i lag tu byin no zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: and the great bodhisattva Mahātejas.

original: rdo rje'i 'od ces bya ba la sogs pa la rdo rje'i 'od rdo rje'i 'od ces bya ba ni rdo rje 'di ni rdo rje sems dpa' las byung ba'i phyir sus kyang gzhig par mi nus pa dang / 'od zer thams cad zil gyis gnon par byed nus pa yin te /
analyzed: rdo rje'i 'od ces bya ba la sogs pa la rdo rje'i 'od rdo rje'i 'od ces bya ba ni rdo rje 'di ni rdo rje sems dpa' las byung ba'i phyir sus kyang gzhig par mi nus pa dang / 'od zer thams cad zil gyis gnon par byed nus pa yin te /
translated: The vajra light, etc. The vajra light is the vajra light because this vajra is indestructible by anyone because it arises from Vajrasattva, and it is able to overpower all light rays.

original: de de la mnga' ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de de la mnga' ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because he possesses that,

original: de bas na de la rdo rje'i 'od rdo rje'i 'od ces btags pa yin no //
analyzed: de bas na de la rdo rje'i 'od rdo rje'i 'od ces btags pa yin no //
translated: therefore he is designated as the vajra light, vajra light.

original: de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i 'od ces bya ba ni rdo rje lar mi phye dpa'i 'od mnga' bas na /
analyzed: de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i 'od ces bya ba ni rdo rje lar mi phye dpa'i 'od mnga' bas na /
translated: Then the bodhisattva Vajraprabha, etc. The vajra light is the vajra light because he possesses the light of Vajrasattva.

original: rdo rje 'od de /
analyzed: rdo rje 'od de /
translated: That vajra light,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi mtshan nyid can gyi phyag rgya'i khyad par des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la snang bar byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad snang bar byed pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi de'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang bcas pa thams cad kyang snang zhing gsal bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi mtshan nyid can gyi phyag rgya'i khyad par des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la snang bar byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad snang bar byed pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi de'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang bcas pa thams cad kyang snang zhing gsal bar byed pa'o //
translated: And not only does he illuminate all the Tathagatas, but he also illuminates and makes manifest their entire retinue mandala and all the buddha fields.

original: ma dris su zin kyang ngo mtshar du gyur pa'i don 'di brjod par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: ma dris su zin kyang ngo mtshar du gyur pa'i don 'di brjod par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: Even though it is not asked, in order to express this wondrous meaning,

original: ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: he utters this utterance.

original: 'di zhes bya ba ni phyag na gnas pa'o //
analyzed: 'di zhes bya ba ni phyag na gnas pa'o //
translated: Here means in the hand.

original: de zhes bya ba ni bdag gang las byung ba'o //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni bdag gang las byung ba'o //
translated: There means from where the self arises.

original: @44a * // de gang yin zhe na /🔽mi shes mun nag 'joms byed pa /
analyzed: @44a * // de gang yin zhe na / mi shes mun nag 'joms byed pa /
translated: What is that?

original: zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes gsungs te /
translated: It is the one who destroys the darkness of ignorance.

original: mun nag ni gti mug thibs po'o //
analyzed: mun nag ni gti mug thibs po'o //
translated: Darkness is the thick ignorance.

original: mi shes pa nyid mun nag yin pas na mi shes mun nag go //
analyzed: mi shes pa nyid mun nag yin pas na mi shes mun nag go //
translated: Ignorance is darkness, and so it is the darkness of ignorance.

original: de 'joms par byed pa ni mi skye ba'i chos can du byed pa'o //
analyzed: de 'joms par byed pa ni mi skye ba'i chos can du byed pa'o //
translated: It is destroyed by the light of the Dharma, which is the cause of its non-arising.

original: de su zhig gi yin zhe na /
analyzed: de su zhig gi yin zhe na /
translated: Whose is that light?

original: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhes bya ba gsungs so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhes bya ba gsungs so //
translated: The light of the Dharma of all Buddhas.

original: mi shes pa'i mun nag ji ltar 'joms par byed ce na /
analyzed: mi shes pa'i mun nag ji ltar 'joms par byed ce na /
translated: How does it destroy the darkness of ignorance?

original: shin tu phra rdul ji snyed pa'o //
analyzed: shin tu phra rdul ji snyed pa'o //
translated: It is as extensive as the most subtle particles.

original: nyi ma'i 'od pas shin tu lhag / ces bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: nyi ma'i 'od pas shin tu lhag / ces bya ba gsungs te /
translated: It surpasses the light of the sun.

original: gling bzhi pa re re zhing nyi ma re re snang ba'i bya ba byed pa yang phyi rol du yin gyi nang du ma yin la de yang ma bsgribs pa'i phyogs su snang bar zad do //
analyzed: gling bzhi pa re re zhing nyi ma re re snang ba'i bya ba byed pa yang phyi rol du yin gyi nang du ma yin la de yang ma bsgribs pa'i phyogs su snang bar zad do //
translated: The light of the sun performs its function of illumination in each of the four continents, but only externally, not internally, and only in the direction that is not obscured.

original: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams re re zhing yang nyi ma brgya stong dpag tu med pa'i grangs snyed 'char bar byed mod kyi /
analyzed: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams re re zhing yang nyi ma brgya stong dpag tu med pa'i grangs snyed 'char bar byed mod kyi /
translated: In each of the trichiliocosm, an immeasurable number of hundreds of thousands of suns rise.

original: 'on kyag der phyi dang nang gi mun pa thams cad sel bar byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyag der phyi dang nang gi mun pa thams cad sel bar byed pa ma yin no //
translated: But it does not remove all inner and outer darkness.

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi nyi ma des ni 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du phyi dang nang gi mun pa bag chags dang bcas pa sel bar mdzad do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi nyi ma des ni 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du phyi dang nang gi mun pa bag chags dang bcas pa sel bar mdzad do //
translated: The sun-like maṇḍala of light of the Blessed One, the Buddha, removes all inner and outer darkness, along with its habitual tendencies, in all world systems.
